  5150                                  
  5151                                  ; 19/03/2018
  5152                                  ; Retro DOS v2.0 (24/02/2018)
  5153                                  ; [REF: MSDOS 3.3, MSBIO, "MSINIT.ASM"  (24/07/1987)]
  5154                                  
  5155                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5156                                  ;									:
  5157                                  ;	System initialization						:
  5158                                  ;									:
  5159                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  5160                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  5161                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  5162                                  ;									:
  5163                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  5164                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  5165                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  5166                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  5167                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  5168                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  5169                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  5170                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  5171                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  5172                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  5173                                  ;		this program.						:
  5174                                  ;									:
  5175                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5176                                  		
  5177                                  		; 20/12/2022
  5178                                  		; ----------------------
  5179                                  		; Registers
  5180                                  		; ----------------------
  5181                                  		; DL = [bsDriveNumber]
  5182                                  		; DH = [bsMedia]
  5183                                  		; DS = 0, ES = 0, SS = 0
  5184                                  		; BP = 7C00h
  5185                                  		; SP = 700h
  5186                                  		; ----------------------
  5187                                  		; CX = 0				
  5188                                  
  5189                                  ; 02/10/2022 - 20/12/2022
  5190                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5191                                  ; Note: Retro DOS v4.0 Kernel does not use/contain MSLOAD part of IO.SYS (5.0)
  5192                                  ; 	Because, Retro DOS v2 boot sector loads complete/entire MSDOS.SYS
  5193                                  ;	(RETRODOS.SYS) Kernel file (IO.SYS & MSDOS.SYS together).
  5194                                  ;	As result of boot sector ve init differences, Retro DOS init code (here)
  5195                                  ;	moves kernel to segment 70h at first, then sets diskette parameters
  5196                                  ;	at segment 50h (while MSDOS 5.0 boot sector and then MSLOAD sets this).
  5197                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5198                                  
  5199                                  ; msload will check the extended boot record and set ax, bx accordingly.
  5200                                  ;
  5201                                  ;;	msload passes a 32 bit sector number hi word in ax and low in bx
  5202                                  ;;	save this in cs:bios_h and cs:bios_l. this is for the start of
  5203                                  ;;	data sector of the bios.
  5204                                  ;
  5205                                  ;		mov	[cs:bios_h], ax	; (start of) dos bios (IO.SYS) data sector
  5206                                  ;		mov	[cs:bios_l], bx
  5207                                  
  5208                                  ; with the following information from msload, we don't need the
  5209                                  ;     boot sector any more.-> this will solve the problem of 29 kb size
  5210                                  ;     limitation of msbio.com file.
  5211                                  
  5212                                  		; 10/12/2023
  5213                                  		; 21/12/2022

  5215

  5217 00001BE0 07                      		pop	es

  5305 00001C3D CD11                    		int	11h		; EQUIPMENT DETERMINATION
  5306                                  					; Return: AX = equipment flag bits
  5307                                  		; 10/12/2023
  5308                                  		;jmp	short chk_fd_count
  5309                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM, BIOSDATA:1DF7h) ; *!!*
  5310                                  		; ((signature))
  5311                                  		;push	dx		; 52h ; 'R'
  5312                                  		;push	ax		; 50h ; 'P'
  5313                                  		;push	bx		; 53h ; 'S'
  5314                                  
  5315                                  ; we have to support a system that does not have any diskette
  5316                                  ; drives but only hardfiles. this system will ipl from the hardfile.
  5317                                  ; if the equipment flag bit 0 is 1, then the system has diskette drive(s).
  5318                                  ; otherwise, the system has only hardfiles.
  5319                                  ;
  5320                                  ; important thing is that still, for compatibility reason, the drive letter
  5321                                  ; for the hardfiles start from "c".  so, we still need to allocate dummy bds
  5322                                  ; drive a and drive b. at sysinit time, we are going to set cds table entry
  5323                                  ; of dpb pointer for these drives to 0, so any user attempt to access this
  5324                                  ; drives will get "invalid drive letter ..." message. we are going to
  5325                                  ; establish "fakefloppydrv" flag. ***sysinit module should call int 11h to
  5326                                  ; determine whether there are any diskette drivers in the system or not.!!!***
  5327                                  
  5328                                  ; check the register returned by the equipment determination interrupt
  5329                                  ; we have to handle the case of no diskettes in the system by faking
  5330                                  ; two dummy drives.
  5331                                  ;
  5332                                  ; if the register indicates that we do have floppy drives we don't need
  5333                                  ; to do anything special.
  5334                                  ;
  5335                                  ; if the register indicates that we don't have any floppy drives then
  5336                                  ; what we need to do is set the fakefloppydrv variable, change the
  5337                                  ; register to say that we do have floppy drives and then go to execute
  5338                                  ; the code which starts at notsingle. this is because we can skip the
  5339                                  ; code given below which tries to find if there are one or two drives
  5340                                  ; since we already know about this.
  5341                                  
  5342                                  chk_fd_count:	; 10/12/2023
  5343                                  		;or	ax, 1	; *!!*
  5344                                  
  5345                                  		; 06/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  5346 00001C3F 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  5347                                  
  5348                                  		; 12/12/2022
  5349 00001C41 A801                    		test	al, 1
  5350                                  		;test	ax, 1		; floppy drives	present	?
  5351 00001C43 751E                    		jnz	short normalfloppydrv ;	yes.
  5352                                  
  5353                                  ; Some ROM BIOSs lie that there are no floppy drives. Lets find out
  5354                                  ; whether it is an old ROM BIOS or a new one
  5355                                  ;
  5356                                  ; WARNING !!!
  5357                                  ;
  5358                                  ; This sequence of code is present in SYSINIT1.ASM also. Any modification
  5359                                  ; here will require an equivalent modification in SYSINIT1.ASM also
  5360                                  
  5361                                  		; 20/12/2022
  5362                                  		;push	ax
  5363                                  		;push	bx
  5364                                  		;push	cx
  5365 00001C45 52                      		push	dx
  5366                                  		;push	di
  5367 00001C46 06                      		push	es
  5368                                  
  5369 00001C47 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  5370 00001C49 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  5371 00001C4B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  5372                                  					; DL = drive number
  5373                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  5374                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  5375                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  5376 00001C4D 7202                    		jc	short _gdskp_error
  5377                                  		;;mov	[cs:flp_drvs], dl
  5378                                  		; 20/12/2022
  5379                                  		; ds = cs
  5380                                  		;mov	[flp_drvs], dl
  5381 00001C4F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl

  5383                                  		; 20/12/2022			
  5384 00001C51 07                      		pop	es

  5387                                  		;pop	cx
  5388                                  		;pop	bx
  5389                                  		;pop	ax
  5390                                  		
  5391 00001C53 720E                    		jc	short normalfloppydrv
  5392                                  					; if error it is an old ROM BIOS
  5393                                  					; so, lets assume that ROM BIOS lied
  5394                                  		; 20/12/2022
  5395                                  		; ds = cs
  5396                                  		;cmp	byte [flp_drvs], 0
  5397                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:flp_drvs], 0 ; number of drvs == 0?
  5398                                  		;jz	short _set_fake_flpdrv

  5414                                  		; 20/12/2022

  5419 00001C5D 880E[131A]              		mov	[fakefloppydrv], cl ; 1
  5420                                  		;mov	byte [fakefloppydrv], 1		
  5421                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:fakefloppydrv], 1

  5428                                  normalfloppydrv:			; yes, bit 0 is 1.

  5460                                  
  5461                                  ; 16/10/2022

  5471                                  ; determine whether we booted from floppy or hard disk...
  5472

  5477 00001C77 7502                    		jnz	short gothrd	; no.

  5482                                  
  5483                                  ; MSDOS 6.0

  5523                                  ; let model_byte, secondary_model_byte be set here!!!
  5524                                  
  5525 00001C81 B4C0                    		mov	ah, 0C0h
  5526 00001C83 CD15                    		int	15h	; SYSTEM - GET CONFIGURATION (XT after 1/10/86,AT mdl 3x9,CONV,XT286,PS)
  5527 00001C85 7215                    		jb	short no_rom_system_conf ; just	use Model_Byte
  5528 00001C87 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0

  5530                                  
  5531                                  ;		; 20/12/2022
  5532                                  ;		; (Programmer's Guide to the AMIBIOS, page 268)
  5533                                  ;		; (https://stanislavs.org/helppc/int_15-c0.html)
  5534                                  ;
  5535                                  ;		INT 15h, ah = C0h - Return System Configuration Parameters (PS/2 only)
  5536                                  ;
  5537                                  ;		on return:
  5538                                  ;		CF = 0 if successful
  5539                                  ;		   = 1 if error
  5540                                  ;		AH = when CF set, 80h for PC & PCjr, 86h for XT
  5541                                  ;	     	    (BIOS after 11/8/82) and AT (BIOS after 1/10/84)
  5542                                  ;
  5543                                  ;		ES:BX = pointer to system descriptor table in ROM of the format:
  5544                                  ;
  5545                                  ;		Offset Size	     Description
  5546                                  ;
  5547                                  ;		  00   word   length of descriptor (8 minimum)
  5548                                  ;		  02   byte   model byte (same as F000:FFFE, not reliable)
  5549                                  ;		  03   byte   secondary model byte
  5550                                  ;		  04   byte   BIOS revision level (zero based)
  5551                                  ;		  05   byte   feature information, see below
  5552                                  ;		  06   dword  reserved
  5553                                  
  5554                                  		; 20/12/2022
  5555                                  		; ds = cs
  5556 00001C8C 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+ROMBIOS_DESC.bios_sd_modelbyte]

  5559                                  					; get/save model byte

  5561 00001C97 A2[B005]                		mov	[secondary_model_byte], al
  5562                                  		;mov	[cs:secondary_model_byte], al

  5577                                  					; AKPORT

  5580                                  ; chip installed at io address 50h and 52h. if we're running

  5669                                  ;				 01 = PrtSc in progress

  6554                                  ;******************************************************************************
  6555                                  ; if more than 2 diskette drives on the system, then it is necessary to remap
  6556                                  ; the bds chain to adjust the logical drive num (drive letter) with greater
  6557                                  ; than two diskette drives
  6558                                  ;
  6559                                  ; new scheme:	if more than 2 disktte drives, first map the bds structure
  6560                                  ;		as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the  drive
  6561                                  ;		letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  6562                                  ;		drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  6563                                  ;		and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  6564                                  ;		drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  6565                                  ;******************************************************************************
  6566                                  
  6567 0000200E 803E[2501]02            		cmp	byte [dsktnum], 2 ; >2 diskette drives
  6568                                  		;jbe	short static_configure ; no - no need for remapping
  6569 00002013 7603                    		jbe	short no_remap
  6570 00002015 E8D500                  		call	remap		; remap	bds chain to adjust driver letters
  6571                                  no_remap:

  6573                                  ; End of drive initialization.

  6575                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6576                                  
  6577                                  ;we now decide, based on the configurations available so far, what
  6578                                  ;code or data we need to keep as a stay resident code. the following table
  6579                                  ;shows the configurations under consideration. they are listed in the order
  6580                                  ;of their current position memory.
  6581                                  ;
  6582                                  ;configuration will be done in two ways:
  6583                                  ;
  6584                                  ;first, we are going to set "static configuration". static configuration will
  6585                                  ;consider from basic configuration to endof96tpi configuration. the result
  6586                                  ;of static configuration will be the address the dynamic configuration will
  6587                                  ;use to start with.
  6588                                  ;
  6589                                  ;secondly, "dynamic configuration" will be performed. dynamic configuration
  6590                                  ;involves possible relocation of code or data. dynamic configuration routine
  6591                                  ;will take care of bdsm tables and at rom fix module thru k09 suspend/resume
  6592                                  ;code individually. after these operation, [dosdatasg] will be set.
  6593                                  ;this will be the place sysinit routine will relocate msdos module for good.
  6594                                  
  6595                                  ; -- begin changed section
  6596                                  ;
  6597                                  ;   1.	 basic configuration for msbio (endfloppy)
  6598                                  ;   2.   end96tpi	; a system that supports "change line error"
  6599                                  ;   3.	 end of bdss	; end of bdss for hard disks
  6600                                  ;   4.	 endatrom	;some of at rom fix module.
  6601                                  ;   5.	 endcmosclockset;supporting program for cmos clock write.
  6602                                  ;   6.	 endk09 	;k09 cmos clock module to handle suspend/resume operation.

  6677                                  ; On certain systems with Western Digital disk controllers, the
  6678                                  ; following detection scheme caused an unpredictable and serious
  6679                                  ; failure. In particular, they've implemented a nonstandard
  6680                                  ; Int13(ah=16h) which reconfigures the hard drive, depending on
  6681                                  ; what happens to be at es:[bx] and other memory locations indexed
  6682                                  ; off of it.
  6683                                  ;
  6684                                  ; Compaq was unable to tell us exactly which kind of systems have
  6685                                  ; the bug, except that they guarantee that the bug was fixed in
  6686                                  ; ROM BIOSs dated 08/04/86 and later. We'll check for the COMPAQ
  6687                                  ; string, and then look for date codes before 08/04/86 to decide
  6688                                  ; when to install the hook.

  6978                                  	; 22/12/2022
  6979                                  	; -----
  6980                                  	;	mov	bx, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.BDS_BPB.BPB_BYTESPERSECTOR]
  6981                                  	;	mov	[cs:md_sectorsize], bx	; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  6982                                  	;	mov	bl, [di+1Fh]	; [di+BDS.fatsiz]
  6983                                  	;				; get size of fat on media
  6984                                  	;	;mov	es:16DEh, bl
  6985                                  	;	mov	[es:fbigfat], bl
  6986                                  	;	mov	cl, [di+8]
  6987                                  	;	mov	ax, [di+17h] ; [di+BDS.BDS_BPB.BPB_HIDDENSECTORS]
  6988                                  	;	;sub	es:16D8h, ax
  6989                                  	;	sub	[es:bios_l], ax	; subtract hidden sectors since we
  6990                                  	;				; need a logical sector number that will
  6991                                  	;				; be used by getclus(diskrd procedure)
  6992                                  	;	mov	ax, [di+19h] ; [di+BDS.BDS_BPB.BPB_HIDDENSECTORS+2]
  6993                                  	;	;sbb	es:16DAh, ax
  6994                                  	;	sbb	[es:bios_h], ax	; subtract upper 16 bits of sector num
  6995                                  	; -----
  6996                                  		
  6997                                  		; 11/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 IO.SYS/IBMBIO.COM
  6998                                  	; -----	; 22/12/2022
  6999                                  		mov	bx, [es:di+6]	; [di+BDS.BDS_BPB.BPB_BYTESPERSECTOR]
  7000                                  		mov	[md_sectorsize], bx ; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  7001                                  		; 11/12/2023 ; *
  7002                                  		mov	bl, [es:di+3Bh]	; [di+BDS.fatsiz] ; *
  7003                                  		;mov	bl, [es:di+1Fh]	; [di+BDS.fatsiz]
  7004                                  					; get size of fat on media
  7005                                  		mov	[fbigfat], bl
  7006                                  		mov	cl, [es:di+8]
  7007                                  		mov	ax, [es:di+17h] ; [di+BDS.BDS_BPB.BPB_HIDDENSECTORS]
  7008                                  		sub	[First_Data_Sector], ax ; *
  7009                                  		;sub	[bios_l], ax	; subtract hidden sectors since we
  7010                                  					; need a logical sector number that will
  7011                                  					; be used by getclus(diskrd procedure)
  7012                                  		mov	ax, [es:di+19h] ; [di+BDS.BDS_BPB.BPB_HIDDENSECTORS+2]
  7013                                  		sbb	[First_Data_Sector+2], ax ; *
  7014                                  		;sbb	[bios_h], ax	; subtract upper 16 bits of sector num
  7015                                  	; ------
  7016                                  
  7017                                  		xor	ch, ch	 ; cx = sectors/cluster
  7018                                  
  7019                                  	; the boot program has left the directory at 0:500h
  7020                                  
  7021                                  		; 11/12/2023 - - Retro DOS v5.0 IBMBIO.COM/IO.SYS
  7022                                  		;push	di
  7023                                  		push	ds
  7024                                  		;xor	di, di
  7025                                  		;mov	ds, di
  7026                                  		xor	bx, bx ; 0
  7027                                  		mov	ds, bx
  7028                                  		mov	bx, [53Ah]
  7029                                  		;mov	bx, ds:53Ah    	; (First cluster of the 2nd dir entry
  7030                                  				   	; of root directory in the buffer at 500h)
  7031                                  		pop	ds
  7032                                  		mov     si, [firstcluster_hw] ; 11/12/2023 
  7033                                  				   	; (32 bit cluster number for FAT32 fs)
  7034                                  		;pop	ds
  7035                                  		;pop	di
  7036                                  
  7037                                  		; 12/12/2023
  7038                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2397h)
  7039                                  		; ...........
  7040                                  		; ds = cs
  7041                                  		mov	al, [fbigfat]
  7042                                  		push	ax              ; (*) save fbigfat flags
  7043                                  		mov	al, [drvfat]
  7044                                  		or	al, [Boot_Drv]
  7045                                  		jnz	short boot_drv_fixed ; hard disk
  7046                                  boot_drv_removable:			; calculate cluster count and set fbig or fbigbig flag
  7047                                  		push	bx              ; for removable drives
  7048                                  		push	cx
  7049                                  		; 28/12/2023
  7050                                  		;push	dx ; (not necessary)
  7051                                  	
  7052                                  		; 12/12/2023
  7053                                  		push	es
  7054                                  		pop	ds
  7055                                  
  7056                                  		mov	ax, [di+0Eh]    ; [di+BDS.totalsecs16]
  7057                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7058                                  		or	ax, ax
  7059                                  		jnz	short prep_totalsecs_ok
  7060                                  		mov	ax, [di+1Bh]    ; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  7061                                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]
  7062                                  prep_totalsecs_ok:
  7063                                  		sub	ax, [di+9]      ; [di+BDS.resectors]
  7064                                  		sbb	dx, 0
  7065                                  		push	ax
  7066                                  		push	dx
  7067                                  		mov	bx, [di+11h]    ; [di+BDS.fatsecs16]
  7068                                  		xor	ax, ax
  7069                                  		or	bx, bx
  7070                                  		jnz	short prep_fatsecs_ok
  7071                                  		mov	bx, [di+1Fh]    ; [di+BDS.fatsecs32]
  7072                                  		mov	ax, [di+21h]
  7073                                  prep_fatsecs_ok:
  7074                                  		mov	cl, [di+0Bh]    ; ax:bx = 32 bit count of FAT sectors
  7075                                  				        ; [di+BDS.fats]
  7076                                  		xor	ch, ch
  7077                                  		mul	cx
  7078                                  		xchg	ax, cx
  7079                                  		mul	bx
  7080                                  		add	cx, dx
  7081                                  		mov	bx, ax          ; cx:bx = total (2*) fat sectors
  7082                                  		pop	dx
  7083                                  		pop	ax              ; dx:ax = totals sectors - reserved sectors
  7084                                  		sub	ax, bx
  7085                                  		sbb	dx, cx          ; dx:ax = data sectors (includes root dir sectors)
  7086                                  		mov	bx, [di+0Ch]    ; [di+BDS.direntries]
  7087                                  		add	bx, 15          ; 16 directory entries per sector
  7088                                  				        ; (round up sector count by adding 15)
  7089                                  		mov	cl, 4           ; (rounded) dir entries / 16
  7090                                  		shr	bx, cl
  7091                                  		xor	cx, cx
  7092                                  		sub	ax, bx
  7093                                  		sbb	dx, cx          ; dx:ax = data sectors (except root directory sectors)
  7094                                  					; (will be used for cluster count calculation)
  7095                                  		mov	cl, [di+8]      ; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  7096                                  
  7097                                  		; 12/12/2023
  7098                                  		push	cs
  7099                                  		pop	ds
  7100                                  
  7101                                  		push	ax              ; 32 bit division (data sectors / sector per cluster)
  7102                                  		mov	ax, dx
  7103                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7104                                  		div	cx
  7105                                  		mov	bx, ax
  7106                                  		pop	ax
  7107                                  		div	cx
  7108                                  		or	bx, bx          ; 32 bit cluster count if bx > 0
  7109                                  		jnz	short set_fbigbig_flag ; too big cluster number
  7110                                  		cmp	ax, 0FFF6h
  7111                                  		jb	short set_fbig_flag
  7112                                  set_fbigbig_flag:
  7113                                  		or	byte [fbigfat], 20h ; FAT32 ; fbigbig
  7114                                  		jmp	short set_fbig_flag_ok
  7115                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7116                                  
  7117                                  set_fbig_flag:
  7118                                  		cmp	ax, 0FF6h       ; 4096-10
  7119                                  				        ; is this 16-bit fat?
  7120                                  		jb	short set_fbig_flag_ok ; no, small fat
  7121                                  		or	byte [fbigfat], 40h ; FAT16 ; fbig
  7122                                  set_fbig_flag_ok:
  7123                                  		; 28/12/2023
  7124                                  		;pop	dx
  7125                                  		pop	cx
  7126                                  		pop	bx
  7127                                  boot_drv_fixed:
  7128                                  		xor	di, di
  7129                                  
  7130                                  		; cx = sectors/cluster
  7131                                  		; si:bx = first cluster
  7132                                  		; di = 0
  7133                                  
  7134                                  		; ...........
  7135                                  loadit:
  7136                                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  7137                                  		;mov	ax, 544h	; 11/12/2023 - PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
  7138                                  		;;mov	ax, 46Dh	; sysinit segment
  7139                                  		mov	es, ax
  7140                                  		mov	es, [es:CURRENTDOSLOCATION] ; 09/12/2022
  7141                                  		;mov	es, [es:271h]
  7142                                  
  7143                                  		call	getclus		; read cluster at ES:DI (DI is updated)
  7144                                  
  7145                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7146                                  
  7147                                  		; 13/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM
  7148                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2431h)
  7149                                  
  7150                                  		;test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 20h ; fbigbig ; FAT32 fs flag
  7151                                  		test	byte [fbigfat], 20h ; fbigbig ; FAT32 fs flag
  7152                                  		jz	short iseof
  7153                                  
  7154                                  eofbigbig:	; si:bx = 32 bit cluster number
  7155                                  		cmp	si, 0FFFh
  7156                                  		jnz	short iseofx
  7157                                  		cmp	bx, 0FFF7h
  7158                                  		jmp	short iseofx
  7159                                  
  7160                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7161                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7162                                  iseof:
  7163                                  		;;test	byte [cs:fbigfat], fbig
  7164                                  		;test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h ; fbig
  7165                                  		; 12/12/2023
  7166                                  		; ds = cs
  7167                                  		test	byte [fbigfat], 40h ; fbig
  7168                                  		jnz	short eofbig
  7169                                  		cmp	bx, 0FF7h
  7170                                  		jmp	short iseofx
  7171                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7172                                  
  7173                                  eofbig:
  7174                                  		cmp	bx, 0FFF7h
  7175                                  iseofx:
  7176                                  		jb	short loadit	; keep loading until cluster = eof
  7177                                  
  7178                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7179                                  
  7180                                  		; 19/04/2024
  7181                                  		; 28/12/2023
  7182                                  		pop	ax		; (*) restore fbigfat flags
  7183                                  					; (after loading DOS kernel)
  7184                                  		; 06/04/2024
  7185                                  		;mov	[cs:fbigfat], al
  7186                                  		mov	[fbigfat], al
  7187                                  %endif

  7203                                  
  7204                                  ; Following are subroutines to support resident device driver initialization
  7205                                  ;
  7206                                  ;M011 -- note:  deleted setup_bdsms and reset_bdsms here
  7207                                  
  7208                                  ;	M035 -- begin changed section
  7209                                  
  7210                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7211                                  ; module name: remap
  7212                                  ;
  7213                                  ; descriptive name: all the code for himem that could be separated from msbio
  7214                                  ;
  7215                                  ; function:  remap the bds chain to adjusted logical drive numbers (drive
  7216                                  ;	     letters) if more than two diskette drives on the system.
  7217                                  ;
  7218                                  ;     scheme:  if more than 2 diskette drives, first map the bds structure
  7219                                  ;	       as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the drive
  7220                                  ;	       letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  7221                                  ;	       drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  7222                                  ;	       and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  7223                                  ;	       drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  7224                                  
  7225                                  ; input:       none
  7226                                  ; exit:	drive letters have been remapped in bds chain
  7227                                  ; exit error:  none
  7228                                  ; called from: msinit
  7229                                  ;
  7230                                  ; notes:  this function  will be called only if more than 2 diskettes are
  7231                                  ;	  found in the system
  7232                                  ;	  this function assumes that there are no more than 26 drives assigned
  7233                                  ;	    this is guaranteed by the code that creates bdss for partitions
  7234                                  ;	  this function assumes that the first entries in the chain are
  7235                                  ;	   floppy drives, and all the rest are hard drives
  7236                                  ;	  will alter the boot drive if necessary to reflect remapping
  7237                                  ;
  7238                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7239                                  
  7240                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7241                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7242                                  		; 15/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM
  7243                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2464h)
  7244                                  		; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:1D9Eh)
  7245                                  
  7246                                  remap:		; proc near
  7247                                  
  7248                                  		; 15/12/2023
  7249                                  		; ds = cs
  7250                                  		;mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; get first bds
  7251 000020ED 8B3E[1901]              		mov	di, [start_bds]
  7252                                  
  7253                                  ; search for 1st fixed disk physical drive num
  7254                                  
  7255                                  drive_loop:
  7256 000020F1 807D0480                		cmp	byte [di+4], 80h ; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7257                                  					; first	hard disk??
  7258 000020F5 7409                    		jz	short fdrv_found ; yes,	continue
  7259 000020F7 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  7260                                  					; get next bds,	assume segment
  7261 000020F9 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, -1 ; 0FFFFh	; last bds?
  7262 000020FC 75F3                    		jnz	short drive_loop ; loop	if not
  7263 000020FE EB49                    		jmp	short rmap_exit	; yes, no hard drive on	system
  7264                                  
  7265                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7266                                  ;first disk drive bds, now change the logical drive num to 2 and the subsequent
  7267                                  ;logical drive nums to 3, 4, 5 etc.
  7268                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7269                                  
  7270                                  fdrv_found:
  7271 00002100 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; start	with logical drv num=2
  7272                                  fdrv_loop:
  7273 00002102 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7274 00002105 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  7275                                  					; ds:di--> next	bds
  7276                                  		;inc	al		; set num for next drive
  7277                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7278 00002107 40                      		inc	ax
  7279 00002108 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last hard drive ?
  7280 0000210B 75F5                    		jnz	short fdrv_loop	; no - assign more disk drives
  7281                                  
  7282                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7283                                  ; now, rescan and find bds of 3rd floppy drive and assign next drive letter
  7284                                  ; in al to 3rd. if the current drive letter is past z, then do not allocate
  7285                                  ; any more.
  7286                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7287                                  
  7288                                  		;mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; [start_bds]
  7289                                  		; 15/12/2023
  7290 0000210D 8B3E[1901]              		mov	di, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7291 00002111 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  7292                                  					; ds:di-->bds2
  7293                                  		;mov	ah, [cs:dsktnum] ; get number of floppies to remap
  7294 00002113 8A26[2501]              		mov	ah, [dsktnum]
  7295 00002117 80EC02                  		sub	ah, 2		; adjust for a:	& b:
  7296                                  remap_loop1:
  7297 0000211A 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  7298                                  					; set new num to next floppy
  7299 0000211C 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7300 0000211F FEC0                    		inc	al		; new number for next floppy
  7301 00002121 FECC                    		dec	ah		; count down extra floppies
  7302 00002123 75F5                    		jnz	short remap_loop1
  7303                                  
  7304                                  ; now we've got to adjust the boot drive if we reassigned it
  7305                                  
  7306                                  		; 15/12/2023
  7307                                  		;mov	al, [cs:drvfat]
  7308 00002125 A0[FC19]                		mov	al, [drvfat]
  7309 00002128 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; is it	a: or b: ?
  7310 0000212A 721D                    		jb	short rmap_exit
  7311                                  		;sub	al, [cs:dsktnum]
  7312 0000212C 2A06[2501]              		sub	al, [dsktnum]	; is it one of the other floppies?
  7313 00002130 7204                    		jb	short remap_boot_flop ;	brif so
  7314                                  
  7315                                  ; we've got to remap the boot hard drive
  7316                                  ; subtract the number of EXTRA floppies from it
  7317                                  
  7318 00002132 0402                    		add	al, 2		; bootdrv -= (dsktnum-2)
  7319 00002134 EB04                    		jmp	short remap_change_boot_drv
  7320                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7321                                  
  7322                                  ; we've got to remap the boot floppy.
  7323                                  ; add the number of hard drive partitions to it
  7324                                  
  7325                                  remap_boot_flop:
  7326                                  		;add	al, [cs:drvmax]	; bootdrv += (drvmax-dsktnum)
  7327                                  		; 15/12/2023
  7328 00002136 0206[7500]              		add	al, [drvmax]
  7329                                  remap_change_boot_drv:			
  7330                                  		;mov	[cs:drvfat], al ; alter msdos.sys load drive
  7331 0000213A A2[FC19]                		mov	[drvfat], al
  7332 0000213D FEC0                    		inc	al
  7333 0000213F 1E                      		push	ds
  7334 00002140 BFD904                  		mov	di, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  7335                                  		;mov	di, 544h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
  7336                                  		;;mov	di, 46Dh	; SYSINIT segment
  7337 00002143 8EDF                    		mov	ds, di
  7338 00002145 A2[9602]                		mov	[DEFAULTDRIVE], al
  7339                                  		;mov	ds:296h, al	; [SYSINIT+DEFAULT_DRIVE]
  7340                                  					; pass it to sysinit as	well
  7341 00002148 1F                      		pop	ds ; ds = cs
  7342                                  rmap_exit:
  7343 00002149 C3                      		retn
  7344                                  
  7345                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7346                                  
  7347                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7348                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 -actual-)
  7349                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21 -draft-)
  7350                                  ; 02/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3)	
  7351                                  ; 19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
  7352                                  ;**************************************************
  7353                                  ; getboot - get the boot sector for a hard disk
  7354                                  ;
  7355                                  ; Reads the boot sector from a specified drive into
  7356                                  ; a buffer at the top of memory.
  7357                                  ;
  7358                                  ; dl = int13 drive number to read boot sector for
  7359                                  ;**************************************************
  7360                                  
  7361                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7362                                  bootbias equ 200h
  7363                                  
  7364                                  getboot:	; proc near
  7365                                  
  7366                                  		; 15/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 
  7367                                  		;	 (Modified PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM/IO.SYS
  7368                                  		; ds = cs
  7369                                  		
  7370                                  		; 08/04/2018
  7371                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 (IBMBIO.COM, IBMDOS 2.1)
  7372                                  		; 28/03/2018 - MSDOS 6.0 - MSINIT.ASM, 1991
  7373                                  		; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7374                                  		;	      (disassembled IO.SYS code of MSDOS 5.0)
  7375                                  
  7376                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:init_bootseg] ; 17/10/2022
  7377                                  		; 15/12/2023
  7378 0000214A A1[061A]                		mov	ax, [init_bootseg]
  7379 0000214D 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7380                                  
  7381                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7382 0000214F BB0002                  		mov	bx, bootbias ; 200h
  7383                                  		;mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7384                                  					; load BX, ES:BX is where sector goes
  7385 00002152 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7386 00002155 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  7387 00002157 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
  7388 0000215A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7389                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7390                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7391                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7392 0000215C 7209                    		jc	short erret
  7393                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7394 0000215E 26813EFE0355AA          		cmp	word [es:bootbias+1FEh], 0AA55h
  7395                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:3FEh, 0AA55h ; [es:bootbias+1FEh]
  7396                                  					; Dave Litton magic word?
  7397 00002165 7401                    		jz	short norm_ret	; yes
  7398                                  erret:
  7399 00002167 F9                      		stc
  7400                                  norm_ret:
  7401 00002168 C3                      		retn
  7402                                  
  7403                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7404                                  
  7405                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 
  7406                                  
  7407                                  ;***************************************************************************
  7408                                  ;   sethard - generate bpb for a variable sized hard file. ibm has a
  7409                                  ;   partitioned hard file; we must read physical sector 0 to determine where
  7410                                  ;   our own logical sectors start. we also read in our boot sector to
  7411                                  ;   determine version number
  7412                                  ;
  7413                                  ;   inputs:	dl is rom drive number (80...)
  7414                                  ;		bh is partition number (0....) 
  7415                                  ;		ds:di points to bds
  7416                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear -> bpb is filled in
  7417                                  ;		carry set   -> bpb is left uninitialized due to error
  7418                                  ;	trashes (at least) si, cx
  7419                                  ;	MUST PRESERVE ES:!!!!
  7420                                  ;***************************************************************************
  7421                                  
  7422                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM
  7423                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:24E9h)
  7424                                  
  7425                                  sethard:	; proc near
  7426                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7427                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  7428 00002169 57                      		push	di
  7429 0000216A 53                      		push	bx
  7430                                  		;push	ds  ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA ; 12/08/2023
  7431 0000216B 06                      		push	es
  7432 0000216C 885D05                  		mov	[di+5],	bl	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7433 0000216F 885504                  		mov	[di+4],	dl	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7434                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7435 00002172 804D3F01                		or	byte [di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
  7436                                  		;or	byte [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7437                                  					; fnon_removable
  7438 00002176 C6453E05                		mov	byte [di+3Eh], 5 ; PCDOS 7.1
  7439                                  		;mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7440                                  					; ffHardFile
  7441 0000217A C606[081A]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit FAT
  7442 0000217F 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; partition number
  7443 00002181 52                      		push	dx
  7444 00002182 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7445 00002184 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7446                                  					; DL = drive number
  7447                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7448                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7449                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7450                                  		;inc	dh
  7451                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
  7452 00002186 88F2                    		mov	dl, dh
  7453 00002188 B600                    		mov	dh, 0
  7454 0000218A 42                      		inc	dx
  7455                                  		;mov	[di+15h], dh	; [di+BDS.heads] ; get number of heads
  7456 0000218B 895515                  		mov	[di+15h], dx
  7457 0000218E 5A                      		pop	dx
  7458 0000218F 7253                    		jc	short setret	; error	if no hard disk
  7459                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7460                                  		;jc	short setret_j
  7461                                  		
  7462 00002191 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7463 00002194 884D13                  		mov	[di+13h], cl	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7464 00002197 52                      		push	dx		; save partition number
  7465 00002198 E8AFFF                  		call	getboot
  7466 0000219B 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore partition number
  7467 0000219C 7246                    		jc	short setret
  7468                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7469                                  		;jnc	short chk_act_part
  7470                                  ;setret_j:
  7471                                  		;jmp	setret
  7472                                  
  7473                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  7474                                  chk_act_part:
  7475 0000219E 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx ; 0
  7476                                  		;;mov	[cs:ep_start_sector], bx
  7477                                  		;;mov	[cs:ep_start_sector+2], bx
  7478                                  		;mov	[cs:ep_hidden_secs], bx
  7479                                  		;mov	[cs:ep_hidden_secs+2], bx
  7480                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7481                                  		; ds = cs
  7482                                  		; 20/12/2023
  7483                                  		;mov	[ep_start_sector], bx
  7484                                  		;mov	[ep_start_sector+2], bx
  7485 000021A0 891E[0622]              		mov	[ep_hidden_secs], bx
  7486 000021A4 891E[0822]              		mov	[ep_hidden_secs+2], bx
  7487                                  		
  7488 000021A8 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7489                                  
  7490                                  ; The first 'active' partition is 00, the second is 01....
  7491                                  ;   then the remainder of the 'primary' but non-active partitions
  7492                                  
  7493                                  act_part:
  7494 000021AB 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h ; is the partition active?
  7495 000021B0 740B                    		jz	short no_act	; no
  7496                                  ; 16/12/2023
  7497                                  %if 0		
  7498                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7499                                  		; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4, 6, 0Bh, 0Ch, 0Eh
  7500                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12
  7501                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  7502                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4	; FAT16 CHS (<= 32MB)
  7503                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  7504                                  		
  7505                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  7506                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 0Bh ; FAT32 CHS
  7507                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  7508                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 0Ch ; FAT32 LBA
  7509                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  7510                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 0Eh ; FAT16 LBA
  7511                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  7512                                  
  7513                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6	; FAT16 BIG CHS (> 32MB)
  7514                                  		jnz	short no_act
  7515                                  ;%else
  7516                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7517                                  		mov	al, [es:bx]	 ; partition type
  7518                                  
  7519                                  		; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4, 6, 0Bh, 0Ch, 0Eh
  7520                                  		cmp	al, 1		; FAT12
  7521                                  		je	short got_good_act
  7522                                  		cmp	al, 4		; FAT16 CHS (<= 32MB)
  7523                                  		je	short got_good_act
  7524                                  		
  7525                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  7526                                  		cmp	al, 0Bh		; FAT32 CHS
  7527                                  		je	short got_good_act
  7528                                  		cmp	al, 0Ch		; FAT32 LBA
  7529                                  		je	short got_good_act
  7530                                  		cmp	al, 0Eh		; FAT16 LBA
  7531                                  		je	short got_good_act
  7532                                  
  7533                                  		cmp	al, 6		; FAT16 BIG CHS (> 32MB)
  7534                                  		jne	short no_act
  7535                                  %endif		
  7536                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
  7537                                  		; check if it is a primary dos partition
  7538                                  
  7539 000021B2 E83300                  		call	chk_partition_type
  7540 000021B5 7506                    		jne	short no_act
  7541                                  
  7542                                  got_good_act:				; 11/08/2023
  7543 000021B7 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition #?
  7544                                  					; (0 = first primary dos or active partition)
  7545 000021B9 744F                    		jz	short set2	; WE GOT THE ONE WANTED!!
  7546 000021BB FECE                    		dec	dh		; count	down
  7547                                  no_act:					
  7548 000021BD 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7549 000021C0 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7550                                  					; last entry done?
  7551 000021C4 75E5                    		jnz	short act_part	; no, process next entry
  7552                                  
  7553 000021C6 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7554                                  					; restore original value of bx
  7555                                  
  7556                                  ; Now scan the non-active partitions
  7557                                  
  7558                                  get_primary:
  7559 000021C9 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h
  7560 000021CE 750B                    		jnz	short not_prim	; we've already scanned
  7561                                  					; the ACTIVE ones
  7562                                  ; 16/12/2023
  7563                                  %if 0
  7564                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7565                                  		; see if partitiontype == 1, 4, 6, 0Bh, 0Ch, 0Eh
  7566                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1	; FAT12
  7567                                  		jz	short got_prim
  7568                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4	; FAT16 CHS (<= 32MB)
  7569                                  		jz	short got_prim
  7570                                  
  7571                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  7572                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 0Bh ; FAT32 CHS
  7573                                  		jz	short got_prim
  7574                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 0Ch ; FAT32 LBA
  7575                                  		jz	short got_prim
  7576                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 0Eh ; FAT16 LBA
  7577                                  		jz	short got_prim
  7578                                  
  7579                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6	; FAT16 BIG CHS (> 32MB)
  7580                                  		jnz	short not_prim
  7581                                  ;%else
  7582                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7583                                  		mov	al, [es:bx]	 ; partition type
  7584                                  
  7585                                  		; see if partitiontype == 1, 4, 6, 0Bh, 0Ch, 0Eh
  7586                                  		cmp	al, 1		; FAT12
  7587                                  		je	short got_prim
  7588                                  		cmp	al, 4		; FAT16 CHS (<= 32MB)
  7589                                  		je	short got_prim
  7590                                  		
  7591                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  7592                                  		cmp	al, 0Bh		; FAT32 CHS
  7593                                  		je	short got_prim
  7594                                  		cmp	al, 0Ch		; FAT32 LBA
  7595                                  		je	short got_prim
  7596                                  		cmp	al, 0Eh		; FAT16 LBA
  7597                                  		je	short got_prim
  7598                                  
  7599                                  		cmp	al, 6		; FAT16 BIG CHS (> 32MB)
  7600                                  		jne	short not_prim
  7601                                  %endif
  7602                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
  7603                                  		; check if it is a primary dos partition
  7604                                  
  7605 000021D0 E81500                  		call	chk_partition_type
  7606 000021D3 7506                    		jne	short not_prim
  7607                                  
  7608                                  got_prim:
  7609 000021D5 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition?
  7610 000021D7 7431                    		jz	short set2
  7611 000021D9 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7612                                  not_prim:
  7613 000021DB 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7614 000021DE 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7615 000021E2 75E5                    		jnz	short get_primary ; loop till we've gone through table
  7616                                  setret:					
  7617 000021E4 F9                      		stc			; error	return
  7618 000021E5 E9C703                  		jmp	ret_hard_err
  7619                                  
  7620                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7621                                  		
  7622                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
  7623                                  
  7624                                  chk_partition_type:
  7625                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7626 000021E8 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]	 ; partition type
  7627                                  
  7628                                  		; see if partitiontype == 1, 4, 6, 0Bh, 0Ch, 0Eh
  7629 000021EB 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		; FAT12
  7630 000021ED 7412                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  7631 000021EF 3C04                    		cmp	al, 4		; FAT16 CHS (<= 32MB)
  7632 000021F1 740E                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  7633                                  		
  7634                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  7635 000021F3 3C0B                    		cmp	al, 0Bh		; FAT32 CHS
  7636 000021F5 740A                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  7637 000021F7 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; FAT32 LBA
  7638 000021F9 7406                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  7639 000021FB 3C0E                    		cmp	al, 0Eh		; FAT16 LBA
  7640 000021FD 7402                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  7641                                  
  7642 000021FF 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; FAT16 BIG CHS (> 32MB)
  7643                                  chk_ptype_retn:
  7644                                  		; zf = 1 -> primary DOS partition
  7645                                  		; zf = 0 -> not a primary DOS partition
  7646 00002201 C3                      		retn
  7647                                  
  7648                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7649                                  
  7650                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
  7651                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:25B6h)
  7652                                  ep_start_sector:
  7653 00002202 00000000                		dd 0
  7654 00002206 00000000                ep_hidden_secs:	dd 0
  7655                                  
  7656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7657                                  
  7658                                  ;  until we get the real logical boot record and get the bpb,
  7659                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be used instead of BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  7660                                  ;  for the convenience of the computation.
  7661                                  ;
  7662                                  ;  at the end of this procedure, if a bpb information is gotten from
  7663                                  ;  the valid boot record, then we are going to use those bpb information
  7664                                  ;  without change.
  7665                                  ;
  7666                                  ;  otherwise, if (hidden sectors + total sectors) <= a word, then we will move
  7667                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS (low) to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and zero out
  7668                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS entry to make it a conventional bpb format.
  7669                                  
  7670                                  set2:		
  7671                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7672                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment (0070h)
  7673 0000220A 8816[091A]              		mov	[rom_drv_num], dl
  7674                                  		;mov	[cs:rom_drv_num], dl
  7675                                  			; save the rom bios drive number we are handling now.
  7676 0000220E 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]	; hidden sectors (start	sector)
  7677 00002212 268B5706                		mov	dx, [es:bx+6]
  7678                                  
  7679                                  ; decrement the sector count by 1 to make it zero based. exactly 64k
  7680                                  ; sectors should be allowed	
  7681                                  
  7682 00002216 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  7683 00002219 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  7684 0000221C 26034708                		add	ax, [es:bx+8]	; sectors in partition
  7685 00002220 2613570A                		adc	dx, [es:bx+10]
  7686 00002224 7305                    		jnc	short okdrive
  7687 00002226 800E[081A]80            		or	byte [fbigfat], 80h ; ftoobig
  7688                                  
  7689                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM
  7690                                  		;;;
  7691                                  okdrive:
  7692                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ep_hidden_secs]
  7693                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:ep_hidden_secs+2]
  7694                                  		; ds = cs
  7695 0000222B 0306[0622]              		add	ax, [ep_hidden_secs]
  7696 0000222F 1316[0822]              		adc	dx, [ep_hidden_secs+2]
  7697 00002233 7305                    		jnc	short okdrive_1
  7698 00002235 800E[081A]80            		or	byte [fbigfat], 80h ; ftoobig
  7699                                  okdrive_1:
  7700 0000223A 26803F0C                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 0Ch ; FAT32 LBA partition ID
  7701 0000223E 7418                    		je	short set_lba_flag
  7702 00002240 26803F0E                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 0Eh ; FAT16 LBA partition ID
  7703 00002244 7412                    		je	short set_lba_flag

  7705 00002249 730D                    		jnb	short set_lba_flag ; set LBA r/w flag

  7707 0000224E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7708 00002250 F77515                  		div	word [di+15h]

  7710                                  					;  set LBA r/w flag
  7711 00002256 7204                     		jb	short set3
  7712                                  set_lba_flag:
  7713 00002258 804D4004                                or	byte [di+40h], 4 ; fLBArw ; LBA r/w flag
  7714                                  		;;;
  7715                                  ;okdrive:
  7716                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7717                                  set3:		
  7718                                  		;mov	ax, [es:bx+4]
  7719                                  		;mov	[di+17h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  7720                                  		;			; BPB_HIDDENSECTORS = p->partitionbegin
  7721                                  		;mov	ax, [es:bx+6]
  7722                                  		;mov	[di+19h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]

  7724                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM
  7725                                  		;;;
  7726 0000225C 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]	; start sector (LBA) of the partition
  7727 00002260 268B5706                		mov	dx, [es:bx+6]
  7728                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ep_hidden_secs]
  7729                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:ep_hidden_secs+2]

  7735 0000226F 895519                  		mov	[di+19h], dx	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  7736 00002272 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax ; 0
  7737 00002274 89457B                  		mov	[di+7Bh], ax	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7738 00002277 89450E                  		mov	[di+0Eh], ax	; [di+BDS.totalsec16]	
  7739                                  		;;;
  7740                                  
  7741 0000227A 268B570A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+10]	; # of sectors (high)
  7742 0000227E 268B4708                		mov	ax, [es:bx+8]	; # of sectors (low)

  7744 00002285 89451B                  		mov	[di+1Bh], ax	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  7745                                  					; bpb->maxsec =	p->partitionlength
  7746                                  		;cmp	dx, 0
  7747                                  		;ja	short okdrive_1
  7748                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7749 00002288 09D2                    		or	dx, dx
  7750 0000228A 7505                    		jnz	short set3_read

  7752                                  		;jb	short setret	; return -1;
  7753 0000228F 7264                    		jb	short set3_err
  7754                                  ;okdrive_1:
  7755                                  		; 16/12/2023
  7756                                  set3_read:
  7757 00002291 8B5519                  		mov	dx, [di+19h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  7758 00002294 8B4517                  		mov	ax, [di+17h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  7759 00002297 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; boot sector number - for mini	disk
  7760                                  					; usually equal	to the # of sec/trk.
  7761 00002299 8A5D13                  		mov	bl, [di+13h]	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7762 0000229C 50                      		push	ax
  7763 0000229D 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  7764 0000229F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7765 000022A1 F7F3                    		div	bx		; (sectors)dx:ax / (BDS.secpertrack)bx =
  7766                                  					; (track)temp_h:ax + (sector)dx
  7767                                  ; 16/12/2023
  7768                                  %if 0
  7769                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7770                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_h], ax
  7771                                  		; 12/08/2023 (ds=cs)
  7772                                  		mov	[temp_h], ax
  7773                                  		pop	ax
  7774                                  		div	bx
  7775                                  		mov	cl, dl
  7776                                  		inc	cl
  7777                                  		xor	bx, bx
  7778                                  		mov	bl, [di+15h]	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7779                                  		push	ax
  7780                                  		xor	dx, dx
  7781                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:temp_h]
  7782                                  		mov	ax, [temp_h] ; 12/08/2023
  7783                                  		div	bx
  7784                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_h], ax
  7785                                  		mov	[temp_h], ax ; 12/08/2023
  7786                                  		pop	ax
  7787                                  		div	bx		; dl is head, ax is cylinder
  7788                                  		; 12/08/2023 (ds=cs)
  7789                                  		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
  7790                                  		;cmp	word [cs:temp_h], 0
  7791                                  		ja	short setret_brdg ; exceeds the	limit of int 13h
  7792                                  		cmp	ax, 1024
  7793                                  		ja	short setret_brdg ; exceeds the	limit of int 13h
  7794                                  			; Retro DOS v3.2 note by Erdogan Tan - 28/07/2019
  7795                                  			; **MSDOS code accepts if ax = 1024 but it is nonsense here
  7796                                  			; ('ja' must be 'jnb')
  7797                                  okdrive_2:
  7798                                   		; 28/07/2019
  7799                                  ; dl is head.
  7800                                  ; ax is cylinder
  7801                                  ; cl is sector number (assume less than 2**6 = 64 for int 13h)
  7802                                  
  7803                                  ;*** for mini disks ***
  7804                                  
  7805                                  		cmp	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7806                                  					; check for mini disk
  7807                                  		jnz	short oknotmini	; not mini disk.
  7808                                  		add	ax, [di+49h]	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7809                                  					; set the physical track number

  8193                                  ; we have a valid boot sector. use the bpb in it to build the
  8194                                  ; bpb in bios. it is assumed that only
  8195                                  ;	BDS_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER

  8201                                  ; into the bpb in bds table, and also set the boot serial number, volume id,
  8202                                  ; and system id according to the boot record.
  8203                                  ; for the non_fat system, don't need to set the other value. so just do goodret.

  8226                                  		; (***) NOTE: 28 bytes of FAT16/FAT12 boot sector from offset 36
  8227                                  		; have been moved to offset 64 (see label 'check_1_ok:' above)

  8725                                  		; 12/08/2023

  8727 000024E9 8B4C04                  		mov	cx, [si+4]
  8728                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:si+4]	; ch = number of sectors per cluster
  8729                                  					; cl = log base 2 of ch
  8730 000024EC 8B5406                  		mov	dx, [si+6]
  8731                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:si+6]	; dx = number of root dir entries
  8732                                  
  8733                                  ; now calculate size of fat table
  8734                                  
  8735 000024EF 89550C                  		mov	[di+0Ch], dx	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  8736                                  					; save number of (root)	dir entries
  8737 000024F2 8B551D                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]

  8739 000024F8 886D08                  		mov	[di+8],	ch	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  8740                                  					; save sectors per cluster
  8741                                  		
  8742                                  		; 17/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8743 000024FB F606[081A]60            		test	byte [fbigfat], 60h ; fbig+fbigbig ; FAT16 or FAT32
  8744                                  		; 11/09/2023
