 10567                                  ;============================================================================
 10568                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
 10569                                  ;============================================================================
 10570                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10571                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 10572                                  
 10573                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
 10574                                  
 10575                                  ; 30/12/2022
 10576                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
 10577                                  
 10578                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
 10579                                   
 10580                                  ; 02/10/2022
 10581                                  
 10582                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
 10583                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10584                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 10585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10586                                  
 10587                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
 10588 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
 10589 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
 10590                                  
 10591                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10592                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
 10593                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10594                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
 10595                                  
 10596                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10597                                  
 10598                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10599                                  ; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 10600                                  
 10601                                  ;************************************************************************
 10602                                  ;*									*
 10603                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
 10604                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
 10605                                  ;*									*
 10606                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
 10607                                  ;*									*
 10608                                  ;************************************************************************
 10609                                  
 10610                                  	; 20/09/2023	
 10611                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 10612                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
 10613                                  
 10614                                  _seg_reinit:
 10615 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 10616                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
 10617                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
 10618 00000037 BF[0406]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
 10619                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
 10620                                  		; 10/08/2023
 10621 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
 10622                                  _seg_reinit_1:
 10623 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
 10624 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
 10625 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
 10626 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
 10627                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10628                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
 10629                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
 10630 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
 10631                                  
 10632 00000046 CB                      		retf
 10633                                  
 10634                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10635                                  
 10636                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10637                                  
 10638                                  ;************************************************************************
 10639                                  ;*									*
 10640                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
 10641                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
 10642                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
 10643                                  ;*									*
 10644                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
 10645                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
 10646                                  ;*									*
 10647                                  ;************************************************************************
 10648                                  
 10649                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10650                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
 10651 00000047 56                      		push	si
 10652 00000048 50                      		push	ax
 10653 00000049 51                      		push	cx
 10654 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
 10655 0000004B 57                      		push	di
 10656 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
 10657 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
 10658 0000004E 06                      		push	es
 10659 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
 10660 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
 10661 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
 10662                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
 10663                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 10664 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 10665                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
 10666 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
 10667                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
 10668 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
 10669 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
 10670 00000061 8826[8004]              		mov	[printdev], ah
 10671                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
 10672 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
 10673 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
 10674 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
 10675 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
 10676 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
 10677                                  		; 17/10/2022
 10678 00000079 81FE[6F05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
 10679                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 10680                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
 10681                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
 10682 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
 10683                                  
 10684                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
 10685                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
 10686                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
 10687                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
 10688                                  ;
 10689                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
 10690                                  ;
 10691                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
 10692                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
 10693                                  ;	  it has been used.
 10694                                  ;
 10695                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
 10696                                  
 10697                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10698                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
 10699 0000007F C706[9C04]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
 10700 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
 10701 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
 10702 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
 10703                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
 10704                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
 10705 0000008E 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
 10706 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
 10707                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
 10708                                  no_sector32_mapping:
 10709 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
 10710 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
 10711 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 10712 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
 10713 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
 10714 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 10715 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 10716 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
 10717 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
 10718 000000AA FC                      		cld
 10719                                  		; 17/10/2022
 10720 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
 10721                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
 10722 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
 10723 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 10724                                  already_got_ah_status:
 10725                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
 10726                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 10727                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
 10728 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 10729                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
 10730 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 10731 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
 10732                                  					; mark operation complete
 10733 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
 10734 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
 10735 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
 10736 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
 10737 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
 10738 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
 10739 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
 10740 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
 10741 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
 10742                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
 10743                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
 10744 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
 10745 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
 10746                                  
 10747                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
 10748                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 10749                                  bc_retf:
 10750 000000CA CB                      		retf
 10751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10752                                  
 10753                                  command_error:				
 10754 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
 10755 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
 10756                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10757                                  ; 01/05/2019
 10758                                  
 10759                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10760                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
 10761                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
 10762                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
 10763                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
 10764                                  ; high.
 10765                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10766                                  
 10767                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
 10768                                  
 10769                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 10770                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
 10771                                  		; 15/10/2022
 10772                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
 10773                                  
 10774 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
 10775                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
 10776                                  		
 10777                                  
 10778                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10779                                  
 10780                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
 10781                                  
 10782                                  bc_cmderr:				
 10783 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
 10784                                  					; unknown command error
 10785                                  
 10786                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10787                                  
 10788                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
 10789                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
 10790                                  
 10791                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
 10792                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
 10793                                  
 10794                                  bc_err_cnt:	
 10795                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
 10796                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10797 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 10798 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
 10799                                  					; # of successful i/o's
 10800 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
 10801 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
 10802 000000E2 C3                      		retn
 10803                                  
 10804                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10805                                  
 10806                                  ;Bios_Code ends
 10807                                  
 10808                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10809                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 10810                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10811                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10812                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10813                                  
 10814                                  ; 30/04/2019
 10815                                  
 10816                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
 10817                                  
 10818                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
 10819                                  
 10820                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 10821                                  
 10822                                  ;************************************************************************
 10823                                  ;*									*
 10824                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
 10825                                  ;*									*
 10826                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
 10827                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
 10828                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
 10829                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
 10830                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
 10831                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
 10832                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
 10833                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
 10834                                  ;*									*
 10835                                  ;************************************************************************
 10836                                  
 10837                                  		; 20/09/2023
 10838                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
 10839                                  		; 13/12/2022
 10840 000000E3 00                      		db 0
 10841                                  
 10842                                  		; 13/12/2022
 10843 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
 10844                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
 10845 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
 10846                                  					; 00 init
 10847 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
 10848 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
 10849 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
 10850                                  					; 03
 10851 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
 10852                                  					; 04
 10853 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
 10854                                  					; 05
 10855 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
 10856 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
 10857                                  					; 07
 10858 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
 10859                                  					; 08
 10860 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
 10861 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
 10862                                  con_table_end:
 10863 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
 10864                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
 10865 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
 10866 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10867 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10868 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
 10869 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
 10870                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
 10871 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
 10872                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
 10873 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10874 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
 10875 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
 10876 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
 10877 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
 10878 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
 10879 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
 10880 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
 10881 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
 10882 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
 10883 0000011C [9402]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
 10884 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
 10885 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
 10886 00000122 [C202]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
 10887 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
 10888 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
 10889 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
 10890 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
 10891 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
 10892 0000012E [F702]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
 10893                                  prn_table_end:
 10894 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
 10895                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
 10896 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
 10897 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10898 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10899 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
 10900 00000139 [1203]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
 10901 0000013B [3703]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
 10902 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10903 0000013F [7803]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
 10904 00000141 [7F03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
 10905 00000143 [7F03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
 10906 00000145 [5703]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
 10907                                  aux_table_end:
 10908 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
 10909                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
 10910 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
 10911 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 10912 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 10913 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
 10914 00000150 [E404]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
 10915 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
 10916 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 10917 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
 10918 00000158 [E503]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
 10919 0000015A [E503]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
 10920                                  tim_table_end:
 10921                                  
 10922                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10923                                  
 10924                                  ;************************************************************************
 10925                                  ;*									*
 10926                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
 10927                                  ;*									*
 10928                                  ;************************************************************************
 10929                                  
 10930                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
 10931                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
 10932 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
 10933                                  con_loop:				
 10934 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
 10935 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
 10936 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
 10937                                  con_exit:				
 10938 00000164 F8                      		clc
 10939 00000165 C3                      		retn
 10940                                  
 10941                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10942                                  
 10943                                  ;************************************************************************
 10944                                  ;*									*
 10945                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
 10946                                  ;*									*
 10947                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
 10948                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
 10949                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
 10950                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
 10951                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
 10952                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
 10953                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
 10954                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
 10955                                  ;*									*
 10956                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
 10957                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
 10958                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
 10959                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
 10960                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
 10961                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
 10962                                  ;*									*
 10963                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
 10964                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
 10965                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
 10966                                  ;*									*
 10967                                  ;************************************************************************
 10968                                  
 10969                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10970                                  chrin:		
 10971 00000166 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
 10972 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 10973 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
 10974 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
 10975 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
 10976 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 10977 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 10978 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
 10979 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
 10980 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
 10981 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
 10982 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
 10983                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10984                                  
 10985                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
 10986                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
 10987                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
 10988                                  ;	 goto keyret
 10989                                  ;      else
 10990                                  ;	 set al to zero
 10991                                  ;	 goto alt_save
 10992                                  ;      endif
 10993                                  ;    endif
 10994                                  ;  endif
 10995                                  
 10996                                  alt_ext_chk:
 10997 00000183 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
 10998 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
 10999 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
 11000 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
 11001 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11002 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
 11003 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 11004 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
 11005                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11006                                  
 11007                                  not_ext:				
 11008 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
 11009 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
 11010                                  alt_save:				
 11011 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
 11012                                  keyret:					
 11013 0000019E C3                      		retn
 11014                                  
 11015                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11016                                  
 11017                                  ;************************************************************************
 11018                                  ;*									*
 11019                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
 11020                                  ;*									*
 11021                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
 11022                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
 11023                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
 11024                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
 11025                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
 11026                                  ;*									*
 11027                                  ;************************************************************************
 11028                                  
 11029                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11030                                  con_rdnd:				
 11031 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
 11032 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
 11033 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
 11034 000001A6 8A26[7F04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
 11035 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 11036 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
 11037 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
 11038 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
 11039 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 11040                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11041 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
 11042                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
 11043 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
 11044 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
 11045 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
 11046 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
 11047                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
 11048                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
 11049                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
 11050                                  z_bus_exit:				
 11051 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
 11052 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
 11053 000001CA C3                      		retn
 11054                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11055                                  
 11056                                  gotchr:					
 11057 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 11058 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
 11059 000001CF 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
 11060 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 11061 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
 11062                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11063                                  
 11064                                  notbrk:					
 11065 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
 11066 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
 11067 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
 11068 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
 11069                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11070                                  
 11071                                  rd_ext_chk:				
 11072 000001E0 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
 11073 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
 11074 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
 11075 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
 11076 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
 11077 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
 11078 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
 11079                                  					; change it for	compatibility
 11080                                  rdexit:					
 11081 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 11082 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
 11083                                  					; return keyboard character here
 11084                                  bc_exvec:				
 11085 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
 11086                                  					; indicate normal termination
 11087 000001FB C3                      		retn
 11088                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11089                                  
 11090                                  ;************************************************************************
 11091                                  ;*									*
 11092                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
 11093                                  ;*									*
 11094                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
 11095                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
 11096                                  ;*									*
 11097                                  ;************************************************************************
 11098                                  
 11099                                  con_writ:
 11100                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
 11101 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
 11102                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11103                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
 11104                                  con_lp:					
 11105 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
 11106 00000201 47                      		inc	di
 11107 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 11108                                  					; AL = character to display
 11109 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
 11110                                  cc_ret:					
 11111 00000206 F8                      		clc
 11112 00000207 C3                      		retn
 11113                                  
 11114                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11115                                  
 11116                                  ;************************************************************************
 11117                                  ;*									*
 11118                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
 11119                                  ;*									*
 11120                                  ;************************************************************************
 11121                                  
 11122                                  con_flush:
 11123 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
 11124                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
 11125 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 11126 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
 11127                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
 11128                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
 11129                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
 11130 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
 11131 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11132 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 11133                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 11134 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
 11135                                  
 11136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11137                                  
 11138                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11139                                  
 11140                                  ;************************************************************************
 11141                                  ;*									*
 11142                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
 11143                                  ;*									*
 11144                                  ;************************************************************************
 11145                                  
 11146                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
 11147                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
 11148                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
 11149                                  
 11150                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
 11151                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
 11152                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
 11153                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
 11154                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
 11155                                  ;
 11156                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
 11157                                  
 11158                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11159                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
 11160                                  
 11161                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11162                                  
 11163                                  ;************************************************************************
 11164                                  ;*									*
 11165                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
 11166                                  ;*									*
 11167                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
 11168                                  ;*									*
 11169                                  ;************************************************************************
 11170                                  
 11171                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
 11172 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
 11173                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
 11174                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11175                                  prn_done:
 11176 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
 11177 0000021D C3                      		retn
 11178                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11179                                  
 11180                                  ;************************************************************************
 11181                                  ;*									*
 11182                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
 11183                                  ;*									*
 11184                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
 11185                                  ;*									*
 11186                                  ;************************************************************************
 11187                                  
 11188                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
 11189                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
 11190 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
 11191                                  prn_loop:				
 11192 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
 11193                                  prn_out:				
 11194 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
 11195 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
 11196 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
 11197 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11198 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
 11199 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
 11200 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
 11201 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
 11202 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
 11203 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
 11204 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
 11205                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11206                                  
 11207                                  _prnwf:					
 11208 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
 11209 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
 11210                                  TestPrnError:				
 11211 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
 11212 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
 11213                                  pmessg:					
 11214 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 11215                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11216                                  
 11217                                  prn_con:				
 11218 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
 11219 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
 11220                                  ;prn_done:				
 11221                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11222                                  prn_done2:
 11223                                  		;clc
 11224                                  		; cf=0
 11225 0000024E C3                      		retn
 11226                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11227                                  
 11228                                  ;************************************************************************
 11229                                  ;*									*
 11230                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
 11231                                  ;*									*
 11232                                  ;************************************************************************
 11233                                  
 11234                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
 11235 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
 11236 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
 11237 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
 11238                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
 11239                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11240 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
 11241 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
 11242                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11243                                  
 11244                                  ;************************************************************************
 11245                                  ;*									*
 11246                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
 11247                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
 11248                                  ;*									*
 11249                                  ;************************************************************************
 11250                                  
 11251                                  prnstat:				
 11252 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
 11253                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
 11254                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
 11255                                  					; Return: AH = status
 11256                                  
 11257                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11258                                  
 11259                                  ;************************************************************************
 11260                                  ;*									*
 11261                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
 11262                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
 11263                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
 11264                                  ;*									*
 11265                                  ;************************************************************************
 11266                                  
 11267                                  prnop:
 11268                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 11269                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 11270                                  		
 11271                                  		;mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
 11272                                  		;int	17h
 11273                                  
 11274 0000025E 1E                      		push	ds
 11275 0000025F FF36[2100]              		push	word [auxnum]
 11276 00000263 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
 11277 00000265 8EDA                    		mov	ds, dx
 11278 00000267 5A                      		pop	dx
 11279 00000268 9C                      		pushf			; simulate int 17h
 11280 00000269 FA                      		cli
 11281                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:5ghghCh
 11282 0000026A FF1E5C00                		call	far [17h*4]	; 0:5Ch = INT 17h vector
 11283 0000026E 1F                      		pop	ds
 11284                                  
 11285                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
 11286                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
 11287                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
 11288                                  
 11289 0000026F 50                      		push	ax
 11290 00000270 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
 11291 00000273 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
 11292 00000276 58                      		pop	ax
 11293 00000277 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
 11294 00000279 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
 11295 0000027C 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
 11296                                  
 11297                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
 11298                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
 11299                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
 11300                                  
 11301                                  NextTest:				
 11302 0000027F F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
 11303                                  					; i/o error?
 11304 00000282 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
 11305                                  
 11306                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
 11307                                  
 11308 00000284 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
 11309                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
 11310 00000286 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
 11311 00000289 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
 11312 0000028B FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
 11313                                  ret1:					
 11314 0000028D C3                      		retn
 11315                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11316                                  
 11317                                  checknotready:				
 11318 0000028E B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
 11319 00000290 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
 11320 00000293 C3                      		retn
 11321                                  
 11322                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11323                                  
 11324                                  ;************************************************************************
 11325                                  ;*									*
 11326                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
 11327                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
 11328                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
 11329                                  ;*									*
 11330                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
 11331                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
 11332                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
 11333                                  ;*									*
 11334                                  ;************************************************************************
 11335                                  
 11336                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11337                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
 11338 00000294 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
 11339                                  prn_tilbloop:				
 11340 00000296 51                      		push	cx
 11341 00000297 53                      		push	bx
 11342 00000298 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
 11343 0000029A 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
 11344 0000029E D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
 11345                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
 11346 000002A0 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
 11347 000002A4 5B                      		pop	bx
 11348                                  prn_getstat:				
 11349 000002A5 E8B4FF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
 11350 000002A8 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
 11351 000002AA F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
 11352 000002AD E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
 11353 000002AF 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
 11354 000002B0 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
 11355 000002B2 26                      		es
 11356 000002B3 AC                      		lodsb
 11357                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
 11358                                  					; lodsb
 11359 000002B4 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11360 000002B6 E8A5FF                  		call	prnop
 11361 000002B9 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
 11362 000002BB E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
 11363                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11364                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
 11365                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
 11366 000002BD C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
 11367                                  
 11368                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11369                                  
 11370                                  prn_bperr:				
 11371 000002BE 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
 11372                                  prn_berr:				
 11373 000002BF E915FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 11374                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11375                                  
 11376                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11377                                  
 11378                                  ;************************************************************************
 11379                                  ;*									*
 11380                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
 11381                                  ;*									*
 11382                                  ;************************************************************************
 11383                                  
 11384                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 11385                                  ; 11/01/2019
 11386                                  
 11387                                  ;********************************;*
 11388                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
 11389                                  ;********************************;*
 11390                                  
 11391                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
 11392                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
 11393                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
 11394                                  
 11395                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
 11396                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
 11397                                  ;;endstruc
 11398                                  
 11399                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
 11400                                  
 11401                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11402                                  
 11403                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11404                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
 11405 000002C2 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 11406 000002C6 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11407                                  					; ioc_pc
 11408 000002CB 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
 11409                                  
 11410                                  prnfuncerr:				
 11411 000002CD E905FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11412                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11413                                  
 11414                                  prnfunc_ok:				
 11415 000002D0 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11416 000002D4 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11417 000002D8 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
 11418                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
 11419 000002DA 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
 11420 000002DE D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
 11421                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
 11422 000002E0 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
 11423 000002E4 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
 11424 000002E6 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
 11425 000002E8 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
 11426 000002EA 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
 11427 000002EC 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
 11428                                  prngetcount:				
 11429                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
 11430 000002EF 898F[8104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
 11431 000002F3 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
 11432                                  					; return current retry count
 11433                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11434                                  		; cf=0
 11435                                  		;clc
 11436 000002F6 C3                      		retn
 11437                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11438                                  
 11439                                  ;************************************************************************
 11440                                  ;*									*
 11441                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
 11442                                  ;*									*
 11443                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
 11444                                  ;************************************************************************
 11445                                  
 11446                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
 11447 000002F7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 11448 000002FB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11449                                  					; ioc_pc
 11450 00000300 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
 11451 00000302 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11452 00000306 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
 11453 00000308 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
 11454 0000030A 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
 11455 0000030C 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err

 11463                                  prn_query_err:
