 13231                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13232                                  
 13233                                  ; 15/10/2022
 13234                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13235                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 13236                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 13237                                  ;
 13238                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 13239                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 13240                                  ; the boot record. after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 13241                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 13242                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 13243                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 13244                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13245                                  
 13246                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13247                                  
 13248                                  ; 22/12/2023
 13249                                  %if 0
 13250                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13251                                  movbpb:
 13252                                  		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 13253                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 13254                                  					; sectors per unit
 13255                                  		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 13256                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 13257                                  					; number of directory entries
 13258                                  		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 13259                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 13260                                  					; size of drive
 13261                                  		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 13262                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13263                                  					; media	descriptor
 13264                                  		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 13265                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 13266                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 13267                                  		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 13268                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 13269                                  					; sectors per track
 13270                                  		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 13271                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 13272                                  					; number of heads
 13273                                  %else
 13274                                  		; 29/12/2023
 13275                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 13276                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM, BIOSCODE:0814h)
 13277                                  		;;;
 13278                                  movbpb:
 13279 00000800 57                      		push	di
 13280 00000801 83C706                  		add	di, 6		; BDS+6 = BDS.BPB
 13281 00000804 8D36[5D01]              		lea	si, [disksector+0Bh]
 13282 00000808 B93500                  		mov	cx, 53		; copy bios parameters block
 13283                                  					; from BPB_BytsPerSec to (FAT32) BS_DrvNum (excluded)
 13284 0000080B FC                      		cld
 13285 0000080C F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13286 0000080E 8B4CD3                  		mov	cx, [si-45]	; si = disksector+64 -> 64-45 = 19
 13287                                  					; disksektor+19 = BPB_TotSec16
 13288 00000811 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 13289 00000813 E308                    		jcxz	movbpb_bigdisk
 13290 00000815 26894DE0                		mov	[es:di-32], cx	; write 16 bit total sectors
 13291                                  					; to 32 bit total sectors field
 13292 00000819 268945E2                		mov	[es:di-30], ax	; BPB_TotalSec32+2 (BDS offset 29, BPB offset 23)
 13293                                  movbpb_bigdisk:
 13294 0000081D 3944D6                  		cmp	[si-42], ax     ; BPB_FATSz16 = disksector+22
 13295 00000820 7410                    		jz	short movbpb_fat32
 13296                                  movbpb_fat:
 13297 00000822 83EF1C                  		sub	di, 28		; di = BDS offset 31 (BPB offset 25)
 13298                                  		; 29/12/2023
 13299 00000825 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; clear 12 byte extended BDS (FAT32) fields
 13300                                  					; (which are used only for FAT32 disks)
 13301 00000828 F3AA                    		rep stosb
 13302 0000082A 48                      		dec	ax		; -1 ; 0FFFFh
 13303 0000082B AB                      		stosw			; set BDS offset 43 (dword) to -1
 13304                                  					; dword [BDS.BPB_FSInfo] = 0FFFFFFFFh
 13305 0000082C AB                      		stosw
 13306 0000082D 40                      		inc	ax		; ax = 0
 13307 0000082E B10C                    		mov	cl, 12		
 13308                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; clear BDS offset 47 to 59
 13309                                  					; (BPB offset 41 to 53) (disksector offset 52 to 64)
 13310 00000830 F3AA                    		rep stosb
 13311                                  movbpb_fat32:
 13312 00000832 5F                      		pop	di
 13313                                  %endif
 13314                                  		;;;
 13315                                  
 13316 00000833 803E[9B04]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
 13317 00000838 75C4                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 13318 0000083A E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 13319 0000083D 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
 13320 0000083F C606[9B04]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
 13321                                  movbpb_conv:
 13322 00000844 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
 13323 00000849 75B3                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 13324 0000084B E83714                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
 13325                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13326                                  		; cf = 0
 13327                                  ;movbpb_ret:
 13328                                  		;clc
 13329 0000084E C3                      		retn
 13330                                  		
 13331                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13332                                  
 13333                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 13334                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 13335                                  ;by es:di.
 13336                                  
 13337                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 13338                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 13339                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 13340                                  ;      the boot record information.
 13341                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 13342                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 13343                                  
 13344                                  ; 22/12/2023
 13345                                  %if 0
 13346                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13347                                  mov_media_ids:		
 13348                                  		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 13349                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 13350                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13351                                  		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 13352                                  		push	cx
 13353                                  		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 13354                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 13355                                  		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 13356                                  		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 13357                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 13358                                  		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 13359                                  		push	di
 13360                                  		push	si
 13361                                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13362                                  		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 13363                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 13364                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
 13365                                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 13366                                  		rep movsb
 13367                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13368                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13369                                  		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
 13370                                  		mov	si, disksector+36h
 13371                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
 13372                                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13373                                  		rep movsb
 13374                                  		pop	si
 13375                                  		pop	di
 13376                                  		pop	cx
 13377                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13378                                  		; cf = 0

 13448                                  ; 15/10/2022
 13449                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 13450                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 13451                                  ; input : es:di -> bds

 13470                                  
 13471                                  ; 15/10/2022
 13472                                  
 13473                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13474                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 13475                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 13476                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 13477                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 13478                                  ;		dh has head
 13479                                  ;		es:di has bds
 13480                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 13481                                  ;
 13482                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 13483                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 13484                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 13485                                  ;
 13486                                  ;		carry set
 13487                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 13488                                  ;
 13489                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 13490                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13491                                  
 13492                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13493                                  ; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 13494                                  
 13495                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13496                                  read_sector:
 13497 000008B6 55                      		push	bp
 13498 000008B7 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 13499 000008BA 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13500 000008BE BB[5201]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 13501                                  rd_ret:
 13502 000008C1 06                      		push	es
 13503 000008C2 1E                      		push	ds
 13504 000008C3 07                      		pop	es
 13505 000008C4 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 13506 000008C7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 13507                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 13508                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 13509                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 13510 000008C9 07                      		pop	es
 13511 000008CA 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 13512                                  rd_rty:
 13513 000008CC E81205                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 13514 000008CF 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 13515                                  
 13516                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 13517 000008D1 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1
 13518                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 13519                                  		;;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13520                                  					; fnon_removable

 13526 000008E1 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 13527                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13528                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13529                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 13530                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13531 000008E5 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 13532 000008E7 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 13533                                  		; 
 13534 000008EA 1F                      		pop	ds
 13535 000008EB A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 13536 000008EE 58                      		pop	ax
 13537                                  rd_skip1_dpt:
 13538 000008EF 06                      		push	es
 13539 000008F0 1E                      		push	ds
 13540 000008F1 07                      		pop	es
 13541 000008F2 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 13542 000008F5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 13543                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 13544                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 13545                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 13546 000008F7 07                      		pop	es
 13547 000008F8 9C                      		pushf
 13548 000008F9 803E[A905]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 13549 000008FE 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 13550 00000900 50                      		push	ax
 13551 00000901 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 13552 00000904 1E                      		push	ds
 13553 00000905 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 13554 00000909 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13555 0000090C 1F                      		pop	ds
 13556 0000090D 58                      		pop	ax
 13557                                  rd_skip2_dpt:

 13688                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 13689                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 13690                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 13691                                  
 13692                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 13693                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 13694                                  ;
 13695                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data

 13697                                  
 13698                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13699                                  checksingle:
 13700 00000977 50                      		push	ax
 13701 00000978 53                      		push	bx
 13702                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 13703 00000979 268B5D3F                		mov	bx, [es:di+3Fh]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13704                                  		;mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13705                                  
 13706                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 13707                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 13708                                  
 13709 0000097D F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 13710 00000980 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 13711 00000982 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 13712                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 13713 00000985 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 13714                                  
 13715                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 13716                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 13717                                  
 13718 00000987 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13719                                  					; get physical drive number
 13720 0000098B 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 13721 0000098C 57                      		push	di
 13722 0000098D C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 13723                                  scan_list:
 13724 00000991 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 13725 00000995 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 13726 00000997 B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 13727                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 13728 00000999 26845D3F                		test	[es:di+3Fh], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 13734 000009A4 07                      		pop	es

 13738                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 13739                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 13740                                  ; in this case.

 13748                                  					; get the DOS drive letter

 13756                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13757                                  
 13758                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 13759                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 13760                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb

 13773 000009DF 07                      		pop	es

 13775 000009E2 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)

 13833                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13834                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 13835                                  ;
 13836                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 13837                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 13838                                  ;	cx = sector count
 13839                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 13840                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 13841                                  ;	ds = cs
 13842                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 13843                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 13844                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 13845                                  ;
 13846                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 13847                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 13848                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13849                                  
 13850                                  		; 12/12/2023
 13851                                  		; ds = biosdata segment (cs = bioscode segment)
 13852                                  diskrd:	
 13853                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 13854                                  		; 19/10/2022

 13857                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13858                                  
 13859                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 13860                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0A30h
 13861                                  ; 22/12/2023
 13862                                  %if 0
 13863                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13864                                  diskio:
 13865                                  		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 13866                                  		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 13867                                  		call	SetDrive

 13870                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 13871                                  		jcxz	ioret
 13872                                  
 13873                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 13874                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 13875                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 13876                                  
 13877                                  		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2

 13879                                  					; unformatted_media
 13880                                  		jnz	short unformatteddrive

 13882                                  		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 13883                                  
 13884                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 13885

 13887                                  		xor	si, si ; 0
 13888                                  		add	dx, cx
 13889                                  		;adc	si, 0
 13890                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13891                                  		rcl	si, 1

 13893                                  					; 32 bit sector ?

 13895                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 13896                                  		; 02/09/2023

 13898                                  		jnz	short baddrive

 13900                                  		ja	short baddrive
 13901                                  		jmp	short sanityok
 13902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13903                                  
 13904                                  sanity32:
 13905                                  		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 13906                                  		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]

 13908                                  		ja	short baddrive
 13909                                  		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 13910                                  		ja	short baddrive
 13911                                  sanityok:
 13912                                  		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 13913                                  		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 13914                                  		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 13915                                  
 13916                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 13917                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 13918                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 13919                                  
 13920                                  		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 13921                                  
 13922                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 13923                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 13924                                  
 13925                                  		push	es
 13926                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]

 13940                                  
 13941                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 13942                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 13943                                  ; the proper error code.
 13944                                  
 13945                                  		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?

 13951                                  
 13952                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 13953

 13956                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 13957                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 13958

 13961                                  		;div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]

 13965                                  		div	cx
 13966                                  		mov	[temp_h], ax

 13968                                  		div	cx ; 02/09/2023
 13969                                  		;div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]

 14692                                  dskerr0:

 14751 00000D8C 58                      		pop	ax

 14753 00000D8E E80B00                  		call	fastspeed

 14755                                  		;push	es
 14756                                  		;les	si, [dpt]

 14767                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14768

 14771

 14826                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 14827                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds

 14829                                  set_tim:

 14831 00000DC2 E86CF7                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 14832

 14834                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 14835                                  
 14836                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 14837 00000DC5 263B5579                		cmp	dx, [es:di+79h]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 14838                                  		;cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 14839 00000DC9 7506                    		jne	short setaccess
 14840                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14841 00000DCB 263B4D7B                		cmp	cx, [es:di+7Bh]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM

 14846                                  setaccess:

 14859                                  
 14860                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14861                                  
 14862                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 14863                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 14864                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 14865                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 14866                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 14867                                  
 14868                                  again:
 14869 00000DE1 E85705                  		call	ResetDisk
 14870 00000DE4 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14871 00000DE7 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 14872                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 14873 00000DE9 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 14874 00000DEA C3                      		retn
 14875                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14876                                  
 14877                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 14878 00000DEB 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 14879 00000DED C3                      		retn

 14893                                  get_phy_drv_num:
 14894 00000DEF E8B2F7                  		call	SetDrive	; get physical drive number
 14895                                  					; INPUT: al = logical drive number (BDS.drivelet)
 14896                                  					; OUTPUT: physical drive number (BDS.drivenum)

 14903                                  ioctl_output:
 14904 00000DF7 E8F5FF                  		call	get_phy_drv_num
 14905 00000DFA 2E8816[EE0D]            		mov	[cs:ioctl_drvnum], dl
 14906 00000DFF B441                    		mov	ah, 41h
 14907 00000E01 BBAA55                  		mov	bx, 55AAh
 14908 00000E04 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - Check for INT 13h Extensions
 14909                                  					; BX = 55AAh, DL = drive number
 14910                                  					; Return: CF set if not supported
 14911                                  					; AH = extensions version
 14912                                  					; BX = AA55h
 14913                                  					; CX = Interface support bit map
 14914 00000E06 7235                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14915                                  ioctl_input_1:
 14916 00000E08 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 14917 00000E0C 26C47D0E                		les	di, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 14918 00000E10 723E                    		jc	short ioctl_input_2
 14919 00000E12 B80046                  		mov	ax, 4600h	; Eject removable media
 14920 00000E15 263805                  		cmp	[es:di], al	; al = 0 ; disk ioctl function = 0
 14921 00000E18 7417                    		je	short ioctl_output_1
 14922 00000E1A 26803D01                		cmp	byte [es:di], 1 ; al = 1 ; disk ioctl function = 1
 14923 00000E1E 751B                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14924 00000E20 B80145                  		mov	ax, 4501h	; Lock/unlock media
 14925                                  					; (al, 0 = lock, 1 = unlock)
 14926 00000E23 26807D0100              		cmp	byte [es:di+1], 0 ; unlock (reverse of INT 13h ah=45h)
 14927 00000E28 7407                    		jz	short ioctl_output_1
 14928 00000E2A 26384501                		cmp	[es:di+1], al	; lock (reverse of INT 13h ah=45h)
 14929 00000E2E 750B                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14930 00000E30 48                      		dec	ax
 14931                                  ioctl_output_1:
 14932 00000E31 2E8A16[EE0D]            		mov	dl, [cs:ioctl_drvnum]
 14933 00000E36 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 14934 00000E38 7203                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14935                                  ioctl_lock_err:
 14936                                  		; cf=0
 14937                                  ioctl_output_ret:
 14938                                  		;clc
 14939 00000E3A C3                      		retn
 14940                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14941                                  
 14942                                  ioctl_output_2:
 14943 00000E3B B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 14944                                  int13h_exts_err:
 14945 00000E3D 80FCB0                  		cmp	ah, 0B0h	; volume not locked in drive
 14946 00000E40 74F8                    		je	short ioctl_lock_err
 14947 00000E42 80FCB4                  		cmp	ah, 0B4h	; lock count exceeded
 14948 00000E45 74F3                    		je	short ioctl_lock_err
 14949 00000E47 E9DAF7                  		jmp	err_exitj

 14951                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 14952                                  
 14953                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14954                                  ioctl_input:
 14955 00000E4A E8A2FF                  		call	get_phy_drv_num
 14956 00000E4D F9                      		stc
 14957 00000E4E EBB8                    		jmp	short ioctl_input_1
 14958                                  ioctl_input_2:
 14959 00000E50 26803D06                		cmp	byte [es:di], 6	; disk ioctl function = 6
 14960 00000E54 75E5                    		jne	short ioctl_output_2
 14961 00000E56 B80245                  		mov	ax, 4502h	; get lock status
 14962 00000E59 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 14963 00000E5B 72E0                    		jc	short int13h_exts_err
 14964 00000E5D BB0C00                  		mov	bx, 0Ch		; bit 1 lock bit
 14965 00000E60 3C00                    		cmp	al, 0		; not locked
 14966 00000E62 7402                    		jz	short ioctl_input_3
 14967 00000E64 B30E                    		mov	bl, 0Eh
 14968                                  ioctl_input_3:
 14969 00000E66 53                      		push	bx
 14970 00000E67 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 14971 00000E69 B90101                  		mov	cx, 101h
 14972 00000E6C B601                    		mov	dh, 1
 14973 00000E6E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - VERIFY SECTORS
 14974                                  					; AL = number of sectors to verify, CH = track, CL = sector
 14975                                  					; DH = head, DL = drive
 14976                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH = status
 14977                                  					; AL = number of sectors verified
 14978 00000E70 5B                      		pop	bx
 14979 00000E71 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; no media in drive (IBM/MS INT 13 extensions)
 14980 00000E74 740B                    		je	short ioctl_input_5
 14981 00000E76 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout (not ready)
 14982 00000E79 7406                    		je	short ioctl_input_5
 14983                                  ioctl_input_4:
 14984 00000E7B 26895D01                		mov	[es:di+1], bx
 14985 00000E7F EBB9                    		jmp	short ioctl_lock_err
 14986                                  ioctl_input_5:
 14987 00000E81 81CB0108                		or	bx, 801h	; bit 0 error bit (1 = error, 31h or 80h)
 14988                                  					; bit 11 (not ready -removable media error- bit)
 14989                                  					; if bit 11 = 0, another error (except 31h and 80h)
 14990 00000E85 EBF4                    		jmp	short ioctl_input_4

 15511 00001044 2E803E[CB0E]00          		cmp	byte [cs:new_genioctl], 0
 15512 0000104A 7503                    		jnz	short sdp_4	; new type (FAT32) structure
 15513 0000104C 8D7728                  		lea	si, [bx+28h]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SECTORTABLE]
 15514                                  					; offset 31+9 (A_BPB.size+9)
 15515                                  sdp_4:
 15516                                  		;;;
 15517                                  
 15518                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15519 0000104F 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15520                                  		;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15521                                  					; Trash	our bds	pointer
 15522                                  StoreSectorInfo:
 15523 00001054 47                      		inc	di
 15524 00001055 47                      		inc	di		; Skip over cylinder and head
 15525 00001056 AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector id
 15526 00001057 AA                      		stosb			; Copy it
 15527 00001058 AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector size
 15528                                  		
 15529                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15530                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15531                                  		;call	SectSizeToSectIndex
 15532                                  		; 18/04/2024
 15533                                  		;cmp	ah, 3 ; 02/09/2023
 15534 00001059 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 15535                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 15536 0000105C 7704                    		ja	short OneK
 15537 0000105E 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 15538 00001060 EB02                    		jmp	short sdp_s
 15539                                  OneK:
 15540 00001062 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 1024 bytes per sector
 15541                                  sdp_s:

 15543 00001065 E2ED                    		loop	StoreSectorInfo
 15544                                  SectorInfoSaved:
 15545 00001067 F8                      		clc
 15546 00001068 C3                      		retn
 15547                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15548                                  
 15549                                  TooManyPerTrack:

 15551 0000106B F9                      		stc
 15552 0000106C C3                      		retn
 15553                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15554                                  
 15555                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15556                                  
 15557                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15558                                  ; FormatTrack:
 15559                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 15560                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 15561                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 15562                                  ;
 15563                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15564                                  ;
 15565                                  ; output:
 15566                                  ;	for status call:
 15567                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 15568                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 15569                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 15570                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 15571                                  ;		3 - no media present
 15572                                  ;	carry cleared.
 15573                                  ;
 15574                                  ;	for format track:
 15575                                  ;		carry set if error
 15576                                  ;
 15577                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15578                                  
 15579                                  ; 16/03/2019
 15580                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15581                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:10B7h)
 15582                                  
 15583                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15584                                  FormatTrack:
 15585 0000106D C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15586 00001071 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 15587 00001074 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15588                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 15589 00001077 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 15590 00001079 1E                      		push	ds
 15591                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15592 0000107A 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15593                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15594 0000107F E82502                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 15595 00001082 1F                      		pop	ds
 15596 00001083 8807                    		mov	[bx], al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15597 00001085 F8                      		clc
 15598 00001086 C3                      		retn
 15599                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15600                                  
 15601                                  DoFormatTrack:
 15602                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15603 00001087 26807D3E05              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 5				
 15604                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+34], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15605                                  					; DEV_HARDDISK
 15606 0000108C 7508                    		jnz	short DoFormatDiskette
 15607                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15608 0000108E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15609                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15610                                  					; Point	to Bios_Data (at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h)
 15611 00001093 E99D00                  		jmp	VerifyTrack
 15612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15613                                  
 15614                                  DoFormatDiskette:
 15615 00001096 8B4F01                  		mov	cx, [bx+1]
 15616 00001099 8B5703                  		mov	dx, [bx+3]
 15617 0000109C F60702                  		test	byte [bx], 2
 15618                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15619 0000109F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 15620                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 15621                                  					; Setup	ds-> Bios_Data for verify
 15622 000010A4 7403                    		jz	short DoFormatDiskette_1
 15623 000010A6 E9E500                  		jmp	VerifyTrack_Err
 15624                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15625                                  
 15626                                  DoFormatDiskette_1:
 15627 000010A9 E8FB01                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 15628 000010AC 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		;  ROM support for sec/trk,# trks comb?
 15629 000010AE 7406                    		jz	short NeedToSetDasd ; Old rom
 15630 000010B0 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3		; Time out error?
 15631 000010B2 7507                    		jnz	short NoSetDasd	; No,fine. (at this point, don't care
 15632                                  					; about	the illegal combination)
 15633 000010B4 EB68                    		jmp	short FormatFailed
 15634                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15635                                  
 15636                                  NeedToSetDasd:
 15637 000010B6 52                      		push	dx
 15638 000010B7 E89001                  		call	SetDasd		; INT 13h, AH=17h
 15639 000010BA 5A                      		pop	dx
 15640                                  NoSetDasd:
 15641 000010BB E8B9F8                  		call	checksingle	; Do any needed	diskette swapping
 15642 000010BE 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get track from packet
 15643 000010C0 A3[3901]                		mov	[trknum], ax
 15644 000010C3 880E[3801]              		mov	[hdnum], cl	; Store	head from packet
 15645 000010C7 88CC                    		mov	ah, cl
 15646 000010C9 BB[AC04]                		mov	bx, tracktable
 15647 000010CC 8B0E[AA04]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 15648                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15649 000010D0 E307                    		jcxz	set_fmt_retry_count
 15650                                  StoreCylinderHead:
 15651 000010D2 8907                    		mov	[bx], ax	; Store	into TrackTable
 15652 000010D4 83C304                  		add	bx, 4		; Skip to next sector field
 15653 000010D7 E2F9                    		loop	StoreCylinderHead
 15654                                  set_fmt_retry_count:	; 24/12/2023
 15655                                  		;mov	cx, 5		; MAXERR - Set up retry	count
 15656                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15657 000010D9 B105                    		mov	cl, 5
 15658                                  FormatRetry:
 15659 000010DB 51                      		push	cx
 15660 000010DC BB[AC04]                		mov	bx, tracktable
 15661 000010DF A0[AA04]                		mov	al, [sectorspertrack]
 15662 000010E2 B405                    		mov	ah, 5		; romformat
 15663 000010E4 8C1E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], ds
 15664 000010E8 E86602                  		call	ToRom
 15665 000010EB 59                      		pop	cx
 15666 000010EC 7216                    		jb	short FormatError
 15667 000010EE 51                      		push	cx		; Now verify the sectors just formatted.
 15668                                  					; NOTE:	because	of bug in some BIOSes we have to
 15669                                  					;	set ES:BX to 00:00
 15670 000010EF 53                      		push	bx
 15671 000010F0 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 15672 000010F2 891E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx
 15673 000010F6 A0[AA04]                		mov	al, [sectorspertrack]
 15674 000010F9 B404                    		mov	ah, 4		; romverify
 15675 000010FB B101                    		mov	cl, 1
 15676 000010FD E85102                  		call	ToRom
 15677 00001100 5B                      		pop	bx
 15678 00001101 59                      		pop	cx
 15679 00001102 7329                    		jnb	short FormatOk
 15680                                  FormatError:
 15681 00001104 E83402                  		call	ResetDisk
 15682 00001107 C606[AA05]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1
 15683 0000110C 50                      		push	ax
 15684 0000110D 51                      		push	cx
 15685 0000110E 52                      		push	dx
 15686 0000110F E89501                  		call	SetMediaForFormat
 15687 00001112 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 15688 00001114 7503                    		jnz	short WhileErr
 15689 00001116 E83101                  		call	SetDasd
 15690                                  WhileErr:
 15691 00001119 5A                      		pop	dx
 15692 0000111A 59                      		pop	cx
 15693 0000111B 58                      		pop	ax
 15694 0000111C E2BD                    		loop	FormatRetry
 15695                                  FormatFailed:
 15696 0000111E C606[AA05]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1
 15697                                  					; Set the format error flag
 15698 00001123 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6		; DSK_CHANGELINE_ERR - convert change line
 15699 00001126 7502                    		jnz	short DoMapIt	; Error	to time	out error
 15700 00001128 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 15701                                  DoMapIt:
 15702 0000112A E97CFC                  		jmp	maperror
 15703                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15704                                  
 15705                                  FormatOk:
 15706 0000112D C606[AA05]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; reset the format error flag
 15707 00001132 C3                      		retn
 15708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15709                                  
 15710                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15711                                  
 15712                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15713                                  ;
 15714                                  ; VerifyTrack:
 15715                                  ;
 15716                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15717                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15718                                  
 15719                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 15720                                  VerifyTrack:
 15721 00001133 1E                      		push	ds
 15722 00001134 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX points to request header.
 15723 00001138 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 15724                                  
 15725                                  		; Come here with DS:[BX] -> packet, ES:[DI] -> bds
 15726                                  
 15727 0000113B 8B4F03                  		mov	cx, [bx+3]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_CYLINDER]
 15728 0000113E 8B4701                  		mov	ax, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_HEAD]
 15729 00001141 8B5705                  		mov	dx, [bx+5]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_TRACKCOUNT]
 15730 00001144 8A1F                    		mov	bl, [bx]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 15731                                  					; Get option flag word
 15732 00001146 1F                      		pop	ds
 15733 00001147 C606[2001]04            		mov	byte [rflag], 4	; romverify
 15734 0000114C 890E[3301]              		mov	[curtrk], cx
 15735 00001150 A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; ASSUME heads < 256
 15736 00001153 8B0E[AA04]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 15737                                  
 15738                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 15739                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 15740                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 15741                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 15742                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 15743                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 15744                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 15745                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 15746                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 15747                                  		; we initialise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 15748                                  		; register.
 15749                                  
 15750                                  					; Special function requested?	
 15751 00001157 F6C302                  		test	bl, 2		; DO_FAST_FORMAT
 15752 0000115A 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15753 0000115C 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get ax = number of trks to verify
 15754 0000115E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 15755 00001160 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 15756 00001162 F6E1                    		mul	cl
 15757 00001164 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 15758 00001166 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 15759 00001168 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 15760                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15761 0000116A 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15762                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15763                                  		;test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 15764                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15765                                  					; fnon_removable
 15766 0000116F 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15767                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?
 15768                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15769                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15770 00001171 F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 15771                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15772                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15773 00001176 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 15774 00001178 C606[A704]01            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1
 15775                                  NormVerifyTrack:
 15776 0000117D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; 1st sector
 15777 0000117F 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 15778 00001181 891E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx	; Use 0:0 as the transfer address for verify
 15779 00001185 E83F00                  		call	TrackIo
 15780 00001188 C606[A704]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0
 15781 0000118D C3                      		retn
 15782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15783                                  
 15784                                  VerifyTrack_Err:
 15785 0000118E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 15786 00001190 E916FC                  		jmp	maperror
 15787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15788                                  
 15789                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15790                                  
 15791                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15792                                  ;
 15793                                  ; ReadTrack:
 15794                                  ;
 15795                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15796                                  ;
 15797                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15798                                  
 15799                                  ReadTrack:
 15800 00001193 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 15801 00001198 EB05                    		jmp	short ReadWriteTrack
 15802                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15803                                  
 15804                                  WriteTrack:
 15805                                  
 15806                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15807                                  ;
 15808                                  ; WriteTrack:
 15809                                  ;
 15810                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 15811                                  ;
 15812                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15813                                  				
 15814 0000119A C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 15815                                  
 15816                                  		; Fall into ReadWriteTrack
 15817                                  
 15818                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15819                                  ;
 15820                                  ; readWriteTrack:
 15821                                  ;
 15822                                  ; input:
 15823                                  ;    ES:di points to bds for drive
 15824                                  ;    rFlag - 2 for read,3 for write
 15825                                  ;
 15826                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15827                                  
 15828                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 15829                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 15830                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 15831                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 15832                                  		
 15833                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15834 0000119F 06                      		push	es
 15835 000011A0 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	-> to request header
 15836 000011A4 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 15837 000011A8 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 15838 000011AC A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax
 15839 000011AF 268B4701                		mov	ax, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_HEAD]
 15840 000011B3 A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; Assume heads < 256!!!
 15841 000011B6 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 15842 000011BA 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 15843 000011BE 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 15844                                  					; Get transfer address
 15845                                  
 15846                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 15847                                  
 15848 000011C2 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; Pass transfer	segment
 15849 000011C6 07                      		pop	es
 15850                                  
 15851                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 15852                                  
 15853                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15854                                  
 15855                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15856                                  
 15857                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15858                                  ;
 15859                                  ; TrackIo:
 15860                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 15861                                  ;
 15862                                  ;   input:
 15863                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 15864                                  ;		  3 = write
 15865                                  ;		  4 = verify
 15866                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 15867                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 15868                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 15869                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 15870                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 15871                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 15872                                  ;
 15873                                  ; ==========================================================================
 15874                                  
 15875                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15876                                  
 15877                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0		
 15878                                  
 15879                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15880                                  TrackIo:
 15881                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 15882 000011C7 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 15883 000011CB E8A9F7                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 15884 000011CE 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 15885                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 15886 000011D3 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 15887 000011D5 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 15888 000011D6 51                      		push	cx
 15889 000011D7 E8A0F9                  		call	iosetup
 15890 000011DA 59                      		pop	cx
 15891 000011DB 58                      		pop	ax
 15892                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 15893 000011DC BE[AC04]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 15894                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15895                                  		;add	ax, ax		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15896                                  		;add	ax, ax
 15897 000011DF D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 15898 000011E1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 15899 000011E3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 15900                                  
 15901                                  		; WE WANT:
 15902                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 15903                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 15904                                  		
 15905 000011E5 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 15906                                  
 15907                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15908 000011E8 26F6453F08              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 8 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15909                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15910                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 15911                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15912                                  					; good_tracklayout
 15913 000011ED 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 15914                                  		
 15915 000011EF 87CA                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 15916                                  ionextsector:
 15917 000011F1 51                      		push	cx
 15918 000011F2 52                      		push	dx
 15919 000011F3 46                      		inc	si
 15920 000011F4 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 15921                                  					; the track table
 15922 000011F5 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 15923 000011F6 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 15924                                  
 15925                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 15926                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 15927                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 15928                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 15929                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 15930                                  		
 15931                                  		; 24/12/2023
 15932 000011F9 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 15933                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15934                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 15935                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15936                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 15937 000011FE 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 15938                                  
 15939                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15940 00001200 F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 15941                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 15942                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 15943 00001205 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 15944 00001207 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 15945 0000120B 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 15946 0000120D E823FA                  		call	Disk
 15947 00001210 5A                      		pop	dx
 15948 00001211 59                      		pop	cx
 15949 00001212 F8                      		clc
 15950 00001213 C3                      		retn
 15951                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15952                                  
 15953                                  IoRemovable:
 15954 00001214 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 15955                                  					; table	and save it
 15956 00001215 50                      		push	ax
 15957 00001216 56                      		push	si
 15958 00001217 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data

 15997                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15998                                  
 15999                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16000                                  ;
 16001                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 16002                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 16003                                  ; are permissible.
 16004                                  ;
 16005                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 16006                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 16007                                  ; All other registers preserved
 16008                                  ;
 16009                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16010                                  
 16011                                  ; 02/09/2023

 16016                                  ;		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 16017                                  ;		retn

 16040                                  ; SetDASD
 16041                                  ;
 16042                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 16043                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 16044                                  ;
 16045                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds

 16053                                  SetDasd:
 16054 0000124A 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 16055                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 16056 0000124F 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 16057                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16058 00001251 26F6453F80              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 80h

 16125 0000129C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 16126                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 16127                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 16132                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16133                                  
 16134                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16135                                  
 16136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16137                                  ;
 16138                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 16139                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 16140                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 16141                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 16142                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 16143                                  ;
 16144                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 16145                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 16146                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 16147                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 16148                                  ;
 16149                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 16150                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 16151                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 16152                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 16153                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 16154                                  ;
 16155                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16156                                  
 16157                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16158                                  
 16159                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16160                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 16161 000012A7 51                      		push	cx
 16162 000012A8 52                      		push	dx
 16163                                  
 16164                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 16165                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 16166                                  
 16167 000012A9 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 16168 000012AE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 16169 000012B0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 16170 000012B2 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16171 000012B7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 16172 000012B9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 16173                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16174                                  
 16175                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:
 16176 000012BB 06                      		push	es
 16177 000012BC 56                      		push	si
 16178                                  
 16179                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16180                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 16181 000012BD 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16182 000012BF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 16183                                  
 16184 000012C1 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16185                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 16186                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 16187 000012C6 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 16188 000012CA 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 16189                                  
 16190                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 16191                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 16192                                  
 16193 000012CE 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 16194 000012D3 5E                      		pop	si
 16195 000012D4 07                      		pop	es
 16196                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 16197                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16198 000012D5 268B4D41                		mov	cx, [es:di+41h]	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16199                                  		;mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 16200 000012D9 49                      		dec	cx
 16201 000012DA 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 16202 000012DD D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 16203 000012DF D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 16204 000012E1 86CD                    		xchg	ch, cl
 16205 000012E3 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16206 000012E7 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16207 000012EB 06                      		push	es
 16208 000012EC 1E                      		push	ds
 16209 000012ED 56                      		push	si
 16210 000012EE 57                      		push	di
 16211 000012EF B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 16212 000012F1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 16213                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 16214 000012F3 7231                    		jc	short FormaStatErr
 16215 000012F5 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 16216 000012FA 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 16217 000012FC 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 16218                                  
 16219                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16220                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 16221 000012FD 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 16222 000012FF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 16223 00001301 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 16224                                  
 16225 00001302 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16226                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 16227                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 16228 00001307 8936[AB05]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 16229 0000130B 8C06[AD05]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 16230                                  
 16231                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16232                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 16233                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 16234                                  		;mov	es, si
 16235 0000130F 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 16236                                  
 16237                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 16238 00001310 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 16239                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 16240 00001315 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 16241 0000131A C606[A905]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16242                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 16243 0000131F 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 16244                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 16245 00001321 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 16246 00001324 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 16247                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 16254                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 16255 0000132B 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 16256 0000132D 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 16257 00001330 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut

 16274                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 16275                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16276                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 16278
