 16295                                  
 16296                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16297                                  
 16298                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16299                                  ;
 16300                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 16301                                  ;
 16302                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 16303                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 16304                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 16305                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 16306                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 16307                                  ;
 16308                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16309                                  
 16310                                  ResetDisk:
 16311 0000133B 50                      		push	ax
 16312                                  
 16313                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16314 0000133C B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 16315 0000133F 3806[A905]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 16316                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16317                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 16318 00001343 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 16319                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 16320                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 16321 00001345 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 16322                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 16323                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 16324                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 16325 00001348 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 16326                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 16327 0000134A C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 16328                                  					; Zap up the speed
 16329 0000134F 58                      		pop	ax
 16330 00001350 C3                      		retn
 16331                                  
 16332                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16333                                  
 16334                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16335                                  
 16336                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16337                                  ;
 16338                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 16339                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 16340                                  ;
 16341                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 16342                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 16343                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 16344                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 16345                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 16346                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 16347                                  ;
 16348                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 16349                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 16350                                  ;
 16351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16352                                  
 16353                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16354                                  
 16355                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16356                                  ToRom:
 16357 00001351 53                      		push	bx
 16358 00001352 56                      		push	si
 16359                                  
 16360                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 16361                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 16362                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 16363                                  
 16364 00001353 F606[A905]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16365 00001358 7534                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 16366 0000135A 50                      		push	ax
 16367 0000135B 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 16368                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16369 0000135C 26807D3E02              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 2
 16370                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16371                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 16372                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16373                                  		;pushf	; not necessary	; (Save	the cmp	result)
 16374 00001361 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 16375                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 16376 00001365 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 16377                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 16378                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 16379 0000136A 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 16380 0000136E 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 16381                                  		
 16382 00001372 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 16383 00001375 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 16384 00001379 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 16385 0000137C 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 16386                                  					; Important for	format
 16387 00001380 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 16388                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 16389                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 16390                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16391                                  		;popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 16392 00001385 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 16393 00001387 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 16394                                  MotorStrtOK:
 16395 0000138C 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 16396 0000138D 58                      		pop	ax
 16397                                  GotValidDpt:
 16398 0000138E 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 16399 00001392 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 16400 00001394 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 16401 00001398 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 16402 0000139C 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 16403 0000139D 8E06[A804]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 16404 000013A1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 16405 000013A3 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 16406 000013A4 5E                      		pop	si
 16407 000013A5 5B                      		pop	bx
 16408 000013A6 C3                      		retn
 16409

 16411                                  
 16412                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16413                                  ; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16414                                  
 16415                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 16416                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1404h
 16417                                  
 16418                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16419                                  ;
 16420                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 16421                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 16422                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 16423                                  ;
 16424                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16425                                  
 16426                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16427                                  
 16428                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16429                                  ioctl_getown:
 16430 000013A7 E8FAF1                  		call	SetDrive
 16431 000013AA 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16432                                  					; Get physical drive number
 16433 000013AE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 16434                                  ownloop:
 16435 000013B2 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16436 000013B6 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 16437                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16438 000013B8 26F6453F20              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 20h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16439                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16440                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 16441                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16442                                  					; fi_own_physical
 16443 000013BD 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 16444                                  getnextBDS:
 16445 000013BF 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 16446 000013C2 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 16447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16448                                  
 16449                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16450                                  ;
 16451                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 16452                                  ; in al to al.
 16453                                  ;
 16454                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16455                                  
 16456                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16457                                  
 16458                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16459                                  ioctl_setown:
 16460 000013C4 E8DDF1                  		call	SetDrive
 16461 000013C7 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 16462                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 16463 000013CC E8A8F5                  		call	checksingle
 16464                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16465 000013CF FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 16466                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 16467                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 16468                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 16469                                  
 16470                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16471                                  ;
 16472                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 16473                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 16474                                  ;
 16475                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16476                                  
 16477                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16478                                  exitown:
 16479 000013D3 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 16480                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16481 000013D5 26F6453F10              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 10h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16482                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16483                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 16484                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16485                                  					; fi_am_mult
 16486 000013DA 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 16487 000013DC 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 16488                                  					; Get logical drive number
 16489                                  					; Get it 1-based
 16490 000013E0 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 16491                                  exitnomult:
 16492 000013E2 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16493 000013E6 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 16494                                  					; Exit normal termination
 16495                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16496                                  		; cf=0
 16497                                  		;clc
 16498 000013E9 C3                      		retn

 16521 000013F0 8606[A905]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting
 16522 000013F4 08C0                    		or	al, al

 16557                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16558                                  ;	get media id
 16559                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16560                                  ;
 16561                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 16562                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 16563                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 16564                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 16565                                  ;
 16566                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 16567                                  ;
 16568                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 16569                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 16570                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16571                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 16572                                  ;
 16573                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 16574                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 16575                                  ;
 16576                                  ; LOGIC:
 16577                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 16578                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 16579                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 16580                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 16581                                  ;
 16582                                  ; {
 16583                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 16584                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 16585                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 16586                                  ;	if (no error) then
 16587                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 16588                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 16589                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 16590                                  ;		};
 16591                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 16592                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 16593                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 16594                                  ;		};
 16595                                  ;	else
 16596                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 16597                                  ;
 16598                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16599                                  
 16600                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 16601                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 16602                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 16603                                  
 16604                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16605                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1478h)
 16606                                  
 16607                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16608                                  GetMediaId:
 16609 00001412 E8B000                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 16610 00001415 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 16611 00001419 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 16612 0000141E E88C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 16613 00001421 722E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 16614                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 16615 00001423 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 16616                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 16617                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 16618                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16619 00001428 7225                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7		
 16620                                  
 16621                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16622                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16623                                  		;mov	si, disksector+26h
 16624                                  		;;;
 16625                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16626                                  		;mov	si, disksector+43h ; BS_FAT32_VolID
 16627 0000142A BE[9401]                		mov	si, disksector+42h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 16628 0000142D 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB.FATSz16
 16629 00001432 7403                    		jz	short IOCtl_If3 ; FAT32 fs
 16630 00001434 83EE1C                  		sub	si, 1Ch         ; FAT (12-16) fs ; 43h-1Ch = 27h ; BS_VolID
 16631                                  		; si = disksector+26h = BS_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 16632                                  IOCtl_If3:
 16633                                  		;cmp	byte [si-1], 29h ; BS_BootSig or BS_FAT32_BootSig
 16634                                  		;;;
 16635 00001437 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 16636                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 16637                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 16638 0000143A 7512                    		jne	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 16639 0000143C C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 16640 00001440 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16641                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16642                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 16643 00001444 46                      		inc	si
 16644                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16645                                  		; si = disksector+27h (BS_VolID)
 16646                                  		;      or disksector+43h (BS_FAT32_VolID)
 16647                                  
 16648 00001445 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 16649                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 16650 00001448 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 16651                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 16652                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 16653 0000144B F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 16654                                  	
 16655                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16656                                  		; cf = 0
 16657                                  		;clc
 16658                                  
 16659 0000144D C3                      		retn
 16660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16661                                  
 16662                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16663                                  IOCtl_If2:
 16664 0000144E F9                      		stc	
 16665                                  IOCtl_If7:
 16666 0000144F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 16667                                  		;stc
 16668                                  IOCtl_If6:
 16669                                  IOCtl_If1:
 16670 00001451 C3                      		retn
 16671                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 16674                                  
 16675                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16676                                  ;  set media id
 16677                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16678                                  
 16679                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 16680                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 16681                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 16682                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 16683                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 16684                                  ;	    the bds table.
 16685                                  ;
 16686                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 16687                                  ;
 16688                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 16689                                  ;	    the request packet.
 16690                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 16691                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16692                                  ;
 16693                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 16694                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 16695                                  ;
 16696                                  ; logic:
 16697                                  ;
 16698                                  ; {
 16699                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 16700                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 16701                                  ;	BootIo;
 16702                                  ;	if (no error) then
 16703                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 16704                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 16705                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 16706                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 16707                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 16708                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 16709                                  ;		};
 16710                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 16711                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 16712                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 16713                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 16714                                  ;		};
 16715                                  ;	else
 16716                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 16717                                  ;
 16718                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16719                                  
 16720                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16721                                  
 16722                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16723                                  SetMediaId:
 16724 00001452 E87000                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 16725 00001455 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 16726                                  					; Logical drive	number
 16727 00001459 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 16728 0000145B C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 16729 00001460 52                      		push	dx
 16730 00001461 E84900                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 16731 00001464 5A                      		pop	dx
 16732 00001465 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 16733                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 16734 00001467 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 16735                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 16736 0000146C 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 16737                                  
 16738                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16739                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 16740                                  		;			; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 16741                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 16742                                  		
 16743 0000146E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 16744 0000146F 57                      		push	di
 16745 00001470 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 16746 00001471 07                      		pop	es
 16747                                  
 16748                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16749                                  		;;;
 16750                                  		;mov	di, disksector+43h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 16751 00001472 BF[9401]                		mov	di, disksector+42h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig ; 24/12/2023 
 16752 00001475 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB.FATSz16
 16753 0000147A 7403                    		jz      short IOCtl_If5	; FAT32 fs
 16754 0000147C 83EF1C                  		sub	di, 1Ch		; 67-28 ; offset disksektor+27h
 16755                                  		; di = disksector+26h = BS_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 16756                                  IOCtl_If5:
 16757                                  		;cmp	byte [di-1], 29h ; BS_BootSig or BS_FAT32_BootSig
 16758 0000147F 803D29                  		cmp	byte [di], 29h
 16759 00001482 7404                    		je	short IOCtl_If8
 16760 00001484 5F                      		pop	di		; not extended boot record
 16761 00001485 07                      		pop	es
 16762                                  		;jmp	short IOCtl_If7
 16763                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16764 00001486 EBC6                    		jmp	short IOCtl_If2
 16765                                  IOCtl_If8:
 16766                                  		;;;
 16767                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16768                                  		;mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 16769 00001488 47                      		inc	di
 16770                                  		; di = disksector+27h (BS_VolID)
 16771                                  		;      or disksector+43h (BS_FAT32_VolID)
 16772                                  
 16773 00001489 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 16774 0000148D C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16775 00001490 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 16776                                  		
 16777                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16778                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 16779                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 16780                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 16781                                  		;rep movsb
 16782 00001493 E8B2FF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 16783                                  
 16784 00001496 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 16785 00001497 1F                      		pop	ds
 16786 00001498 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 16787 00001499 07                      		pop	es
 16788 0000149A E8B2F3                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 16789 0000149D 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 16790 0000149F C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 16791 000014A4 E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 16792 000014A7 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 16793                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 16794                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 16795 000014AC C3                      		retn
 16796                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16797                                  
 16798                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16799                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
 16800                                  ;		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 16801                                  ;		stc
 16802                                  ;IOCtl_If6:
 16803                                  ;		retn
 16804                                  
 16805                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16806                                  
 16807                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16808                                  
 16809                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16810                                  ;	BootIo
 16811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16812                                  ;
 16813                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 16814                                  ;
 16815                                  ; input :
 16816                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 16817                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 16818                                  ;
 16819                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 16820                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 16821                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 16822                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 16823                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 16824                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 16825                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 16826                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 16827                                  ;
 16828                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 16829                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 16830                                  ;
 16831                                  ; logic:
 16832                                  ;
 16833                                  ; {
 16834                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 16835                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 16836                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 16837                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 16838                                  ; }
 16839                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16840                                  
 16841                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16842                                  BootIo:	
 16843 000014AD 06                      		push	es
 16844 000014AE 57                      		push	di
 16845 000014AF 53                      		push	bx
 16846 000014B0 1E                      		push	ds
 16847 000014B1 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 16848                                  
 16849                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 16850                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 16851                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 16852                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 16853                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 16854                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 16855                                  
 16856 000014B2 BF[5201]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 16857 000014B5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 16858 000014B7 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 16859 000014BB B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 16860 000014BE E850F5                  		call	diskio
 16861 000014C1 5B                      		pop	bx
 16862 000014C2 5F                      		pop	di
 16863 000014C3 07                      		pop	es
 16864 000014C4 C3                      		retn
 16865                                  
 16866                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16867                                  
 16868                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16869                                  
 16870                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16871                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 16872                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16873                                  ;
 16874                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 16875                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 16876                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 16877                                  ; history in the flags.
 16878                                  ;
 16879                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 16880                                  ;
 16881                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 16882                                  ;
 16883                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 16884                                  ;
 16885                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 16886                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 16887                                  ;
 16888                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16889                                  
 16890                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16891                                  ChangeLineChk:

 16893 000014C9 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?

 16927                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16928                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 16929                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16930                                  ;
 16931                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 16932                                  ;
 16933                                  ; INPUT :
 16934                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 16935                                  ;
 16936                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 16937                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 16938                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16939                                  
 16940                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16941                                  
 16942                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16943                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 16944 000014EF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 16945 000014F3 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16946                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 16947                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16948 000014F6 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 16949                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16950 000014F8 26F6454002              		test	byte [es:di+40h], 02h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16951                                  		;test	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 200h
 16952                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16953                                  		;test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 16954                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16955                                  					; unformatted_media
 16956 000014FD 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 16957                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 16958                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16959 000014FF 40                      		inc	ax
 16960                                  GafDone:				
 16961 00001500 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 16962 00001503 C3                      		retn
 16963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16964                                  
 16965                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16966                                  
 16967                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16968                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 16969                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16970                                  ;
 16971                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 16972                                  ;
 16973                                  ; input :
 16974                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 16975                                  ;
 16976                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 16977                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16978                                  
 16979                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16980                                  
 16981                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16982                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 16983 00001504 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 16984 00001508 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16985                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16986 0000150B 26806540FD              		and	byte [es:di+40h], 0FDh ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16987                                  		;and	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 0FDFFh
 16988                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16989                                  		;and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 16990                                  		;;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16991                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 16992 00001510 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 16993 00001514 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 16994                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16995 00001516 26804D4002              		or	byte [es:di+40h], 02h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 16996                                  		;or	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 200h
 16997                                  		; 15/04/2024
 16998                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16999                                  		;or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 17000                                  		;;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 17001                                  					; unformatted_media
 17002                                  saf_Done:				
 17003 0000151B C3                      		retn

 17008                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17009                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 17010                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17011                                  ;
 17012                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 17013                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 17014                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 17015                                  ;
 17016                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17017                                  
 17018                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17019                                  
 17020                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17021                                  ioctl_support_query:
 17022 0000151C 06                      		push	es
 17023 0000151D C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 17024 00001521 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 17025                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 17026                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17027                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 17028 00001525 3C48                    		cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 17029                                  					; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 17030 00001527 7404                    		je	short ioctl_support
 17031                                  
 17032 00001529 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 17033                                  					; See if major code is 8
 17034 0000152B 7513                    		jne	short nosupport
 17035                                  ioctl_support:
 17036 0000152D 0E                      		push	cs
 17037 0000152E 07                      		pop	es
 17038                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17039                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17040 0000152F B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 17041                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 17042                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17043 00001532 BF[BD0E]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 17044                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 17045                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 17046 00001535 86E0                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 17047 00001537 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 17048 00001539 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 17049 0000153B B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 17050                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17051                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 17052                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 17053                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 17054                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 17055                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17056                                  ioctlsupexit:
 17057 0000153E 07                      		pop	es
 17058                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17059                                  		; cf = 0
 17060                                  		;clc
 17061 0000153F C3                      		retn
 17062                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17063                                  nosupport:
 17064 00001540 07                      		pop	es
 17065 00001541 E991EB                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 17066                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17067                                  
 17068                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17069                                  
 17070                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17071                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 17072                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17073                                  ;
 17074                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 17075                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 17076                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 17077                                  ;	    drive)
 17078                                  ;
 17079                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 17080                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 17081                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 17082                                  ;
 17083                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 17084                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 17085                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 17086                                  ;
 17087                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 17088                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 17089                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 17090                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 17091                                  ;
 17092                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 17093                                  ;
 17094                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 17095                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 17096                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 17097                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 17098                                  ; 
 17099                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17100                                  
 17101                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17102                                  SenseMediaType:
 17103 00001544 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 17104 00001548 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17105                                  		; 10/10/2022
 17106                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 17107 0000154B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 17108 0000154D 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 17109                                  		;
 17110 0000154F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17111                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 17112                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17113                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 17114 00001553 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 17115                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 17116 00001555 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 17117 00001557 7216                    		jc	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 17118 00001559 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 17119                                  DetermineMediaType:
 17120 0000155B FEC8                    		dec	al
 17121 0000155D 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 17122 0000155F 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 17123 00001561 0404                    		add	al, 4
 17124 00001563 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 17125 00001565 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 17126 00001567 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 17127 00001569 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 17128                                  GotMediaType:
 17129 0000156B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 17130                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17131                                  		; cf = 0
 17132                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 17133 0000156E C3                      		retn
 17134                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17135                                  
 17136                                  MediaSenseEr:
 17137 0000156F 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 17138 00001572 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 17139 00001574 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 17140 00001576 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 17141 00001579 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 17142                                  UnknownMediaType:
 17143 0000157B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 17144                                  SenseErrExit:
 17145 0000157D B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 17146 0000157F F9                      		stc
 17147 00001580 C3                      		retn
 17148                                  
 17149                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17150                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17151                                  		;db    0
 17152                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17153

 17155                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:15F2h
 17156                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17157                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
 17158

 17160                                  
 17161                                  SetLockState:
 17162 00001581 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; set media lock state
 17163 00001585 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+13h]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17164                                  		;mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17165                                  		;call	check_int13h_exts_present
 17166                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17167 00001588 E82100                  		call	check_int13h_exts_p
 17168                                  		;mov	al, 3		; unknown command error
 17169 0000158B 721C                    		jc	short setlockst_ret
 17170 0000158D 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; [bx+A_LOCKSTATE_CONTROL.LOCKSTATE_FUNCTIONS]
 17171 0000158F B445                    		mov	ah, 45h
 17172 00001591 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE
 17173                                  		; (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 17174 00001593 884701                  		mov	[bx+1], al	; 1 = locked, 0 = not locked
 17175                                  		; [bx+A_LOCKSTATE_CONTROL.LOCKSTATE_FLAG]
 17176                                  		
 17177                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17178 00001596 EB0A                    		jmp	short sls_em
 17179                                  
 17180                                  ;		jnc	short setlockst_ret
 17181                                  ;		mov	al, ah
 17182                                  ;		call	maperror
 17183                                  ;setlockst_ret:
 17184                                  ;		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in case of carry
 17185                                  ;		retn
 17186                                  
 17187                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17188                                  
 17189                                  EjectMedia:
 17190                                  		;mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; eject media in drive
 17191                                  		;			; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17192                                  		;call	check_int13h_exts_present
 17193                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17194 00001598 E81100                  		call	check_int13h_exts_p
 17195                                  		;mov	al, 3		; unknown command error
 17196 0000159B 720C                    		jc	short ejectm_ret
 17197 0000159D B80046                  		mov	ax, 4600h
 17198 000015A0 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - EJECT MEDIA
 17199                                  		; (DL - drive)
 17200                                  sls_em:			; 26/12/2023
 17201 000015A2 7305                    		jnc	short ejectm_ret
 17202 000015A4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
 17203 000015A6 E800F8                  		call	maperror
 17204                                  setlockst_ret:		; 26/12/2023
 17205                                  ejectm_ret:
 17206 000015A9 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in case of carry
 17207 000015AB C3                      		retn
 17208                                  
 17209                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17210                                  
 17211                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17212                                  check_int13h_exts_p:
 17213 000015AC 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 17214                                  
 17215                                  check_int13h_exts_present:
 17216 000015B0 B441                    		mov	ah, 41h
 17217 000015B2 53                      		push	bx
 17218 000015B3 BBAA55                  		mov	bx, 55AAh
 17219 000015B6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - Check for INT 13h Extensions
 17220                                  					; BX = 55AAh, DL = drive number
 17221                                  					; Return: CF set if not supported
 17222                                  					; AH = extensions version
 17223                                  					; BX = AA55h
 17224                                  					; CX = Interface support bit map
 17225 000015B8 81FB55AA                		cmp	bx, 0AA55h
 17226 000015BC 5B                      		pop	bx
 17227 000015BD 7505                    		jnz	short exts_notsupported
 17228 000015BF F6C102                  		test	cl, 2		; bit 1 - drive locking and ejecting subset
 17229 000015C2 7503                    		jnz	short exts_supported
 17230                                  exts_notsupported:
 17231                                  		; 26/12/2023
 17232 000015C4 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 17233                                  		;
 17234 000015C6 F9                      		stc
 17235                                  exts_supported:
 17236 000015C7 C3                      		retn
 17237                                  
 17238                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 17239                                  
 17240                                  GetDrvMapInfo:
 17241 000015C8 8CD9                    		mov	cx, ds		; get drive map information
 17242                                  					;
 17243                                  					; es:di points to BDS which belongs to
 17244                                  					;	  the requested logical/dos drive number
 17245                                  					;
 17246                                  					; Format of parameter block:
 17247                                  					; Offset  Description (Table 01570)
 17248                                  					;  00h    (call) length of this buffer (in bytes)
 17249                                  					;  01h    (ret) number of bytes in parameter block
 17250                                  					;	    actually used
 17251                                  					;  02h    (ret) drive flags
 17252                                  					;  03h    (ret) physical drive number
 17253                                  					;	    00h-7Fh floppy
 17254                                  					;	    80h-FEh hard
 17255                                  					;	    FFh no physical drive
 17256                                  					;  04h    (ret) bitmap of logical drives associated with
 17257                                  					;	    physical drive
 17258                                  					;	    bit 0 = drive A:, etc.
 17259                                  					;  08h    (ret) relative block address of partition start
 17260                                  					;	    qword
 17261                                  					;
 17262                                  					; Ref: Ralf Brown's Interrupt List, INTERRUP.G
 17263 000015CA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 17264 000015CE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+13h]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17265 000015D1 B80381                  		mov	ax, 8103h	; ah = generic ioctl error code (81h)
 17266                                  					; al = unknown command error (03h)
 17267 000015D4 803F10                  		cmp	byte [bx], 10h	; parameter buffer length = 16 bytes
 17268 000015D7 7251                    		jb	short gdmi_4
 17269 000015D9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17270 000015DD 885703                  		mov	[bx+3], dl	; parameter block - offset 3 - physical drive number
 17271 000015E0 C6470110                		mov	byte [bx+1], 10h ; parameter block - actually used length
 17272 000015E4 268B4517                		mov	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensectors]
 17273 000015E8 894708                  		mov	[bx+8], ax	; parameter block - offset 8 - partition start LBA
 17274 000015EB 268B4519                		mov	ax, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensectors+2]
 17275 000015EF 89470A                  		mov	[bx+0Ah], ax	; parameter block - offset 10
 17276 000015F2 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax ; 0
 17277 000015F4 884702                  		mov	[bx+2], al	; drive flags = 0 (protected mode flags etc.)
 17278 000015F7 89470C                  		mov	[bx+0Ch], ax	; high dword of partition start address (LBA) is 0
 17279 000015FA 89470E                  		mov	[bx+0Eh], ax
 17280 000015FD 894704                  		mov	[bx+4], ax	; logical drive bitmap of same physical drive
 17281                                  					; initialized as 0
 17282 00001600 894706                  		mov	[bx+6], ax ; 0
 17283 00001603 8EC1                    		mov	es, cx
 17284                                  		;les	di, dword ptr es:start_bds ; 1st BDS
 17285 00001605 26C43E[1901]            		les	di, [es:start_bds]
 17286 0000160A B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; bit 0 (drive A:)
 17287                                  gdmi_1:
 17288 0000160D 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last BDS ?
 17289 00001610 7415                    		jz	short gdmi_3	; yes
 17290 00001612 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum], dl
 17291                                  					; is it same physical drive ?
 17292 00001616 7506                    		jnz	short gdmi_2	; no
 17293 00001618 094F04                  		or	[bx+4], cx	; set bit for logical drive index of this BDS
 17294                                  					; (previously) shifted bit (which is 1/ON) is in ax:cx
 17295 0000161B 094706                  		or	[bx+6], ax
 17296                                  gdmi_2:
 17297 0000161E D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; shift one left for setting the next drive's bit
 17298 00001620 D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		; set high word of the bit select (set) value
 17299 00001622 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; next BDS
 17300 00001625 EBE6                    		jmp	short gdmi_1	; loop until di = -1 (last BDS sign)
 17301                                  gdmi_3:
 17302 00001627 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h	; success
 17303                                  gdmi_4:
 17304 0000162A C3                      		retn
 17305                                  
 17306                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17307                                  
 17308                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 17309                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 17310                                  
 17311                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17312                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 17313                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17314                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 17315                                  
 17316                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 17317                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 17318                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 17319                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 17320                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 17321                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 17322                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 17323                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 17324                                  ;
 17325                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 17326                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 17327                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 17328                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 17329                                  ;
 17330                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 17331                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 17332                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 17333                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 17334                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 17335                                  ;
 17336                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 17337                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 17338                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 17339                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 17340                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 17341                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 17342                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 17343                                  
 17344                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 17345                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022
 17346                                  
 17347                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 17348                                  ;BIOSCODE:16AAh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMBIO.COM) ; 26/12/2023
 17349                                  
 17350                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 17351 0000162B 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 17352 0000162E 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 17353 00001630 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 17354 00001633 7432                    		jz	short mine
 17355                                  
 17356                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 17357                                  
 17358 00001635 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 17359 00001638 746D                    		jz	short win386call
 17360 0000163A 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 17361 0000163D 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 17362 0000163F E99800                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 17363                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17364                                  
 17365                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 17366 00001642 CF                      		iret
 17367                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17368                                  
 17369                                  int2f_replace_int13:
 17370 00001643 FA                      		cli	; 26/12/2023
 17371 00001644 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 17372 00001645 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 17373                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 17374                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 17375                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 17376 00001647 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 17377                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17378                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 17379                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 17380                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 17381                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 17382                                  		
 17383                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 17384                                  		;push	word [Orig13]

 17386                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 17387 00001650 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 17388

 17390                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 17391                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 17392                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 17393                                  		
 17394                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 17395                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17396 00001654 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 17397 00001658 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 17398                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 17399                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17400 0000165B 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 17401 0000165F 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 17402                                  
 17403 00001663 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 17404                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17405                                  		;pop	bx
 17406 00001664 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 17407                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 17408 00001665 58                      		pop	ax
 17409                                  i2f_iret:
 17410 00001666 CF                      		iret

 17488                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 17489                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 17490                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 17491                                  
 17492                                  win386call:
 17493 000016A7 1E                      		push	ds
 17494 000016A8 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 17495                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 17496                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 17497 000016AD 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 17498                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 17499 000016AF 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 17500 000016B1 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 17501                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 17502 000016B3 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 17503                                  		; 12/12/2022
 17504 000016B5 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 17505                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 17506 000016B8 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 17507                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 17508 000016BA 8026[1208]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 17509 000016BF EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 17510                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17511                                  
 17512                                  Win386Init:
 17513                                  		; 12/12/2022
 17514 000016C1 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 17515                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 17516 000016C4 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 17517                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 17518 000016C6 800E[1208]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 17519                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 17520                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 17521 000016CB 891E[E007]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 17522 000016CF 8C06[E207]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es

 17524 000016D3 BB[DE07]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 17525 000016D6 1E                      		push	ds
 17526 000016D7 07                      		pop	es
 17527                                  win_iret:
 17528 000016D8 1F                      		pop	ds
 17529                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 17530                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 17531                                  		; 02/09/2023

 17535                                  handle_multmult:
 17536 000016DA 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 17537 000016DC 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 17538 000016DE 1E                      		push	ds
 17539 000016DF E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 17540                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17541                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 17542                                  		;dec	bx
 17543 000016E2 BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 17544 000016E5 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 17545 000016E7 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 17546 000016E9 F7D3                    		not	bx
 17547 000016EB 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 17548 000016ED 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 17549 000016EF 43                      		inc	bx
 17550                                  try_1:
 17551 000016F0 1F                      		pop	ds
 17552                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret
 17553                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17554 000016F1 CF                      		iret
 17555                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17556                                  
 17557                                  try_2:
 17558 000016F2 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 17559 000016F4 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 17560 000016F6 1E                      		push	ds
 17561                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17562                                  		;xor	di, di
 17563                                  		;dec	di
 17564 000016F7 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 17565 000016FA 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 17566 000016FC E82800                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 17567 000016FF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 17568 00001702 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA

 17570 00001706 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 17571 00001708 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 17572                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17573                                  		;sub	di, di
 17574                                  		;dec	di
 17575 0000170A BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 17576                                  		;jmp	short InsuffHMA
 17577                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17578 0000170D 1F                      		pop	ds
 17579 0000170E CF                      		iret
 17580                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17581                                  
 17582                                  try_4:

 17584 0000170F 8B3E[D707]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 17585 00001713 83C30F                  		add	bx, 15
 17586                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 17587                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17588 00001716 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 17589                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer
 17590 00001719 011E[D707]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 17591 0000171D 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA

 17593                                  		;mov	ds:FreeHMAPtr, 0FFFFh
 17594                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped

 17601 00001726 CF                      		iret
