 18619 00001A9B F606[1208]01            swpdsk:		test	byte [IsWin386], 1
 18620                                  		;test	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Is win386 present?
 18621 00001AA0 7405                    		jz	short no_win386	; no, skip SetFocus
 18622                                  		
 18623                                  		; set focus to the correct VM
 18624                                  		;call	far ptr 70h:813h ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM BIOSCODE:1B2Ch
 18625                                  		;;call	far 70h:8D1h	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:179Ah
 18626                                  		; 17/10/2022
 18627 00001AA2 9A[1308]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:V86_Crit_SetFocus ; BIOSDATA:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 18628                                  		;call	far ptr	V86_Crit_SetFocus ; call far 70h:8D1h
 18629                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 18630                                  no_win386:
 18631 00001AA7 51                      		push	cx
 18632 00001AA8 52                      		push	dx
 18633 00001AA9 268A5505                		mov	dl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 18634                                  					; get the drive	letter
 18635                                  
 18636                                  ; WARNING : next two instructions assume that if the new disk is for drive B
 18637                                  ;           then existing dsk is drive A & vice versa
 18638                                  
 18639 00001AAD 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
 18640 00001AAF 80F601                  		xor	dh, 1
 18641 00001AB2 29C9                    		sub	cx, cx		; nobody has handled swap disk
 18642 00001AB4 B8004A                  		mov	ax, 4A00h	; multMULT<<8)|multMULTSWPDSK
 18643                                  					; broad	cast code for swap disk
 18644                                  					; Broadcast it
 18645 00001AB7 CD2F                    		int	2Fh
 18646 00001AB9 41                      		inc	cx		; cx == -1 ?
 18647 00001ABA 741E                    		jz	short swpdsk9	; somebody has handled it
 18648                                  
 18649                                  ; using a different drive in a one drive system so request the user change disks
 18650                                  
 18651 00001ABC 80C241                  		add	dl, 'A'
 18652                                  		; 17/10/2022
 18653 00001ABF 2E8816[F91A]            		mov	[cs:DRVLET], dl	; "A: and press any key when ready\r\n\n"
 18654                                  		; 16/10/2022
 18655                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:drvlet], dl
 18656                                  		;mov	byte ptr cs:17E4h, dl ; [cs:drvlet]
 18657                                  					; 0070h:3D54h =	2C7h:17E4h
 18658 00001AC4 BE[DD1A]                		mov	si, SNGMSG	; "\r\nInsert diskette for drive "
 18659                                  		;mov	si, 17C8h	; sngmsg
 18660                                  					; 0070h:3D38h =	2C7h:17C8h
 18661 00001AC7 53                      		push	bx
 18662 00001AC8 2E                      		cs
 18663 00001AC9 AC                      		lodsb			; get the next character of the message
 18664                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si]
 18665                                  wrmsg_loop:
 18666 00001ACA CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 18667                                  					; AL = character to display
 18668 00001ACC 2E                      		cs
 18669 00001ACD AC                      		lodsb
 18670                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si] ; cs lodsb
 18671                                  					; get the next character of the	message
 18672 00001ACE 08C0                    		or	al, al
 18673 00001AD0 75F8                    		jnz	short wrmsg_loop
 18674 00001AD2 E833E7                  		call	con_flush	; flush out keyboard queue
 18675                                  					; call rom-bios
 18676 00001AD5 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 18677 00001AD7 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 18678                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 18679 00001AD9 5B                      		pop	bx
 18680                                  swpdsk9:
 18681 00001ADA 5A                      		pop	dx
 18682 00001ADB 59                      		pop	cx
 18683 00001ADC C3                      		retn
 18684                                  
 18685                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18686                                  
 18687                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 18688                                  
 18689                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 18690                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 18691                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 18692                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 18693                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 18694                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18695                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18696                                  
 18697                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 18698                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1B67h
 18699 00001ADD 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 18700 00001ADF 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 18700 00001AE8 736B6574746520666F-
 18700 00001AF1 7220647269766520   
 18701                                  
 18702                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 18703                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1B83h
 18704 00001AF9 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 18704 00001B02 65737320616E79206B-
 18704 00001B0B 6579207768656E2072-
 18704 00001B14 656164790D0A       
 18705 00001B1A 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 18706                                  
 18707                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 18708                                  
 18709                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18710                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 18711                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 18712                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 18713                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18714                                  
 18715                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18716                                  chkopcnt:	
 18717 00001B1C 26837D3C00              		cmp     word [es:di+3Ch], 0
 18718                                  		;cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 18719 00001B21 C3                      		retn
 18720                                  
 18721                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 18722                                  
 18723                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18724                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 18725                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 18726                                  ;
 18727                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 18728                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18729                                  
 18730                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18731                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1BA6h
 18732                                  mediacheck:
 18733 00001B22 E852EE                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 18734 00001B25 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 18735 00001B27 E86101                  		call	haschange
 18736 00001B2A 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 18737                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18738                                  		;test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 18739 00001B2C E85001                  		call	checkromchange
 18740 00001B2F 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 18741 00001B31 50                      		push	ax
 18742 00001B32 52                      		push	dx
 18743 00001B33 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 18744                                  					; set logical drive number
 18745 00001B37 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 18746 00001B39 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 18747                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 18748                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 18749 00001B3B 5A                      		pop	dx
 18750 00001B3C 58                      		pop	ax
 18751 00001B3D 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 18752 00001B3F BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 18753                                  
 18754                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 18755                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 18756                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 18757                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 18758                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 18759                                  ; status.
 18760                                  		; 19/10/2022
 18761 00001B42 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 18762 00001B46 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 18763                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 18764                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 18765                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 18766                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 18767 00001B4A 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 18768                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 18769                                  
 18770                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 18771                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 18772                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 18773                                  
 18774 00001B4C 50                      		push	ax
 18775 00001B4D 51                      		push	cx
 18776 00001B4E 52                      		push	dx
 18777 00001B4F E8D8EA                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 18778 00001B52 5A                      		pop	dx
 18779 00001B53 59                      		pop	cx
 18780 00001B54 58                      		pop	ax
 18781 00001B55 09F6                    		or	si, si
 18782 00001B57 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 18783                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 18784 00001B59 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 18785                                  mediaret:
 18786 00001B5B C3                      		retn
 18787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18788                                  
 18789                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 18790                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 18791                                  ; or write.
 18792                                  
 18793                                  mediadovolid:
 18794 00001B5C E877EB                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 18795 00001B5F 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 18796 00001B61 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 18797 00001B64 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 18798 00001B66 E940F2                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 18799                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18800                                  
 18801                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 18802                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 18803                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 18804                                  ; dos.
 18805                                  ;
 18806                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 18807                                  
 18808                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 18809                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 18810                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 18811                                  
 18812                                  checklatchio:
 18813                                  
 18814                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 18815                                  
 18816                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18817                                  		;cmp	word [es:di+3Ch], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]	
 18818 00001B69 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 18819 00001B6C 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 18820                                  
 18821                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 18822                                  
 18823                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18824                                  		;test	word [es:di+3Fh], 40h
 18825                                  		;			; test [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 18826 00001B6E E80E01                  		call	checkromchange
 18827 00001B71 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 18828                                  
 18829                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 18830                                  ; expensive verification.
 18831                                  
 18832 00001B73 E860EB                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 18833 00001B76 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 18834 00001B78 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 18835 00001B7B 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 18836 00001B7D 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 18837 00001B7F 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 18838 00001B81 E88F00                  		call	returnvid
 18839                                  checklatchret:
 18840 00001B84 E822F2                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 18841                                  ret_no_error_map:
 18842 00001B87 F9                      		stc
 18843 00001B88 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 18844                                  checkret:
 18845 00001B89 C3                      		retn
 18846                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18847                                  
 18848                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 18849                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 18850                                  ;
 18851                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 18852                                  
 18853                                  checkfatvid:
 18854 00001B8A E8D101                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 18855 00001B8D 09F6                    		or	si, si
 18856 00001B8F 7835                    		js	short changed_drv
 18857                                  
 18858                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 18859                                  
 18860                                  		; fall into check_vid
 18861                                  
 18862                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 18863                                  
 18864                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 18865                                  ;
 18866                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 18867                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 18868                                  ;
 18869                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 18870                                  ;
 18871                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 18872                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 18873                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 18874                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 18875                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 18876                                  ;
 18877                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 18878                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 18879                                  ; routine.)
 18880                                  ;
 18881                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 18882                                  
 18883                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18884                                  		; 19/10/2022
 18885                                  check_vid:
 18886                                  
 18887                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 18888                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 18889                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 18890                                  
 18891                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18892                                  		;;;
 18893 00001B91 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB_FATSz16
 18894 00001B96 7507                    		jnz     short chk_vid_1
 18895 00001B98 803E[9401]29            		cmp     byte [disksector+42h], 29h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig
 18896                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 18897 00001B9D EB05                    		jmp     short chk_vid_2
 18898                                  chk_vid_1:
 18899                                  		;;;
 18900 00001B9F 803E[7801]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 18901                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 18902                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 18903                                  chk_vid_2:		; 26/12/2023
 18904 00001BA4 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 18905 00001BA6 E8E200                  		call	haschange
 18906 00001BA9 74DE                    		jz	short checkret
 18907 00001BAB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 18908 00001BAD 803E[6201]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 ; BPB_NumFATs
 18909                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 18910 00001BB2 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 18911                                  					; if not fat system
 18912 00001BB4 E8F400                  		call	read_volume_id
 18913 00001BB7 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 18914 00001BB9 E89901                  		call	check_volume_id
 18915 00001BBC BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 18916                                  					; definitely changed
 18917 00001BBF 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 18918                                  
 18919 00001BC1 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 18920                                  vid_no_changed:
 18921 00001BC2 E8C000                  		call	resetchanged
 18922                                  		; 12/12/2022
 18923                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 18924                                  		;clc
 18925                                  checkfatret:
 18926 00001BC5 C3                      		retn
 18927                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18928                                  
 18929                                  		; 12/12/2022
 18930                                  changed_drv:
 18931 00001BC6 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 18932 00001BC7 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 18933                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 18934 00001BCC C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 18935                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18936                                  
 18937                                  ; extended id check
 18938                                  
 18939                                  ; 16/10/2022
 18940                                  
 18941                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 18942                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 18943                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 18944                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 18945                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 18946                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 18947                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 18948                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 18949                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 18950                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 18951                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 18952                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 18953                                  ;
 18954                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 18955                                  
 18956                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 18957                                  		; 19/10/2022
 18958                                  do_ext_check_id:
 18959                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18960                                  		;push	ax
 18961                                  		;;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 18962                                  		;			; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 18963                                  		;mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 18964                                  ; 26/12/2023
 18965                                  %if 1
 18966                                  		;;;
 18967 00001BCD 57                      		push	di
 18968 00001BCE BE[9501]                		mov	si, disksector+43h ; BS_FAT32_VolID
 18969                                  					; [DiskSector+FAT32_EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 18970 00001BD1 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB_FATSz16
 18971 00001BD6 7403                    		jz	short chk_vid_3
 18972 00001BD8 83EE1C                  		sub	si, 28		; BS_VolID
 18973                                  		; si = disksector+27h	; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 18974                                  chk_vid_3:
 18975                                  		; [es:di+89h] = [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 18976 00001BDB 81C78900                		add	di, 137		; BDS.vol_serial
 18977 00001BDF A7                      		cmpsw	; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL] ; (or FAT32_EXT_BOOT)
 18978                                  			;		= [di+BDS.vol_serial] ?
 18979 00001BE0 7501                    		jnz	short chk_vid_4
 18980 00001BE2 A7                      		cmpsw	; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2] ; (or FAT32_EXT_BOOT)
 18981                                  			;		= [di+BDS.vol_serial+2] ?
 18982                                  chk_vid_4:
 18983 00001BE3 5F                      		pop	di
 18984                                  		;pop	ax
 18985 00001BE4 7504                    		jnz	short ext_changed ; not equal/same
 18986 00001BE6 31F6                    		xor	si, si 		 ; 0 ; don't know
 18987 00001BE8 EBD8                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed ; reset the flag
 18988                                  		;;;
 18989                                  %else
 18990                                  		; 02/09/2023
 18991                                  		xor	si, si ; 0
 18992                                  		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 18993                                  		jnz	short ext_changed
 18994                                  		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 18995                                  		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 18996                                  		jnz	short ext_changed
 18997                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 18998                                  					; don't know
 18999                                  		pop	ax
 19000                                  		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 19001                                  					; reset the flag
 19002                                  %endif
 19003                                  
 19004                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19005                                  
 19006                                  ext_changed:
 19007                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19008                                  		;pop	ax
 19009                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19010                                  		;dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 19011 00001BEA BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 19012                                  					; disk changed!
 19013                                  		; 12/12/2022
 19014                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 19015                                  		;clc
 19016 00001BED EBD7                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 19017                                  
 19018                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19019                                  
 19020                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 19021                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 19022                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 19023                                  ;
 19024                                  ; es:di -> bds
 19025                                  
 19026                                  checkio:				
 19027 00001BEF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 19028 00001BF2 75D1                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 19029 00001BF4 E825FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 19030 00001BF7 74CC                    		jz	short checkfatret
 19031 00001BF9 E8DAEA                  		call	GetBp
 19032 00001BFC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 19033 00001BFE E889FF                  		call	checkfatvid
 19034 00001C01 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 19035 00001C03 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 19036 00001C05 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 19037 00001C07 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 19038 00001C08 C3                      		retn
 19039                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19040                                  
 19041                                  checkioerr:				
 19042 00001C09 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 19043                                  
 19044                                  checkioret:				
 19045 00001C0C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 19046 00001C0D E955F1                  		jmp	harderr
 19047                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19048                                  
 19049                                  no_error_map:				
 19050 00001C10 E955F1                  		jmp	harderr2
 19051                                  
 19052                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19053                                  
 19054                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 19055                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 19056                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 19057                                  
 19058                                  returnvid:		
 19059 00001C13 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 19060                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 19061 00001C16 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 19062 00001C19 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 19063 00001C1B F9                      		stc
 19064 00001C1C C3                      		retn
 19065                                  
 19066                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19067                                  
 19068                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 19069                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 19070                                  ;
 19071                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 19072                                  ; **trashes si**
 19073                                  
 19074                                  media_set_vid:				
 19075 00001C1D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 19076                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 19077                                  
 19078                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 19079                                  
 19080                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19081                                  
 19082                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 19083                                  
 19084                                  		; 14/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 19085                                  		; 19/10/2022
 19086                                  vid_into_packet:
 19087 00001C20 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 19088 00001C21 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 19089                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 19090                                  		; 14/04/2024
 19091 00001C25 83C77D                  		add	di, 125	; (PCDOS 7.1)
 19092 00001C28 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 19093                                  		;sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 19094 00001C2A 83EF7D                  		sub	di, 125
 19095 00001C2D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 19096 00001C30 1F                      		pop	ds
 19097                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 19098 00001C31 C3                      		retn
 19099                                  
 19100                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19101                                  
 19102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19103                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 19104                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 19105                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 19106                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 19107                                  ;
 19108                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 19109                                  ;		ah has media byte
 19110                                  ;
 19111                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 19112                                  ;		    no registers modified
 19113                                  ;		carry set
 19114                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 19115                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 19116                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 19117                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 19118                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 19119                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 19120                                  ;
 19121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19122                                  
 19123                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19124                                  hidensity:
 19125                                  
 19126                                  ; check for correct drive
 19127                                  		
 19128                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19129 00001C32 26F6453F02              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 2 ; is it special?
 19130                                  		; 12/12/2022
 19131                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 2
 19132                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?
 19133                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 19134 00001C37 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 19135                                  
 19136                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 19137                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 19138                                  
 19139                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19140 00001C39 26807D3E02              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 2 ; is it single-media?
 19141                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 19142 00001C3E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 19143                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 19144                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 19145 00001C40 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 19146 00001C43 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 19147                                  
 19148                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 19149                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 19150                                  
 19151                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 19152                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19153 00001C45 268A453E                		mov	al, [es:di+3Eh] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 19154                                  		;mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 19155 00001C49 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 19156                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 19157                                  					; ffOther
 19158 00001C4B 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 19159 00001C4D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 19160                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 19161                                  					; ff288
 19162 00001C4F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 19163 00001C51 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 19164 00001C53 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 19165                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 19166                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 19167 00001C56 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 19168                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 19169                                  					; 2 sides
 19170                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19171 00001C59 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 19172 00001C5A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 19173                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 19174                                  					; & head max
 19175                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 19176 00001C5D E9EAEA                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 19177                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19178                                  
 19179                                  Is720K:
 19180                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19181 00001C60 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address
 19182                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 19183 00001C61 E9A9EA                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 19184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19185                                  
 19186                                  		; 18/12/2022
 19187                                  ;dofloppy:
 19188                                  		;retn
 19189                                  
 19190                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19191                                  
 19192                                  ; 16/10/2022
 19193                                  
 19194                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19195                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 19196                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 19197                                  ;
 19198                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 19199                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 19200                                  ;   outputs:	none
 19201                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 19202                                  ;
 19203                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 19204                                  ;
 19205                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 19206                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19207                                  
 19208                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19209                                  set_changed_dl:	
 19210 00001C64 06                      		push	es
 19211 00001C65 57                      		push	di
 19212                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 19213                                  		; 19/10/2022
 19214 00001C66 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 19215                                  
 19216                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 19217                                  
 19218                                  scan_bds:
 19219 00001C6A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 19220 00001C6E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 19221                                  
 19222                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 19223                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 19224                                  
 19225                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19226 00001C70 26095D3F                		or	[es:di+3Fh], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 19227                                  		;or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 19228                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 19229                                  get_next_bds:
 19230 00001C74 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 19231                                  					; go to	next bds
 19232 00001C77 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 19233 00001C7A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 19234 00001C7C 5F                      		pop	di
 19235 00001C7D 07                      		pop	es
 19236 00001C7E C3                      		retn
 19237                                  
 19238                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19239                                  
 19240                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19241                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 19242                                  ;
 19243                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 19244                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 19245                                  ;		zero reset - change
 19246                                  ;   registers modified: none
 19247                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19248                                  
 19249                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19250                                  checkromchange:	
 19251                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 19252                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19253 00001C7F 26F6453F40              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 40h
 19254                                  		; 10/12/2022
 19255                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 19256                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 19257                                  					; fchanged
 19258 00001C84 C3                      		retn
 19259                                  
 19260                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19261                                  
 19262                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19263                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 19264                                  ;
 19265                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 19266                                  ;   outputs:	none
 19267                                  ;   registers modified: none
 19268                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19269

 19271                                  resetchanged:
 19272                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh
 19273                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19274 00001C85 2680653FBF              		and	byte [es:di+3Fh], 0BFh
 19275                                  		; 10/12/2022
 19276                                  		;and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 19277                                  		;;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 19278                                  					; ~fchanged
 19279 00001C8A C3                      		retn
 19280

 19282                                  
 19283                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19284                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line

 19287                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 19288                                  ;		zero reset - change line available

 19298                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 2
 19299                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 19300                                  					; fchangeline
 19301 00001C90 C3                      		retn
 19302                                  
 19303                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19304                                  
 19305                                  ; 16/10/2022
 19306                                  
 19307                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19308                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 19309                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 19310                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 19311                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 19312                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 19313                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19314                                  
 19315                                  ; set_volume_id
 19316                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 19317                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 19318                                  ;
 19319                                  ;   on entry:
 19320                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 19321                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 19322                                  ;
 19323                                  ;   on exit:
 19324                                  ;	carry clear:
 19325                                  ;	   successful call
 19326                                  ;	carry set
 19327                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 19328                                  
 19329                                  set_volume_id:
 19330 00001C91 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 19331 00001C92 50                      		push	ax
 19332 00001C93 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 19333 00001C96 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 19334 00001C98 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 19335 00001C9B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 19336 00001C9D E8A900                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 19337 00001CA0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 19338                                  setvret:				
 19339                                  		; 10/12/2022
 19340                                  		; cf = 0
 19341                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 19342 00001CA3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 19343 00001CA4 5A                      		pop	dx
 19344 00001CA5 C3                      		retn
 19345                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19346                                  
 19347                                  seterr:
 19348 00001CA6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 19349 00001CA7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 19350 00001CA8 C3                      		retn
 19351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19352 00001CA9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 19353                                  
 19354                                  ; 16/10/2022
 19355                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 19356                                  ; 09/12/2022
 19357                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 19358                                  
 19359                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19360                                  
 19361                                  ; 16/10/2022
 19362                                  
 19363                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 19364                                  ;
 19365                                  ;   on entry:
 19366                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 19367                                  ;
 19368                                  ;   on exit:
 19369                                  ;	carry clear
 19370                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 19371                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 19372                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 19373                                  ;
 19374                                  ;	carry set:
 19375                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 19376                                  
 19377                                  read_volume_id:
 19378 00001CAB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 19379 00001CAC 51                      		push	cx
 19380 00001CAD 53                      		push	bx
 19381 00001CAE 50                      		push	ax
 19382 00001CAF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 19383 00001CB0 57                      		push	di
 19384 00001CB1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 19385 00001CB2 07                      		pop	es
 19386 00001CB3 BF[4008]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 19387 00001CB6 BE[6305]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 19388                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19389 00001CB9 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 19390                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 19391                                  		
 19392                                  		;rep	movsb
 19393                                  		; 26/12/2023
 19394                                  		;rep movs byte ptr es:[di], byte ptr cs:[si]
 19395                                  		;db 0FBh,2Eh,0A4h 
 19396                                  		;cs	; nul_vid is in BIOSCODE segment 
 19397                                  		;rep movsb
 19398 00001CBC F3                      		rep
 19399 00001CBD 2E                      		cs
 19400 00001CBE A4                      		movsb	
 19401                                  		
 19402 00001CBF 5F                      		pop	di
 19403 00001CC0 07                      		pop	es
 19404 00001CC1 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 19405                                  					; # of fats
 19406 00001CC5 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 19407                                  					; sectors / fat
 19408 00001CC9 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 19409 00001CCB 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 19410                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 19411                                  					;
 19412                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 19413                                  		; 17/10/2022
 19414 00001CCF 2EA3[A91C]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 19415                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 19416                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 19417 00001CD3 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 19418                                  					; # root dir entries
 19419 00001CD7 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 19420 00001CD9 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 19421                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 19422                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 19423 00001CDB 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 19424                                  next_sec:
 19425 00001CDC 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 19426 00001CDD 2EA1[A91C]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 19427                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 19428                                  					; get sector #
 19429 00001CE1 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 19430                                  					; sectors / track
 19431 00001CE5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 19432 00001CE7 F7F1                    		div	cx
 19433                                  
 19434                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 19435                                  
 19436 00001CE9 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 19437                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 19438 00001CEA 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 19439 00001CEC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 19440 00001CEE 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 19441                                  					; # heads on this disc
 19442 00001CF2 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 19443 00001CF4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 19444 00001CF6 E8BDEB                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 19445                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 19446 00001CF9 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 19447 00001CFB B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 19448 00001CFE B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 19449                                  fvid_loop:
 19450                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 19451 00001D00 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 19452                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 19453 00001D02 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 19454 00001D04 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 19455 00001D07 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 19456 00001D09 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 19457 00001D0C 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 19458                                  ent_loop:
 19459 00001D0E 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 19460 00001D11 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 19461 00001D13 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 19462 00001D14 2EFF06[A91C]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 19463                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 19464                                  					; next sector
 19465 00001D19 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 19466                                  notfound:
 19467                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19468                                  		;xor	si, si
 19469 00001D1B EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 19470                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19471                                  
 19472                                  found_vid:
 19473                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19474                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)
 19475 00001D1D 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 19476 00001D1E 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 19477 00001D20 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 19478 00001D21 57                      		push	di
 19479 00001D22 1E                      		push	ds
 19480 00001D23 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 19481 00001D24 BF[4008]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 19482 00001D27 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 19483                                  					; length of string minus nul
 19484 00001D2A F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 19485                                  		;xor	al, al
 19486                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19487 00001D2C 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 19488 00001D2D AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 19489                                  		;;xor	si, si
 19490                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19491                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 19492 00001D2E 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 19493 00001D2F 07                      		pop	es
 19494                                  fvid_ret:
 19495                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19496 00001D30 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 19497                                  				
 19498 00001D32 58                      		pop	ax
 19499                                  		; 10/12/2022
 19500                                  		; cf = 0
 19501                                  		;clc
 19502                                  rvidret:
 19503 00001D33 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 19504 00001D34 59                      		pop	cx
 19505 00001D35 5A                      		pop	dx
 19506 00001D36 C3                      		retn
 19507                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19508                                  
 19509                                  no_vid:
 19510 00001D37 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 19511                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 19512                                  		; 02/09/2023
 19513 00001D38 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 19514                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19515                                  
 19516                                  readviderr:
 19517 00001D3A 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 19518 00001D3B 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead
 19519 00001D3C EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 19520                                  
 19521                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19522                                  		; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19523                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 19524                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 19525                                  preset_volid_addr:
 19526 00001D3E BE[4008]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 19527                                  		; 26/12/2023

 19529 00001D41 83C77D                  		add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 19530 00001D44 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 19531                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 19532                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 19533                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 19534                                  		;
 19535 00001D47 FC                      		cld
 19536 00001D48 C3                      		retn
 19537                                  
 19538                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19539                                  
 19540                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 19541                                  ;

 19543                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp

 19552

 19554                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid

 19561

 19563                                  		
 19564                                  		; 27/12/2023
 19565 00001D51 5E                      		pop	si
 19566                                  chk_volid_ok:
 19567 00001D52 59                      		pop	cx
 19568                                  		;pop	si
 19569 00001D53 5F                      		pop	di
 19570 00001D54 C3                      		retn
 19571                                  
 19572                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19573                                  
 19574                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 19575                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 19576                                  ;
 19577                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 19578                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 19579                                  
 19580                                  		; 27/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 19581                                  check_volume_id:
 19582 00001D55 57                      		push	di
 19583 00001D56 51                      		push	cx
 19584                                  		
 19585                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 19586                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 19587                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 19588                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 19589                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 19590                                  		;cld
 19591                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 19592 00001D57 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 19593                                  
 19594 00001D5A F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 19595                                  		
 19596                                  		; 27/12/2023
 19597                                  		;pop	cx
 19598                                  		;pop	di
 19599                                  		;retn
 19600 00001D5C EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 19601                                  
 19602                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 19603                                  
 19604                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 19605                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 19606                                  ;
 19607                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 19608                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 19609                                  ;
 19610                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 19611                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 19612                                  ;
 19613                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 19614                                  
 19615                                  fat_check:
 19616 00001D5E 50                      		push	ax
 19617 00001D5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 19618 00001D61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 19619 00001D64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 19620                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 19621 00001D68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 19622 00001D6A 4E                      		dec	si
 19623                                  okret1:
 19624 00001D6B 58                      		pop	ax
 19625 00001D6C C3                      		retn
 19626                                  
 19627                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19628

 19630                                  		;times 2 db 0
 19631

 19633                                  		;times 7 db 0
 19634

 19636                                  
 19637                                  		; 09/12/2022
 19638                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 19639                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 19640                                  
 19641                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19642                                  
 19643                                  		; 09/12/2022
 19644                                  		;db 0
 19645                                  
 19646                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 19647                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 19648                                  
 19649                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 19650 00001D6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 19651                                  %endif
 19652                                  
 19653                                  ;align 16
 19654                                  
 19655                                  ; 09/12/2022
 19656                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 19657                                  ; 29/09/2023
 19658                                  BCODEEND:

 19718                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 19719                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN)

 19724                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 19725                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 19726                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 19727                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 19728                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 19729                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 19730                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 19731                                  ;
 19732                                  ;
 19733                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 19734                                  ;
 19735                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 19736                                  ;
 19737                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 19738                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 19739                                  ;
 19740                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 19741                                  ;
 19742                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 19743                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 19744                                  ;
 19745                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 19746                                  ;
 19747                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 19748                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 19749                                  ;value.
 19750                                  ;
 19751                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 19752                                  ;
 19753                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 19754                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 19755                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 19756                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 19757                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 19758                                  ;
 19759                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 19760                                  ;
 19761                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 19762                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 19763                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 19764                                  ;
 19765                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 19766                                  ;
 19767                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 19768                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 19769                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 19770                                  ;
 19771                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 19772                                  ;
 19773                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 19774                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 19775                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 19776                                  ;
 19777                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 19778                                  ;
 19779                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 19780                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 19781                                  ;
 19782                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 19783                                  ;
 19784                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 19785                                  ;
 19786                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 19787                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 19788                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 19789                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 19790                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 19791                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 19792                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 19793                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 19794                                  ;memory.
 19795                                  ;NOTES:
 19796                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 19797                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 19798                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 19799                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 19800                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 19801                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 19802                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 19803                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 19804                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 19805                                  
 19806                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19807                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 19808                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19809                                  
 19810                                  ;include version.inc
 19811                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 19812                                  
 19813                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 19814                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 19815                                  
 19816                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 19817                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 19818                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 19819                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 19820                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 19821                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 19822                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 19823

 19825                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------

 19829

 19860                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.

 19867                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 19868                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 19869                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 19870                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 19871                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 19872                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 19873                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 19874                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
