 36809                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36810                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 36811                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 36812                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36813                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 36814                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 36815                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 36816                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 36817                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36818                                  
 36819                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36820                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 36821                                  findUMB:
 36822                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36823                                  	;push	ax
 36824                                  	; 02/01/2023
 36825 00002C94 51                      	push	cx ; *
 36826                                  	;push	dx
 36827                                  
 36828 00002C95 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 36829                                  
 36830 00002C97 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 36831                                  
 36832 00002C99 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 36833                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36834                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 36835 00002C9C 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 36836                                  
 36837                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36838                                  fu10:
 36839 00002C9E 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 36840                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 36841                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 36842                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 36843                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 36844                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 36845                                  
 36846                                  ;fu10:	
 36847 00002CA0 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 36848 00002CA2 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 36849                                  
 36850 00002CA4 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 36851 00002CA7 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 36852                                  
 36853 00002CA9 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 36854                                  fu20:	
 36855                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 36856                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 36857                                  	; 19/07/2023
 36858 00002CAA 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 36859 00002CB0 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 36860                                  
 36861                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 36862                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36863                                  	; ax = es
 36864                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 36865                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 36866 00002CB2 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 36867 00002CB7 40                      	inc	ax
 36868                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36869                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 36870 00002CB8 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 36871                                  fuE:	
 36872 00002CBA F9                      	stc
 36873                                  fuX:
 36874                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36875                                  	;pop	dx
 36876                                  	; 02/01/2023
 36877 00002CBB 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 36878                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 36879 00002CBC C3                      	retn
 36880                                  
 36881                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36882                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 36883                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36884                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 36885                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 36886                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 36887                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 36888                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36889                                  
 36890                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36891                                  BigFree:
 36892                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36893                                  	;push	bx
 36894 00002CBD 51                      	push	cx
 36895                                  
 36896 00002CBE E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 36897 00002CC1 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 36898                                  
 36899 00002CC3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 36900 00002CC5 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 36901                                  
 36902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 36903                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 36904                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 36905                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 36906                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 36907                                  
 36908                                  bf10:	
 36909 00002CC7 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 36910 00002CCA 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 36911                                  
 36912                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 36913 00002CCC 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 36914 00002CD2 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 36915                                  
 36916 00002CD4 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 36917                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 36918 00002CD8 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 36919                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 36920                                  	; 19/07/2023
 36921 00002CDA 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 36922                                  
 36923 00002CDC 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 36924                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 36925 00002CDE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 36926                                  
 36927                                  bf20:	
 36928                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 36929                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 36930                                  	; 19/07/2023
 36931                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 36932 00002CE0 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 36933 00002CE6 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 36934                                  
 36935                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 36936 00002CE8 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 36937                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 36938 00002CEA 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 36939 00002CEF 40                      	inc     ax
 36940 00002CF0 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 36941                                  
 36942 00002CF2 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 36943                                  
 36944 00002CF4 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 36945 00002CF6 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 36946 00002CF8 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 36947 00002CFA 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 36948                                  bfE:	
 36949 00002CFC F9                      	stc
 36950                                  bfX:
 36951 00002CFD 59                      	pop	cx
 36952                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36953                                  	;pop	bx
 36954 00002CFE C3                      	retn
 36955                                  
 36956                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36957                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 36958                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36959                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 36960                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 36961                                  ; ERROR:    None
 36962                                  ; USES:     Flags
 36963                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36964                                  
 36965                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36966                                  
 36967                                  isSpecified:
 36968                                  	; 02/01/2023
 36969                                  	;push	ax
 36970                                  
 36971 00002CFF 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 36972 00002D01 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 36973                                  
 36974                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 36975                                  	;
 36976                                  	;push	ds
 36977                                  	;push	cs
 36978                                  	;pop	ds
 36979                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 36980                                  	;pop	ds
 36981                                  	
 36982                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 36983                                  	; 02/01/2023
 36984                                  	; ds = cs
 36985 00002D03 8A87[1A1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 36986                                  
 36987 00002D07 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 36988                                  
 36989                                  	; 09/09/2023
 36990                                  	; 02/01/2023
 36991                                  	;pop	ax
 36992                                  
 36993 00002D09 C3                      	retn
 36994                                  
 36995                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36996                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 36997                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36998                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 36999                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 37000                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 37001                                  ; USES:     Flags
 37002                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37003                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 37004                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 37005                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 37006                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 37007                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 37008                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37009                                  
 37010                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 37011                                  
 37012                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37013                                  
 37014                                  shrinkMCB:
 37015                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 37016                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37017                                  	;push	bx
 37018 00002D0A 51                      	push	cx
 37019 00002D0B 06                      	push	es
 37020                                  
 37021 00002D0C 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 37022                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37023                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 37024                                  
 37025 00002D0E 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37026                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37027 00002D13 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 37028                                  
 37029 00002D15 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 37030                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 37031                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 37032                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 37033                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37034                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 37035                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37036 00002D18 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 37037 00002D1A 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 37038                                  
 37039 00002D1C 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37040                                  	
 37041                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37042                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37043 00002D21 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 37044                                  
 37045 00002D23 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 37046 00002D28 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 37047                                  
 37048 00002D2E 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 37049 00002D30 40                      	inc	ax
 37050 00002D31 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 37051                                  
 37052 00002D33 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 37053 00002D35 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 37054                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37055                                  	; ax > 0
 37056 00002D37 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 37057                                  
 37058                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37059 00002D38 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 37060                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 37061 00002D3D 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 37062                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 37063                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 37064                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 37065                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 37066                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 37067                                  
 37068                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37069 00002D41 E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 37070                                  
 37071                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37072                                  	; cf=0
 37073                                  	;clc
 37074                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37075                                  	;jmp	short smX
 37076                                  smE:	
 37077                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37078                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 37079                                  	;stc
 37080                                  smX:	
 37081                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 37082 00002D44 07                      	pop	es
 37083 00002D45 59                      	pop	cx
 37084                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37085                                  	;pop	bx
 37086 00002D46 C3                      	retn
 37087                                  
 37088                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37089                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 37090                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37091                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 37092                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 37093                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37094                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 37095                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37096                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 37097                                  ;
 37098                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 37099                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 37100                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 37101                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 37102                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 37103                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 37104                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 37105                                  ;       Endif
 37106                                  ;    Endif
 37107                                  ; Endif
 37108                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 37109                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 37110                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 37111                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 37112                                  ;    ENDIF
 37113                                  ; ENDIF
 37114                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37115                                  
 37116                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37117                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 37118                                  _hideUMB_:
 37119                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37120                                  	; ds = cs
 37121                                  
 37122                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37123                                  	;push	bx
 37124                                  	;push	dx
 37125 00002D47 06                      	push	es
 37126                                  
 37127 00002D48 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 37128 00002D4A E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 37129 00002D4D 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 37130                                  
 37131 00002D4F 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 37132 00002D51 E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 37133 00002D54 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 37134                                  
 37135 00002D56 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 37136 00002D57 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 37137 00002D59 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 37138 00002D5C 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 37139                                  
 37140 00002D5D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 37141 00002D5F 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 37142                                  
 37143 00002D61 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 37144 00002D63 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 37145                                  
 37146 00002D65 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 37147 00002D67 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 37148 00002D6A EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 37149                                  hu_10:	
 37150                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 37151                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 37152                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37153                                  ;isTiny:
 37154                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 37155                                  	;or	al,al
 37156 00002D6C 800E[161F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 37157 00002D71 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 37158                                  
 37159 00002D73 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 37160 00002D76 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 37161                                  
 37162 00002D78 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es

 37670                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 37672                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 37673                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37674                                  ; USES:     Flags

 37678                                  	;push	ax
 37679

 37686 00002ED0 7519                    	jne	short ihm_x

 37688                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 37689 00002ED2 26813E0A004444          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 37690 00002ED9 7510                    	jne	short ihm_x

 37692                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h

 37793                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37794                                  ;
 37795                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 37796                                  ;
 37797                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 37798                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 37799                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 37800                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 37801                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 37802                                  ;
 37803                                  ;	Output : none
 37804                                  ;
 37805                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 37806                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 37807                                  ;
 37808                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37809                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 37810                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 37811                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 37812                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 37813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37814                                  
 37815                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37816                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37817                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 37818                                  InitDevLoad:
 37819                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37820                                  	;push	es ; *
 37821                                  
 37822                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37823                                  	; ds = cs
 37824 00002F26 803E[6B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 37825                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 37826                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 37827 00002F2B 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 37828                                  
 37829                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37830                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37831                                  ; %if 0
 37832                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37833 00002F2D 803E[5B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 37834                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 37835 00002F32 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 37836                                  
 37837                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 37838                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 37839                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 37840                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 37841                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 37842                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 37843                                  
 37844 00002F34 E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 37845                                  
 37846 00002F37 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 37847 00002F3A E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 37848 00002F3D E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 37849 00002F40 9C                      	pushf
 37850 00002F41 E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 37851 00002F44 9D                      	popf
 37852                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 37853                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 37854                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37855 00002F45 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 37856                                  
 37857                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 37858                                  
 37859                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37860                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 37861                                  InitForConv:
 37862                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37863                                  	; ds = cs
 37864 00002F47 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 37865                                  					;  current UMB ?
 37866 00002F4A 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 37867 00002F4C E84104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 37868 00002F4F E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 37869                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 37870 00002F52 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 37871                                  					;  in low memory
 37872                                  InitForHi:
 37873                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37874                                  	; ds = cs
 37875                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 37876                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 37877                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 37878 00002F54 A1[611F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 37879 00002F57 8B16[5D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 37880 00002F5B 0316[5F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 37881 00002F5F EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 37882                                  
 37883                                  InitForLo:
 37884                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37885                                  	; ds = cs
 37886                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 37887 00002F61 C606[6B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 37888                                  initforlo_x:
 37889                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37890                                  	; ds = cs
 37891                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 37892                                  					;  we are loading low
 37893                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 37894                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 37895 00002F66 A1[6003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 37896 00002F69 8B16[A102]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 37897                                  idl1:
 37898 00002F6D E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 37899                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37900                                  	; ds = cs
 37901                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 37902                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 37903                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 37904                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 37905 00002F70 A3[4F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 37906 00002F73 8916[511F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 37907 00002F77 C706[531F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 37908 00002F7D A3[551F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 37909                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37910                                  	;pop	es ; *
 37911 00002F80 C3                      	retn
 37912                                  
 37913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37914                                  ;
 37915                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 37916                                  ;
 37917                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 37918                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 37919                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 37920                                  ;		   current UMB
 37921                                  ;
 37922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37923                                  
 37924                                  SpaceInUMB:
 37925                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37926                                  	; ds = cs
 37927                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 37928                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 37929                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 37930 00002F81 A1[5F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 37931 00002F84 0306[5D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 37932 00002F88 2B06[611F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 37933                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37934                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 37935                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 37936                                  	;stc
 37937                                  	;retn
 37938                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37939 00002F8C 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 37940 00002F8F 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 37941                                  spcinumb1:
 37942 00002F91 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 37943                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37944                                  	; ds = cs
 37945 00002F92 3B06[4D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 37946                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 37947                                  spcinumb2:
 37948 00002F96 C3                      	retn
 37949                                  
 37950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37951                                  ;
 37952                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 37953                                  ;
 37954                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 37955                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 37956                                  ;
 37957                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37958                                  
 37959                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37960                                  ;
 37961                                  ;PrepareMark:
 37962                                  ;	push	ds
 37963                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 37964                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 37965                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 37966                                  ;	pop	ds
 37967                                  ;
 37968                                  ;	inc	ax
 37969                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 37970                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 37971                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 37972                                  ;	retn
 37973                                  
 37974                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37975                                  ;
 37976                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 37977                                  ;
 37978                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 37979                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 37980                                  ;		 the device.
 37981                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 37982                                  ;
 37983                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 37984                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 37985                                  ;	UMB.
 37986                                  ;
 37987                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 37988                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 37989                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 37990                                  ;
 37991                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37992                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37993                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 37994                                  
 37995                                  GetUMBForDev:
 37996                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37997                                  	; ds = cs
 37998 00002F97 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 37999 00002F9A B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 38000 00002F9D CD21                    	int	21h
 38001                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 38002                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 38003                                  
 38004 00002F9F 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 38005                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 38006                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38007 00002FA1 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 38008                                  
 38009 00002FA3 4B                      	dec	bx
 38010                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38011                                  	; ds = cs
 38012 00002FA4 391E[4D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 38013                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 38014 00002FA8 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 38015                                  
 38016 00002FAA 43                      	inc	bx
 38017                                  
 38018 00002FAB B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 38019 00002FAE CD21                    	int	21h
 38020 00002FB0 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 38021                                  
 38022                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38023                                  	;dec	ax
 38024                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 38025                                  	;
 38026                                  PrepareMark:
 38027 00002FB2 1E                      	push	ds
 38028 00002FB3 48                      	dec	ax
 38029 00002FB4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 38030 00002FB6 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 38031 00002FBC C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 38032 00002FC2 40                      	inc	ax
 38033 00002FC3 1F                      	pop	ds
 38034                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38035                                  	; ds = cs
 38036                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 38037                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 38038                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 38039                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 38040 00002FC4 891E[5F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 38041 00002FC8 A3[5D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 38042 00002FCB A3[611F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 38043                                  	;
 38044                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38045                                  	; cf=0
 38046                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 38047 00002FCE C3                      	retn
 38048                                  
 38049                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38050                                  %if 1
 38051                                  gufd_err:
 38052 00002FCF 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 38053                                  gufd_error:
 38054 00002FD1 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 38055 00002FD3 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 38056 00002FD4 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 38057                                  %endif
 38058                                  
 38059                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38060                                  %if 0
 38061                                  gufd_err:
 38062                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 38063                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38064                                  	; ds = cs
 38065                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 38066                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 38067                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 38068                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 38069                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 38070                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 38071                                  	stc
 38072                                  	retn
 38073                                  %endif
 38074                                  
 38075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38076                                  ;
 38077                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 38078                                  ;
 38079                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 38080                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 38081                                  ;
 38082                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 38083                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 38084                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 38085                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 38086                                  ;
 38087                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 38088                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 38089                                  ;
 38090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38091                                  
 38092                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38093                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 38094                                  
 38095                                  DevSetMark:
 38096 00002FD6 06                      	push	es
 38097                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38098                                  	;push	di
 38099 00002FD7 1E                      	push	ds
 38100 00002FD8 56                      	push	si
 38101 00002FD9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 38102 00002FDB 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 38103 00002FE1 40                      	inc	ax
 38104 00002FE2 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 38105                                  
 38106                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 38107                                  
 38108 00002FE6 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 38109                                  
 38110                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38111                                  	; ds = cs
 38112                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 38113 00002FE7 C536[7803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 38114                                  
 38115 00002FEB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38116 00002FED FC                      	cld
 38117                                  dsm_again:
 38118 00002FEE AC                      	lodsb
 38119 00002FEF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 38120 00002FF1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 38121 00002FF3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38122 00002FF5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 38123                                  isit_slash:
 38124 00002FF7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 38125 00002FF9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 38126 00002FFB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38127 00002FFD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 38128                                  isit_null:
 38129 00002FFF 08C0                    	or	al,al
 38130 00003001 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 38131 00003003 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 38132                                  
 38133 00003005 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 38134 00003008 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 38135                                  dsm_next_char:
 38136 0000300B AC                      	lodsb
 38137 0000300C 08C0                    	or	al, al
 38138 0000300E 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 38139 00003010 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 38140 00003012 7403                    	je	short blankout
 38141 00003014 AA                      	stosb
 38142 00003015 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 38143                                  blankout:
 38144 00003017 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 38145 00003019 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 38146 0000301B F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 38147                                  dsm_exit:
 38148 0000301D 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 38149 0000301E 5E                      	pop	si
 38150 0000301F 1F                      	pop	ds
 38151                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38152                                  	;pop	di
 38153 00003020 07                      	pop	es
 38154 00003021 C3                      	retn
 38155                                  
 38156                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38157                                  ;
 38158                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 38159                                  ;
 38160                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 38161                                  ;
 38162                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 38163                                  ;

 38607                                  ;
 38608                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 38609                                  ;
 38610                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 38611                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 38612                                  ;
 38613                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 38614                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 38615                                  ;
 38616                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 38617                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 38618                                  ;
 38619                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38620                                  
 38621                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38622                                  
 38623                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38624                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 38625                                  
 38626                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38627                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 38628                                  GetHexNum:
 38629 0000315A 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 38630 0000315C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38631                                  ghn_next:
 38632 0000315E 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 38633 00003161 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 38634 00003164 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 38635 00003166 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 38636 00003169 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 38637 0000316B 50                      	push	ax
 38638 0000316C 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 38639 0000316E E8780F                  	call	delim
 38640 00003171 58                      	pop	ax
 38641                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38642 00003172 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 38643 00003175 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 38644 00003177 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 38645                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 38646                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38647 0000317A 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 38648                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38649                                  	;mov	cx,4
 38650                                  ghn_shift1:
 38651 0000317C D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 38652 0000317E D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 38653 00003180 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 38654 00003182 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 38655 00003184 46                      	inc	si
 38656 00003185 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 38657                                  ghn_into_paras:
 38658 00003187 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 38659 0000318A 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 38660 0000318D F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 38661 00003191 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 38662                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38663                                  	;mov	cx,4
 38664                                  ghn_shift2:
 38665 00003193 F8                      	clc
 38666 00003194 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 38667 00003196 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 38668 00003198 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 38669 0000319A F8                      	clc
 38670 0000319B C3                      	retn
 38671                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38672                                  ghn_err:
 38673                                  gnib_err:
 38674 0000319C F9                      	stc
 38675                                  ghn_ret:
 38676                                  gnib_ret:
 38677 0000319D C3                      	retn

 38680                                  ;
 38681                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 38682                                  ;
 38683                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 38684                                  ;
 38685                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 38686                                  ;
 38687                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 38688                                  ;
 38689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38690                                  
 38691                                  GetNibble:
 38692 0000319E 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 38693                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 38694                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38695 000031A1 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 38696 000031A3 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 38697 000031A6 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 38698 000031A8 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 38699 000031AB C3                      	retn
 38700                                  is_it_hex:
 38701 000031AC 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 38702                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 38703                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38704 000031AF 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 38705 000031B1 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 38706 000031B4 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 38707 000031B6 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 38708 000031B9 C3                      	retn
 38709                                  
 38710                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38711                                  ;gnib_err:
 38712                                  ;	stc
 38713                                  ;gnib_ret:
 38714                                  ;	retn

 38717                                  
 38718                                  ; 12/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38719                                  
 38720                                  ; umb.inc (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 38721                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 38722                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 38723                                  
 38724                                  XMM_REQUEST_UMB	equ 10h
 38725                                  XMM_RELEASE_UMB	equ 11h
 38726                                  
 38727                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38728                                  
 38729                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38730                                  ;
 38731                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 38732                                  ;
 38733                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 38734                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 38735                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 38736                                  ;			; DS = data
 38737                                  ;
 38738                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 38739                                  ;
 38740                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 38741                                  ;
 38742                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38743                                  
 38744                                  umb_insert:
 38745 000031BA 1E                      	push	ds
 38746                                  
 38747                                  	; 31/12/2022
 38748                                  	; ds = cs
 38749                                  
 38750                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 38751 000031BB 8E1E[7A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 38752                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 38753 000031BF 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 38754 000031C3 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 38755 000031C5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 38756                                  ui_next:
 38757 000031C7 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 38758                                  					;    new block
 38759 000031C9 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 38760                                  					; Q: is current block the
 38761                                  					;    last
 38762 000031CB 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 38763 000031D1 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 38764                                  					; N: get next block
 38765 000031D3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 38766                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 38767 000031D5 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38768 000031D8 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 38769                                  
 38770                                  ui_insert:
 38771 000031DA 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 38772 000031DC 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 38773                                  
 38774 000031DD 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 38775 000031DF F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 38776                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 38777 000031E1 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 38778                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 38779 000031E6 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 38780                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 38781 000031EC 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 38782                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 38783 000031F0 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 38784                                  
 38785                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 38786                                  
 38787 000031F6 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 38788 000031F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 38789 000031FE 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 38790                                  					; mark as free
 38791 00003205 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 38792                                  					; start & end of new block
 38793 00003208 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 38794                                  
 38795                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 38796                                  	
 38797 0000320D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 38798 0000320F 43                      	inc	bx
 38799 00003210 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 38800 00003212 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 38801                                  
 38802                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 38803                                  					; this block
 38804 00003213 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 38805                                  	
 38806 00003215 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 38807 0000321B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 38808 00003222 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 38809 00003226 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 38810                                  
 38811 0000322D EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 38812                                  
 38813                                  ui_append:
 38814                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 38815 0000322F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 38816 00003234 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 38817                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 38818                                  					; block for the next arena.
 38819                                  	; 13/05/2019
 38820 0000323A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 38821                                  
 38822 00003240 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 38823 00003242 40                      	inc	ax
 38824 00003243 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 38825                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 38826 00003245 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 38827                                  
 38828 00003247 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 38829                                  
 38830 00003249 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 38831 0000324F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 38832 00003256 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 38833 0000325A 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 38834                                  
 38835                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 38836 00003261 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 38837 00003263 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 38838 00003269 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 38839                                  					; mark as free
 38840 00003270 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 38841 00003271 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 38842                                  ui_done:
 38843                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 38844 00003276 1F                      	pop	ds
 38845                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 38846                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 38847                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 38848 00003277 C3                      	retn
 38849                                  
 38850                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38851                                  ;
 38852                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 38853                                  ;
 38854                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 38855                                  ;
 38856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38857                                  
 38858                                  AllocUMB:
 38859                                  	; 31/12/2022
 38860                                  	; ds = cs
 38861 00003278 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 38862 0000327B 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 38863                                  au_next:
 38864 0000327D E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 38865 00003280 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 38866 00003282 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 38867 00003285 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 38868                                  au_coalesce:
 38869                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38870                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 38871                                  ;au_exit:
 38872                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 38873                                  ;	; ds = cs
 38874                                  ;	retn
 38875                                  
 38876                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38877                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 38878                                  
 38879                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38880                                  
 38881                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38882                                  
 38883                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38884                                  ;
 38885                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 38886                                  ;
 38887                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 38888                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 38889                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 38890                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 38891                                  ;
 38892                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 38893                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 38894                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 38895                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 38896                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 38897                                  ;
 38898                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38899                                  
 38900                                  umb_coalesce:
 38901                                  	; 31/12/2022
 38902                                  	; ds = cs
 38903 00003287 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 38904                                  
 38905 00003288 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 38906                                  
 38907                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 38908                                  	; 31/12/2022
 38909 0000328A 8E06[7A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 38910 0000328E 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 38911                                  uc_nextfree:
 38912 00003293 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 38913 00003295 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 38914                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 38915 00003297 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 38916 0000329C 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 38917                                  					; N: get next arena
 38918 0000329E E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 38919 000032A1 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 38920 000032A3 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 38921                                  uc_again:
 38922 000032A5 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 38923 000032A8 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 38924                                  uc_check:
 38925 000032AA 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 38926 000032AF 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 38927                                  					; Y: coalesce
 38928 000032B1 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 38929 000032B6 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 38930                                  	;add	[3],cx
 38931 000032B7 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 38932 000032BB 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 38933 000032BE 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 38934 000032C0 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 38935                                  
 38936                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38937                                  ;uc_done:
 38938                                  	;retn
 38939

 38948                                  	; ds = cs

 38951 000032C7 B452                    	mov	ah,52h
 38952 000032C9 CD21                    	int	21h			; get DOS DATA seg
 38953                                  	; 31/12/2022
 38954                                  	; ds = cs
 38955                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 38956 000032CB 8C06[7A1F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 38957 000032CF B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 38958 000032D2 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 38959                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 38960                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 38961 000032D4 891E[631F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 38962 000032D8 8C06[651F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 38963                                  	; 31/12/2022
 38964 000032DC 803E[791F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 38965                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 38966                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it
 38967                                  	; 12/12/2022

 38969 000032E3 E83900                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB
 38970                                  	;jc	short iau_err
 38971                                  	; 12/12/2022

 38973                                  	; 31/12/2022
 38974                                  	; ds = cs
 38975 000032E8 C606[791F]FF            	mov	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 38976                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 38977                                  ia_1:

 38979                                  	; cf=0
 38980                                  	;clc
 38981 000032ED C3                      	retn
 38982                                  iau_err:
 38983 000032EE F9                      	stc
 38984                                  iau_err2:
 38985 000032EF C3                      	retn

 38987                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38988                                  ;
 38989                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 38990                                  ;
 38991                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 38992                                  ;
 38993                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 38994                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 38995                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 38996                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 38997                                  ;				NC
 38998                                  ;			  else 
 38999                                  ;				CY
 39000                                  ;
 39001                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 39002                                  ;
 39003                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39004                                  
 39005                                  umb_allocate:
 39006                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39007                                  	; ds = cs
 39008 000032F0 50                      	push	ax
 39009 000032F1 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 39010 000032F3 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 39011                                  					;   possible
 39012                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39013 000032F6 FF1E[631F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 39014                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 39015                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 39016                                  					; the largest UMB
 39017 000032FA 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 39018 000032FC 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 39019                                  	
 39020 000032FE B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 39021                                  
 39022                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39023 00003300 FF1E[631F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 39024                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 39025                                  
 39026 00003304 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 39027                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 39028                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 39029 00003307 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 39030                                  ua_err:
 39031 00003309 F9                      	stc	
 39032                                  
 39033                                  	;clc
 39034                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39035                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39036                                  	; cf=0
 39037                                  	;clc 
 39038                                  ua_done:
 39039 0000330A 58                      	pop	ax
 39040 0000330B C3                      	retn
 39041                                  	; 27/07/2023
 39042                                  ;ua_err:
 39043                                  	;stc
 39044                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 39045                                  
 39046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39047                                  ;
 39048                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 39049                                  ;
 39050                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 39051                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 39052                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 39053                                  ;
 39054                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39055                                  
 39056                                  	; 01/11/2022
 39057                                  get_next:
 39058 0000330C 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 39059 00003311 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 39060                                  _get_next_:
 39061 00003313 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 39062 00003315 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 39063 00003319 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 39064 0000331A 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39065                                  	;clc
 39066                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39067                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39068                                  	; cf=0
 39069                                  	;clc
 39070 0000331C C3                      	retn
 39071                                  gn_err:
 39072 0000331D F9                      	stc
 39073                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 39074                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 39075 0000331E C3                      	retn
