 41221                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 41222                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 41223                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 41224                                  ;
 41225                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 41226                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 41227                                  
 41228                                  copyblock_loop:
 41229 00003AC6 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 41230 00003AC7 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 41231 00003ACA 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 41232 00003ACB 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41233                                  
 41234                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 41235                                  
 41236                                  copyblock_begin:
 41237                                  
 41238                                  ; 10/09/2023
 41239                                  %if 0
 41240                                          push    ax              ;
 41241                                          push    cx              ;
 41242                                          push    si              ;
 41243                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 41244                                          mov     di,szCommon
 41245                                          push    ds              ;
 41246                                          push    cs              ;
 41247                                          pop     ds              ;
 41248                                          call    comp_names      ;
 41249                                          pop     ds              ;
 41250                                          pop     di              ;
 41251                                          pop     si              ;
 41252                                          pop     cx              ;
 41253                                          pop     ax              ;
 41254                                          je	short copyblock_check
 41255                                  %endif
 41256                                  	; 10/09/2023
 41257 00003ACD 57                      	push	di
 41258 00003ACE BF[2A46]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 41259 00003AD1 E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 41260 00003AD4 5F                      	pop	di
 41261 00003AD5 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 41262                                  
 41263 00003AD7 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 41264 00003AD9 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 41265 00003ADB 57                              push    di              ;
 41266 00003ADC 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 41267 00003ADE 1E                              push    ds              ;
 41268 00003ADF 06                              push    es              ;
 41269 00003AE0 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41270 00003AE1 E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 41271 00003AE4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41272 00003AE5 5F                              pop     di              ;
 41273                                  copyblock_check:
 41274 00003AE6 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41275 00003AE8 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 41276 00003AEA E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 41277 00003AED EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 41278                                  
 41279                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 41280 00003AEF E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 41281 00003AF2 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 41282 00003AF5 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 41283 00003AF7 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 41284 00003AF9 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 41285 00003AFB 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 41286 00003AFD EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 41287                                  ;
 41288                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 41289                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 41290                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 41291                                  ;
 41292                                  move_config:
 41293 00003AFF 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 41294 00003B01 51                              push    cx              ;
 41295                                  ;
 41296                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 41297                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 41298                                  ;
 41299                                   	;mov	cx,7
 41300 00003B02 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 41301 00003B05 BE[1D46]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 41302 00003B08 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 41303                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 41304                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 41305                                  copy_boot: 
 41306                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 41307 00003B09 2E                              cs
 41308 00003B0A AC                      	lodsb
 41309 00003B0B 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 41310 00003B0D 47                              inc     di              ;
 41311 00003B0E E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 41312                                  
 41313 00003B10 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 41314                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 41315                                  	; 04/01/2023
 41316 00003B11 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 41317 00003B13 2E8B36[E745]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 41318 00003B18 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 41319 00003B1A 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 41320 00003B1C 0E                              push    cs              ;
 41321 00003B1D 07                              pop     es              ;
 41322 00003B1E BE[2A46]                        mov     si,szCommon
 41323 00003B21 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 41324 00003B24 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 41325 00003B27 7406                            je	short l2	;
 41326 00003B29 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 41327 00003B2B 46                              inc     si              ;
 41328 00003B2C 47                              inc     di              ;
 41329 00003B2D E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 41330 00003B2F C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 41331 00003B32 07                              pop     es              ;
 41332                                  
 41333                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 41334                                  
 41335 00003B33 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 41336 00003B35 2E893E[CF14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 41337 00003B3A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 41338 00003B3C 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 41339                                  
 41340 00003B3D 51                              push    cx              ;
 41341 00003B3E F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 41342 00003B40 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41343 00003B41 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 41344 00003B43 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41345                                  
 41346                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 41347                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 41348                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 41349                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 41350                                  ;   is empty.
 41351                                  
 41352 00003B44 06                              push    es              ;
 41353 00003B45 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 41354 00003B47 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 41355 00003B48 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 41356 00003B4E E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 41357 00003B51 07                              pop     es
 41358                                  
 41359                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 41360                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 41361                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 41362                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 41363                                  
 41364                                  menu_done:
 41365 00003B52 803E[DC45]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 41366 00003B57 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 41367 00003B59 06                              push    es              ;
 41368 00003B5A B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 41369 00003B5D 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 41370 00003B5F A1[E245]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 41371 00003B62 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 41372 00003B66 A0[E145]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 41373 00003B69 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 41374 00003B6D 07                              pop     es              ;
 41375                                  menu_exit:
 41376 00003B6E 890E[5203]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 41377 00003B72 890E[5403]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 41378                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 41379                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 41380                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 41381                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 41382 00003B76 C3                      	retn
 41383                                  
 41384                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 41385                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 41386                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 41387                                  
 41388                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41389                                  ;
 41390                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 41391                                  ;
 41392                                  ;   INPUT
 41393                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 41394                                  ;
 41395                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41396                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 41397                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 41398                                  ;
 41399                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41400                                  ;       None
 41401                                  ;
 41402                                  ;   NOTES
 41403                                  ;       None
 41404                                  ;
 41405                                  ;   HISTORY
 41406                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41407                                  ;
 41408                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41409                                  
 41410                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 41411                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 41412                                  
 41413                                  copy_envvar:
 41414 00003B77 51                              push    cx              ;
 41415 00003B78 56                              push    si              ;
 41416 00003B79 1E                              push    ds              ;
 41417 00003B7A 06                              push    es              ;
 41418 00003B7B 06                              push    es              ;
 41419 00003B7C 8E06[D114]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 41420 00003B80 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 41421                                  
 41422                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 41423                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 41424                                  ;   config.sys line)
 41425                                  ;
 41426                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 41427                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 41428                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 41429                                  
 41430 00003B81 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 41431                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 41432 00003B83 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 41433 00003B84 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 41434                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 41435 00003B86 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 41436 00003B88 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 41437                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 41438 00003B8A 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 41439 00003B8C 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 41440                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 41441 00003B8E 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 41442 00003B90 41                              inc     cx              ;
 41443 00003B91 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 41444 00003B93 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 41445 00003B95 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 41446 00003B97 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 41447 00003B99 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 41448 00003B9B 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 41449 00003B9C 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 41450                                  copy_varsrch:
 41451 00003B9E 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 41452 00003BA1 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 41453 00003BA3 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 41454 00003BA5 51                              push    cx              ;
 41455 00003BA6 56                              push    si              ;
 41456 00003BA7 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 41457 00003BA9 5E                              pop     si              ;
 41458 00003BAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41459 00003BAB 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 41460 00003BAD 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 41461 00003BB1 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 41462                                  
 41463                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 41464                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 41465                                  
 41466 00003BB3 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 41467 00003BB6 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 41468 00003BB8 56                              push    si              ;
 41469 00003BB9 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 41470 00003BBB 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 41471 00003BBD 2E8B0E[CF14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 41472 00003BC2 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 41473                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 41474                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 41475                                  
 41476 00003BC4 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 41477 00003BC5 26                      	es	; 26h
 41478 00003BC6 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 41479                                  
 41480 00003BC7 5E                      	pop     si
 41481                                  copy_envprep:
 41482 00003BC8 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 41483 00003BCB 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 41484 00003BCD 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 41485 00003BD0 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 41486                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 41487                                  	; 04/01/2023
 41488                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 41489 00003BD2 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 41490 00003BD3 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 41491 00003BD5 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 41492 00003BD7 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 41493 00003BD9 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 41494 00003BDB AA                      	stosb                   ;
 41495 00003BDC EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 41496                                  
 41497                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 41498 00003BDE 51                              push    cx              ;
 41499 00003BDF B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 41500 00003BE2 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 41501 00003BE4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41502 00003BE5 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 41503                                  
 41504                                  	; 04/01/2023
 41505                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 41506                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 41507                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 41508                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 41509                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 41510                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 41511                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 41512                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 41513                                  
 41514                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 41515 00003BE7 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 41516 00003BE9 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 41517                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 41518 00003BEA 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 41519 00003BED 2E893E[CF14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 41520                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 41521 00003BF2 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 41522                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 41523 00003BF3 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 41524 00003BF4 07                              pop     es              ;
 41525 00003BF5 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41526 00003BF6 5E                              pop     si              ;
 41527 00003BF7 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41528                                  
 41529                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 41530 00003BF8 C3                              retn
 41531                                  
 41532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41533                                  ;
 41534                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 41535                                  ;
 41536                                  ;   INPUT
 41537                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 41538                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 41539                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 41540                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 41541                                  ;
 41542                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41543                                  ;       Same as above
 41544                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 41545                                  ;
 41546                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41547                                  ;       All
 41548                                  ;
 41549                                  ;   NOTES
 41550                                  ;       None
 41551                                  ;
 41552                                  ;   HISTORY
 41553                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41554                                  ;
 41555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41556                                  
 41557                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 41558                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 41559                                  
 41560                                  copy_block:
 41561 00003BF9 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 41562 00003BFC 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 41563 00003BFE 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 41564 00003C00 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 41565 00003C02 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 41566                                  
 41567 00003C04 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 41568 00003C06 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 41569 00003C08 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 41570                                  
 41571                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 41572                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 41573                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 41574                                  
 41575 00003C0A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 41576 00003C0F 57                              push    di              ;
 41577                                  
 41578 00003C10 BF[2546]                        mov     di,szMenu
 41579 00003C13 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 41580 00003C16 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 41581                                  
 41582 00003C18 BF[2A46]                        mov     di,szCommon
 41583 00003C1B E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 41584 00003C1E 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 41585                                  
 41586 00003C20 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 41587 00003C22 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 41588 00003C25 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 41589                                  	; 10/09/2023
 41590                                  	;pop    di              ;
 41591 00003C27 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 41592 00003C29 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 41593 00003C2A 51                              push    cx              ;
 41594 00003C2B 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 41595 00003C2D 56                              push    si              ;
 41596 00003C2E 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 41597 00003C2F 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 41598 00003C31 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 41599 00003C34 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 41600 00003C37 5E                              pop     si              ;
 41601 00003C38 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41602 00003C39 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 41603 00003C3B EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 41604                                  
 41605                                  copy_error:
 41606                                  	; 10/09/2023
 41607 00003C3D F8                      	clc
 41608                                  copy_skip:
 41609 00003C3E 5F                              pop     di
 41610                                  ;copy_error:
 41611                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 41612                                  	;clc                    ;
 41613 00003C3F E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 41614 00003C42 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 41615                                  
 41616                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 41617                                  
 41618                                  copy_line:
 41619 00003C44 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 41620 00003C46 47                              inc     di              ;
 41621 00003C47 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 41622 00003C49 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 41623 00003C4B 2E803E[D414]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 41624 00003C51 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 41625 00003C53 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 41626 00003C56 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 41627 00003C58 47                              inc     di              ;
 41628 00003C59 47                              inc     di              ;
 41629 00003C5A EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 41630                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 41631 00003C5C E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 41632 00003C5F 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 41633 00003C61 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 41634 00003C63 47                              inc     di              ;
 41635                                  copy_next:
 41636 00003C64 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 41637 00003C66 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 41638                                  
 41639                                  copy_nextline:
 41640 00003C68 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 41641 00003C6B EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 41642                                  
 41643                                  	; 18/12/2022
 41644                                  ;copy_done:
 41645                                          ;retn
 41646                                  
 41647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41648                                  ;
 41649                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 41650                                  ;
 41651                                  ;   INPUT
 41652                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 41653                                  ;
 41654                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41655                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 41656                                  ;
 41657                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41658                                  ;       DX
 41659                                  ;
 41660                                  ;   NOTES
 41661                                  ;       None
 41662                                  ;
 41663                                  ;   HISTORY
 41664                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41665                                  ;
 41666                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41667                                  
 41668                                  get_linenum:
 41669 00003C6D 50                              push    ax              ;
 41670 00003C6E 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 41671 00003C70 51                              push    cx              ;
 41672 00003C71 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 41673 00003C73 56                              push    si              ;
 41674 00003C74 2E8B0E[5203]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 41675 00003C79 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 41676                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 41677 00003C7B E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 41678 00003C7E 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 41679 00003C80 43                              inc     bx              ;
 41680 00003C81 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 41681 00003C83 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 41682                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 41683 00003C85 5E                              pop     si              ;
 41684 00003C86 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41685 00003C87 58                              pop     ax              ;
 41686 00003C88 C3                              retn
 41687                                  
 41688                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41689                                  ;
 41690                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 41691                                  ;
 41692                                  ;   INPUT
 41693                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 41694                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 41695                                  ;
 41696                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41697                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 41698                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 41699                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 41700                                  ;
 41701                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41702                                  ;       None
 41703                                  ;
 41704                                  ;   NOTES
 41705                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 41706                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 41707                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 41708                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 41709                                  ;
 41710                                  ;   HISTORY
 41711                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41712                                  ;
 41713                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41714                                  
 41715                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 41716 00003C89 50                              push    ax              ;
 41717 00003C8A 51                              push    cx              ;
 41718 00003C8B 2E8B0E[5203]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 41719 00003C90 56                              push    si              ;
 41720 00003C91 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 41721 00003C93 1E                              push    ds              ;
 41722 00003C94 06                              push    es              ;
 41723 00003C95 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41724 00003C96 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 41725 00003C99 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 41726 00003C9B 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 41727 00003C9D 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 41728 00003C9E 5E                              pop     si              ;
 41729 00003C9F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41730 00003CA0 58                              pop     ax              ;
 41731                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 41732 00003CA1 C3                              retn			;
 41733                                  
 41734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41735                                  ;
 41736                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 41737                                  ;
 41738                                  ;   INPUT
 41739                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 41740                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 41741                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 41742                                  ;
 41743                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41744                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 41745                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 41746                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 41747                                  ;
 41748                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41749                                  ;       AX
 41750                                  ;
 41751                                  ;   NOTES
 41752                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 41753                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 41754                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 41755                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 41756                                  ;
 41757                                  ;   HISTORY
 41758                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41759                                  ;
 41760                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41761                                  
 41762                                  find_block:
 41763 00003CA2 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 41764 00003CA5 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 41765 00003CA7 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 41766 00003CA9 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 41767 00003CAB 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 41768 00003CAD 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 41769 00003CAF 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 41770 00003CB1 2E800E[D414]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 41771 00003CB7 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 41772                                  check_line:
 41773 00003CB9 2E800E[D414]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 41774 00003CBF E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 41775 00003CC2 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 41776                                  next_line:
 41777 00003CC4 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 41778 00003CC7 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 41779                                  ;find_exit:
 41780                                  ;	retn
 41781                                  
 41782                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41783                                  ;
 41784                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 41785                                  ;
 41786                                  ;   INPUT
 41787                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 41788                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 41789                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 41790                                  ;
 41791                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41792                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 41793                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 41794                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 41795                                  ;
 41796                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41797                                  ;       AX
 41798                                  ;
 41799                                  ;   NOTES
 41800                                  ;       None
 41801                                  ;
 41802                                  ;   HISTORY
 41803                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41804                                  ;
 41805                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41806                                  
 41807                                  comp_names:
 41808 00003CC9 57                              push    di              ;
 41809                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 41810 00003CCA E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 41811 00003CCD 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 41812 00003CCF E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 41813 00003CD2 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 41814 00003CD4 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 41815 00003CD6 47                              inc     di              ;
 41816 00003CD7 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 41817                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 41818 00003CDA 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 41819 00003CDC 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 41820 00003CDE F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 41821                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 41822 00003CDF 5F                              pop     di              ;
 41823 00003CE0 C3                              retn			;
 41824                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 41825 00003CE1 86E0                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 41826 00003CE3 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 41827 00003CE6 86E0                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 41828 00003CE8 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 41829                                  
 41830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41831                                  
 41832                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 41833                                  comp_names_x:
 41834                                  	;
 41835                                  comp_names_safe:
 41836 00003CEA 50                              push    ax
 41837 00003CEB 51                              push    cx
 41838 00003CEC 56                              push	si
 41839 00003CED 1E                              push    ds
 41840 00003CEE 0E                              push    cs
 41841 00003CEF 1F                              pop     ds
 41842 00003CF0 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 41843 00003CF3 1F                              pop     ds
 41844 00003CF4 5E                      	pop	si
 41845 00003CF5 59                              pop     cx
 41846 00003CF6 58                              pop     ax
 41847 00003CF7 C3                              retn
 41848                                  
 41849                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41850                                  ;
 41851                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 41852                                  ;
 41853                                  ;   INPUT
 41854                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 41855                                  ;
 41856                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41857                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 41858                                  ;
 41859                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41860                                  ;       None
 41861                                  ;
 41862                                  ;   NOTES
 41863                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 41864                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 41865                                  ;
 41866                                  ;   HISTORY
 41867                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41868                                  ;
 41869                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41870                                  
 41871                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 41872                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 41873                                  
 41874                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 41875 00003CF8 50                              push    ax              ;
 41876 00003CF9 53                              push    bx              ;
 41877 00003CFA 51                              push    cx              ;
 41878 00003CFB 52                              push    dx              ;
 41879 00003CFC 56                              push    si              ;
 41880 00003CFD B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 41881 00003CFF 8A3E[DC45]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 41882 00003D03 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 41883 00003D05 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 41884 00003D06 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 41885 00003D08 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 41886 00003D0A 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 41887 00003D0D B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 41888 00003D0F CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 41889 00003D11 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 41890 00003D13 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 41891 00003D15 8A26[DB45]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 41892 00003D19 3A1E[E545]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 41893 00003D1D 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 41894 00003D1F 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 41895 00003D22 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 41896 00003D24 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 41897 00003D26 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 41898 00003D28 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 41899 00003D2A 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 41900 00003D2C 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 41901                                  print_other:                    ;
 41902 00003D2F B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 41903 00003D31 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 41904 00003D33 8BBF[0946]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 41905 00003D37 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 41906 00003D39 8A3E[DC45]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 41907 00003D3D B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 41908 00003D3F B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 41909 00003D42 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 41910 00003D44 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 41911 00003D46 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 41912 00003D48 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 41913                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 41914 00003D4A B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 41915 00003D4D CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 41916 00003D4F FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 41917 00003D51 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 41918 00003D53 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 41919                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 41920 00003D55 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 41921 00003D58 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 41922 00003D5A FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 41923 00003D5C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 41924 00003D5E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 41925 00003D60 06                              push    es              ;
 41926                                  print_loop:                     ;
 41927 00003D61 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 41928 00003D64 47                              inc     di              ;
 41929 00003D65 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 41930 00003D67 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 41931 00003D69 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 41932                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 41933 00003D6B 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 41934 00003D6D 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 41935 00003D6F 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 41936 00003D71 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 41937 00003D73 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 41938 00003D75 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 41939 00003D77 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 41940 00003D79 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 41941 00003D7C 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 41942 00003D7E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 41943 00003D80 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 41944 00003D82 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 41945                                  print_done:                     ;
 41946 00003D84 07                              pop     es              ;
 41947 00003D85 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 41948 00003D86 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 41949 00003D88 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 41950 00003D8A 5E                              pop     si              ;
 41951 00003D8B 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 41952 00003D8C 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41953 00003D8D 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 41954 00003D8E 58                              pop     ax              ;
 41955 00003D8F C3                              retn			;
 41956                                  
 41957                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41958                                  ;
 41959                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 41960                                  ;
 41961                                  ;   INPUT
 41962                                  ;       None
 41963                                  ;
 41964                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41965                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 41966                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 41967                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 41968                                  ;
 41969                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41970                                  ;       None
 41971                                  ;
 41972                                  ;   NOTES
 41973                                  ;       None
 41974                                  ;
 41975                                  ;   HISTORY
 41976                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41977                                  ;
 41978                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41979                                  
 41980                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 41981 00003D90 8A1E[E545]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 41982 00003D94 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 41983 00003D96 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 41984 00003D99 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 41985 00003D9C 803E[E945]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 41986 00003DA1 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 41987 00003DA3 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 41988 00003DA5 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 41989 00003DA7 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 41990                                  check_time:
 41991 00003DA9 A0[E945]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 41992 00003DAC 2A06[EA45]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 41993 00003DB0 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 41994 00003DB2 800E[E445]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 41995 00003DB7 C606[EA45]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 41996 00003DBC E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 41997                                  show_time:
 41998 00003DBF 53                              push    bx              ;
 41999 00003DC0 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 42000 00003DC2 8A3E[DC45]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 42001 00003DC6 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 42002 00003DC8 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42003 00003DCA 52                              push    dx              ;
 42004 00003DCB 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 42005 00003DCE B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 42006 00003DD0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42007 00003DD2 BA[6D4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 42008 00003DD5 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 42009 00003DD8 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 42010 00003DDA 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 42011 00003DDB B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 42012 00003DDD F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 42013 00003DDF 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 42014 00003DE1 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 42015 00003DE3 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 42016 00003DE5 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 42017 00003DE7 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 42018 00003DE9 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 42019 00003DEB B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 42020 00003DED CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 42021 00003DEF 5A                              pop     dx
 42022 00003DF0 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 42023 00003DF2 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42024 00003DF4 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 42025                                  input_key:
 42026 00003DF5 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 42027 00003DF7 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 42028 00003DF9 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 42029 00003DFB 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 42030 00003DFD 803E[E945]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 42031 00003E02 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 42032 00003E04 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 42033 00003E06 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 42034 00003E08 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 42035 00003E0A 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 42036 00003E0C 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 42037 00003E0E 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 42038 00003E10 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 42039                                  got_time:
 42040 00003E12 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 42041 00003E14 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 42042 00003E16 0036[EA45]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 42043 00003E1A EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 42044                                  got_key:

 42047 00003E20 8706[E945]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 42048 00003E24 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 42049 00003E26 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 42050 00003E28 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 42051 00003E29 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 42052 00003E2C 8B1E[DB45]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]

 42059 00003E37 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?

 42063                                  
 42064 00003E3F 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?

 42066 00003E43 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?

 42068 00003E48 FE0E[E545]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;

 42072                                  not_up:

 42075 00003E57 3A1E[E645]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?

 42079 00003E64 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 42080                                  print1: 
 42081 00003E65 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 42082                                  print2:

 42087                                  not_down:

 42095                                  not_f8:
 42096 00003E85 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 42097 00003E87 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 42098                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42099                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh

 42134                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 42135                                  ;
 42136                                  ;   INPUT

 42138                                  ;
 42139                                  ;   OUTPUT

 42141                                  ;

 42144                                  ;
 42145                                  ;   NOTES
 42146                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 42147                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).

 42161 00003EBC B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 42162 00003EBE 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 42163 00003EC0 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 42164                                  disp_ok:

 42249                                  ;
 42250                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 42251                                  ;
 42252                                  ;   INPUT
 42253                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42254                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42255                                  ;
 42256                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42257                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 42258                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 42259                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 42260                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42261                                  ;
 42262                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42263                                  ;       AX
 42264                                  ;
 42265                                  ;   NOTES
 42266                                  ;       None
 42267                                  ;
 42268                                  ;   HISTORY
 42269                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42270                                  ;
 42271                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42272                                  
 42273                                  skip_token:
 42274 00003F1D E84D00                          call    get_char
 42275 00003F20 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 42276 00003F22 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 42277 00003F25 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 42278                                  skip_check_eol:
 42279 00003F27 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 42280 00003F29 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 42281 00003F2B 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42282 00003F2D 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 42283 00003F2F F8                              clc
 42284                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 42285 00003F30 C3                      	retn
 42286                                  skip_token_eol:
 42287 00003F31 F9                              stc
 42288                                  skip_token_done:
 42289 00003F32 C3                              retn
 42290                                  
 42291                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42292                                  ;
 42293                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 42294                                  ;
 42295                                  ;   INPUT
 42296                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42297                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42298                                  ;
 42299                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42300                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42301                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 42302                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 42303                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42304                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 42305                                  ;
 42306                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42307                                  ;       AX
 42308                                  ;
 42309                                  ;   NOTES
 42310                                  ;       None
 42311                                  ;
 42312                                  ;   HISTORY
 42313                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42314                                  ;
 42315                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42316                                  
 42317                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 42318 00003F33 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 42319 00003F36 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 42320 00003F39 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 42321 00003F3B E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 42322 00003F3E 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 42323 00003F40 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 42324                                  
 42325                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42326                                  ;
 42327                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 42328                                  ;
 42329                                  ;   INPUT
 42330                                  ;       AL == last character read
 42331                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42332                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42333                                  ;
 42334                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42335                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42336                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 42337                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 42338                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42339                                  ;
 42340                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42341                                  ;       AX
 42342                                  ;
 42343                                  ;   NOTES
 42344                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 42345                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 42346                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 42347                                  ;
 42348                                  ;   HISTORY
 42349                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42350                                  ;
 42351                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42352                                  
 42353                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42354                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 42355                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42356                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 42357                                       
 42358                                  	; fall into skip_line
 42359                                  
 42360                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42361                                  ;
 42362                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 42363                                  ;
 42364                                  ;   INPUT
 42365                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42366                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42367                                  ;
 42368                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42369                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42370                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 42371                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42372                                  ;
 42373                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42374                                  ;       AX
 42375                                  ;
 42376                                  ;   NOTES
 42377                                  ;       None
 42378                                  ;
 42379                                  ;   HISTORY
 42380                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42381                                  ;
 42382                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42383                                  
 42384                                  skip_line:
 42385 00003F42 E82800                          call    get_char
 42386 00003F45 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 42387                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42388 00003F47 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42389 00003F49 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 42390                                  skip_line_done:
 42391                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 42392 00003F4B C3                              retn

 42395                                  ;
 42396                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 42397                                  ;
 42398                                  ;   INPUT
 42399                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42400                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42401                                  ;
 42402                                  ;   OUTPUT

 42404                                  ;       BX == binary #
 42405                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 42406                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42407                                  ;
 42408                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42409                                  ;       AX
 42410                                  ;
 42411                                  ;   NOTES
 42412                                  ;       None
 42413                                  ;
 42414                                  ;   HISTORY
 42415                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42416                                  ;
 42417                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42418                                  
 42419                                  ; 13/05/2019
 42420                                  
 42421                                  get_number:
 42422 00003F4C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 42423                                  num_loop:
 42424 00003F4E E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 42425 00003F51 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 42426 00003F53 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 42427 00003F55 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 42428 00003F57 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 42429 00003F59 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 42430 00003F5B 50                              push    ax              ;
 42431 00003F5C B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 42432 00003F5F 52                              push    dx              ;
 42433 00003F60 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 42434 00003F62 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42435 00003F63 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 42436 00003F65 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42437 00003F66 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 42438 00003F68 98                              cbw                     ;
 42439 00003F69 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 42440 00003F6B EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 42441                                  
 42442                                  	; 18/12/2022
 42443                                  ;num_done:
 42444                                          ;retn

 42446                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42447                                  ;
 42448                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 42449                                  ;
 42450                                  ;   INPUT
 42451                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42452                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42453                                  ;
 42454                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42455                                  ;       AL == next character
 42456                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 42457                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42458                                  ;
 42459                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42460                                  ;       AX
 42461                                  ;
 42462                                  ;   NOTES
 42463                                  ;       None
 42464                                  ;
 42465                                  ;   HISTORY
 42466                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42467                                  ;
 42468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42469                                  
 42470                                  get_char:
 42471 00003F6D 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 42472 00003F70 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 42473                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 42474 00003F72 26                      	es	
 42475 00003F73 AC                      	lodsb
 42476 00003F74 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 42477 00003F76 C3                              retn			;
 42478                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 42479 00003F77 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 42480                                  nearby_ret:
 42481 00003F7A C3                              retn
