 42483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42484                                  ;
 42485                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 42486                                  ;
 42487                                  ;   INPUT
 42488                                  ;       AL == current command code
 42489                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 42490                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 42491                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 42492                                  ;
 42493                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42494                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 42495                                  ;
 42496                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42497                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 42498                                  ;
 42499                                  ;   NOTES
 42500                                  ;       None
 42501                                  ;
 42502                                  ;   HISTORY
 42503                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42504                                  ;
 42505                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42506                                  
 42507                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42508                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 42509                                  
 42510                                  	; 12/12/2022
 42511                                  query_user:
 42512 00003F7B F606[E445]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 42513                                  	; 01/01/2023
 42514 00003F80 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 42515 00003F82 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 42516                                  	; 12/12/2022
 42517                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 42518                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 42519                                  qu_1:
 42520 00003F85 F606[E445]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 42521 00003F8A 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 42522 00003F8C 50                              push    ax                      ;
 42523 00003F8D A0[D314]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 42524 00003F90 F606[E445]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 42525 00003F95 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 42526 00003F97 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 42527                                  	; 01/01/2023

 42537                                  query_all:
 42538                                  
 42539                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 42540                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 42541                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 42542                                  
 42543 00003F9D 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 42544 00003F9E BA[C84C]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 42545 00003FA1 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 42546 00003FA3 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 42547                                  
 42548 00003FA5 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 42549 00003FA7 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 42550 00003FA9 BF[3146]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 42551                                  find_match:                             ;
 42552 00003FAC 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 42553 00003FAE 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 42554 00003FB0 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 42555 00003FB2 47                              inc     di                      ;
 42556 00003FB3 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 42557 00003FB5 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 42558 00003FB7 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 42559                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 42560 00003FBA EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 42561                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 42562 00003FBC 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 42563 00003FBF B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 42564 00003FC1 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 42565                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 42566 00003FC3 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 42567 00003FC5 47                              inc     di                      ;
 42568 00003FC6 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 42569 00003FC8 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 42570 00003FCA E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 42571 00003FCC B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 42572 00003FCE 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 42573 00003FD1 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 42574 00003FD3 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 42575                                  cmd_notset:
 42576 00003FD5 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 42577                                  line_print:                             ;
 42578                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 42579 00003FD7 26                              es
 42580 00003FD8 AC                      	lodsb
 42581 00003FD9 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 42582 00003FDB 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 42583 00003FDD B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 42584                                  non_null:                               ;
 42585 00003FDF 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 42586 00003FE1 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 42587 00003FE3 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 42588                                          ; 10/09/2023
 42589 00003FE5 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 42590                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 42591 00003FE8 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 42592                                  non_space:                              ;
 42593 00003FEA 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 42594 00003FEC B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 42595 00003FEE CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 42596 00003FF0 EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 42597                                  
 42598                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 42599 00003FF2 BA[594C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 42600                                  
 42601                                  generic_prompt:
 42602 00003FF5 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 42603                                  input_loop:                             ;
 42604 00003FF8 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 42605 00003FFA CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 42606 00003FFC 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 42607 00003FFE 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 42608 00004000 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 42609 00004003 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 42610 00004005 A0[694C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 42611 00004008 800E[E445]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 42612 0000400D EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 42613                                  not_func:
 42614 0000400F 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 42615 00004011 3A06[694C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 42616 00004015 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 42617 00004017 3A06[654C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 42618 0000401B 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 42619 0000401D 803E[D314]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 42620 00004022 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 42621 00004024 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 42622 00004026 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 42623 00004028 800E[E445]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 42624 0000402D A0[654C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 42625                                  legal_char:                             ;
 42626 00004030 E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 42627 00004033 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 42628

 42630 00004038 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no

 42703                                  
 42704                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 42705                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 42706                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 42707                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 42708                                  
 42709                                  disable_autoexec:
 42710                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 42711                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 42712                                  
 42713 00004076 F606[E445]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 42714 0000407B 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 42715 0000407D F606[DA45]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 42716 00004082 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 42717 00004084 800E[DA45]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 42718                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 42719 00004089 810E[E445]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 42720 0000408F BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 42721                                  dae_1:
 42722                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42723 00004092 A0[1945]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 42724                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 42725 00004095 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 42726 00004097 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 42727 00004099 8A1E[1A45]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 42728 0000409D B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 42729 0000409F 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 42730 000040A1 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 42731 000040A4 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 42732 000040A7 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 42733 000040A9 881E[1A45]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 42734 000040AD 81C3[1B45]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 42735 000040B1 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 42736                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 42737 000040B2 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 42738 000040B5 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 42739 000040B7 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 42740 000040B8 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 42741 000040BA 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;

 42745                                  disable_exit:                           ;

 42903                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 42904

 42907                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG

 42909                                  ;else

 42916                                  convloop:
 42917 0000412C AC                      	lodsb
 42918 0000412D 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 42919 0000412F 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 42920 00004131 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 42921 00004133 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 42922 00004135 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 42923 00004137 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 42924                                  noconv:
 42925                                  
 42926                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 42927                                  
 42928                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 42929                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 42930                                  
 42931                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 42932                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 42933                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 42934                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 42935                                  ;
 42936 0000413A 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 42937 0000413D 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 42938 0000413F 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 42939 00004141 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 42940                                  check_eol:
 42941 00004143 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 42942 00004145 7406                    	je	short convdone
 42943 00004147 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 42944 00004149 7402                    	je	short convdone
 42945                                  ;endif

 42948                                  convdone:

 42950 0000414E 5E                      	pop	si
 42951 0000414F 59                      	pop	cx
 42952 00004150 C3                      	retn

 43033                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 43034                                  	; (SYSINIT:34E0h)
 43035                                  
 43036                                  	; 13/04/2024 - Retrodos v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 43037                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4F3Eh)
 43038                                  
 43039                                  calldev:
 43040 00004199 2E8E1E[551F]            	mov	ds,[cs:DevEntry+2]
 43041 0000419E 2E031E[531F]            	add	bx,[cs:DevEntry]	; do a little relocation
 43042 000041A3 8B07                    	mov	ax,[bx]
 43043                                  
 43044 000041A5 2EFF36[531F]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]
 43045 000041AA 2EA3[531F]              	mov	[cs:DevEntry],ax
 43046 000041AE BB[6603]                	mov	bx,packet
 43047 000041B1 2EFF1E[531F]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]
 43048 000041B6 2E8F06[531F]            	pop	word [cs:DevEntry]
 43049 000041BB C3                      	retn

 43053                                  ; procedure : todigit
 43054                                  ;
 43055                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43056                                  
 43057                                  todigit:
 43058 000041BC 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 43059                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 43060                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43061 000041BE 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 43062                                  	;cmp	al,9
 43063                                  	;ja	short notdig
 43064                                  	;clc
 43065                                  	;retn
 43066                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43067 000041C0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 43068 000041C2 F5                      	cmc
 43069                                  notdig:
 43070                                  	;stc
 43071                                  notdig2:
 43072 000041C3 C3                      	retn
 43073                                  
 43074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43075                                  ;
 43076                                  ; procedure : getnum
 43077                                  ;
 43078                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 43079                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 43080                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 43081                                  ;
 43082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43083                                  
 43084                                  getnum:
 43085 000041C4 53                      	push	bx
 43086 000041C5 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 43087                                  b2:
 43088 000041C7 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 43089 000041CA 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 43090                                  
 43091 000041CC 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 43092 000041CD 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 43093                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 43094                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43095 000041CE B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 43096 000041D0 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 43097 000041D2 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 43098 000041D3 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 43099 000041D5 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 43100 000041D8 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 43101                                  
 43102 000041DA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 43103                                  
 43104 000041DB E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 43105 000041DE 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 43106 000041E0 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 43107 000041E2 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 43108 000041E4 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 43109 000041E6 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 43110 000041E8 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 43111 000041EA 7417                    	je	short b15
 43112 000041EC 2E3A06[AA02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 43113 000041F1 7410                    	je	short b15
 43114 000041F3 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 43115                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43116                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43117                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 43118                                  	;nop
 43119 000041F5 740C                    	je	short b15
 43120 000041F7 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 43121 000041F9 7408                    	je	short b15
 43122 000041FB 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 43123 000041FD 7404                    	je	short b15
 43124 000041FF 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 43125 00004201 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 43126                                  b15:
 43127 00004203 2EFF06[5203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 43128 00004208 2EFF0E[5603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 43129                                  b1:
 43130 0000420D 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 43131 0000420F 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 43132 00004211 5B                      	pop	bx
 43133 00004212 C3                      	retn
 43134                                  badnum:
 43135                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43136                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 43137 00004213 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 43138                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 43139 00004215 2EA2[AA02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 43140 00004219 5B                      	pop	bx
 43141 0000421A F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 43142 0000421B C3                      	retn
 43143

 43145                                  
 43146                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 43147                                  
 43148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43149                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 43150                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 43151                                  ;	si = 0
 43152                                  ;	ax = country id
 43153                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 43154                                  ;	bx = file handle
 43155                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 43156                                  ;
 43157                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 43158                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 43159                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 43160                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 43161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43162                                  
 43163                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43164                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 43165                                  
 43166                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43167                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 43168                                  
 43169 0000421C 57                      	push	di
 43170 0000421D 50                      	push	ax
 43171 0000421E 52                      	push	dx
 43172                                  
 43173 0000421F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 43174 00004221 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 43175 00004223 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 43176 00004226 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 43177 00004229 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43178                                  
 43179 0000422B 06                      	push	es
 43180 0000422C 56                      	push	si
 43181                                  
 43182 0000422D 0E                      	push	cs
 43183 0000422E 07                      	pop	es
 43184                                  
 43185 0000422F BF[7F44]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 43186 00004232 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 43187 00004235 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 43188                                  
 43189 00004237 5E                      	pop	si
 43190 00004238 07                      	pop	es
 43191 00004239 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 43192                                  
 43193 0000423B 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 43194 0000423E 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 43195 00004241 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 43196                                  
 43197 00004243 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 43198 00004244 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 43199 00004246 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 43200 00004249 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 43201 0000424C E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 43202 0000424F 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43203                                  
 43204 00004251 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 43205 00004253 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 43206 00004257 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 43207                                  
 43208 00004259 46                      	inc	si
 43209 0000425A 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 43210 0000425B 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 43211 0000425C 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 43212 0000425D 5F                      	pop	di
 43213                                  
 43214                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 43215 0000425E 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 43216 00004261 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 43217                                  
 43218                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 43219                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 43220                                  	; 10/09/2023
 43221 00004263 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 43222 00004265 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 43223 00004267 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 43224 0000426A 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 43225                                  
 43226                                  setdoscntry_next:
 43227 0000426C 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 43228 0000426E 46                      	inc	si
 43229 0000426F 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 43230 00004270 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 43231                                  
 43232                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 43233                                  	; 10/09/2023
 43234 00004272 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 43235                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 43236 00004273 F9                      	stc
 43237 00004274 C3                      	retn
 43238                                  
 43239                                  setdosdata_fail:
 43240 00004275 5E                      	pop	si
 43241 00004276 59                      	pop	cx
 43242 00004277 5F                      	pop	di
 43243 00004278 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 43244                                  
 43245                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 43246 0000427A 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 43247                                  
 43248                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 43249 0000427D 2E8916[8744]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 43250 00004282 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 43251 00004285 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 43252 00004288 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 43253 0000428B E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 43254 0000428E 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 43255                                  
 43256 00004290 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 43257 00004292 46                      	inc	si
 43258 00004293 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 43259                                  
 43260                                  setdoscntry_data:
 43261 00004294 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 43262 00004295 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 43263 00004296 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 43264                                  
 43265 00004297 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 43266 0000429A E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 43267 0000429D 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 43268                                  
 43269 0000429F 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 43270 000042A2 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 43271 000042A5 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 43272 000042A8 F9                      	stc
 43273 000042A9 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 43274 000042AB 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43275                                  
 43276 000042AD BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 43277 000042B0 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 43278 000042B3 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 43279 000042B5 F9                      	stc
 43280 000042B6 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 43281 000042B8 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 43282                                  
 43283 000042BA 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 43284 000042BC 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 43285                                  
 43286 000042BE 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 43287 000042C1 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 43288 000042C4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 43289 000042C7 F9                      	stc
 43290 000042C8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 43291 000042CA 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43292                                  
 43293 000042CC 56                      	push	si
 43294 000042CD BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 43295 000042D0 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 43296 000042D2 5E                      	pop	si
 43297 000042D3 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 43298 000042D6 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 43299 000042D9 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 43300 000042DB F9                      	stc
 43301 000042DC CD21                    	int	21h
 43302 000042DE 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43303                                  
 43304 000042E0 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 43305 000042E2 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 43306                                  
 43307 000042E4 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 43308 000042E7 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 43309 000042EA 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 43310 000042EC 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 43311 000042ED 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 43312 000042EE 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 43313 000042F2 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 43314                                  
 43315                                  	;if	bugfix
 43316 000042F4 E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 43317                                  	;endif
 43318                                  
 43319 000042F7 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 43320 000042F9 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 43321                                  
 43322 000042FB 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 43323                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 43324 000042FF 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 43325                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 43326

 43328                                  
 43329                                  	;push	ax
 43330                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 43331                                  	;mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 43332                                  	;pop	ax
 43333                                  	; 10/09/2023
 43334 00004304 2EFF36[8744]            	push	word [cs:cntrycodepage_id]
 43335 00004309 8F4404                  	pop	word [si+4]
 43336                                  
 43337                                  setdoscntry_mov:
 43338 0000430C F3A4                    	rep	movsb			;copy the table into dos
 43339 0000430E 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?

 43341

 43343 00004313 268F451A                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]
 43344                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 43345 00004317 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 43346                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 43347                                  
 43348                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 43349 0000431B 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 43350 0000431C 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left

 43352 0000431E 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 43353 00004320 46                      	inc	si
 43354 00004321 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 43355 00004322 49                      	dec	cx
 43356                                  	; 10/09/2023

 43358                                  	;cmp	cx,0
 43359                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_ok

 43409                                  getcountrydestination:
 43410                                  
 43411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43412                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 43413                                  ;
 43414                                  ;input: al - data id
 43415                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 43416                                  ;on return:
 43417                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 43418                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 43419                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43420                                  
 43421                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43422                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 43423                                  
 43424                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43425                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 43426                                  
 43427 00004341 51                      	push	cx
 43428                                  	;add	di,74
 43429 00004342 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 43430                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 43431 00004345 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 43432 00004348 47                      	inc	di
 43433 00004349 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 43434                                  
 43435                                  getcntrydest:
 43436 0000434A 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 43437 0000434D 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 43438                                  
 43439 0000434F 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 43440 00004353 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 43441                                  
 43442 00004355 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 43443 00004358 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 43444                                  
 43445                                  getcntrydest_1:
 43446                                  	;add	di,41
 43447 0000435A 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 43448                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 43449 0000435D E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 43450 0000435F F9                      	stc
 43451                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 43452                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 43453                                  	; 10/09/2023
 43454 00004360 59                      	pop	cx
 43455 00004361 C3                      	retn
 43456                                  
 43457                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 43458                                  	; 10/09/2023
 43459 00004362 47                      	inc	di
 43460                                  
 43461                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?

 43463                                  ;
 43464                                  ;	;inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen

 43472                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 43473                                  	; 10/09/2023

 43476 0000436A 59                      	pop	cx
 43477 0000436B C3                      	retn
 43478                                  
 43479                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43480                                  
 43481                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 43482                                  
 43483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43484                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 43485                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 43486                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 43487                                  ;
 43488                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 43489                                  ;	 be moved.
 43490                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 43491                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 43492                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 43493                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 43494                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 43495                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 43496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43497                                  
 43498 0000436C 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 43499 0000436D B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 43500 00004370 F9                      	stc
 43501 00004371 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 43502 00004373 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 43503 00004374 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 43504                                  
 43505 00004376 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 43506 00004378 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 43507 0000437A B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 43508 0000437C F9                      	stc
 43509 0000437D CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 43510                                  ricb_exit:

 43514                                  
 43515                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 43516                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 43517                                  %if 0
 43518                                  
 43519                                  set_country_path:
 43520                                  
 43521                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43522                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 43523                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 43524                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 43525                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 43526                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 43527                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 43528                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43529                                  
 43530                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43531                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 43532                                  
 43533                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43534                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 43535                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 43536                                  
 43537                                  	push	si
 43538                                  
 43539                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 43540                                  	push	es
 43541                                  	pop	ds
 43542                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 43543                                  
 43544                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 43545                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 43546                                  
 43547                                  	mov	al,[si]
 43548                                  	inc	si
 43549                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 43550                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 43551                                  
 43552                                  scp_default_drv:
 43553                                  	mov	ah,19h
 43554                                  	int	21h
 43555                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 43556                                  
 43557                                  scp_setdrv:
 43558                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 43559                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 43560                                  	mov	al,[si]
 43561                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 43562                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 43563                                  
 43564                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 43565                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 43566                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 43567                                  	; 04/01/2023
 43568                                  	jne	short scp_path
 43569                                  
 43570                                  scp_root_dir:
 43571                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 43572                                  scp_path:
 43573                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 43574                                  
 43575                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 43576                                  scpath_exit:
 43577                                  
 43578                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 43579                                  	push	es
 43580                                  	pop	ds
 43581                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 43582                                  
 43583                                  	pop	si
 43584                                  	retn
 43585                                  
 43586                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43587                                  
 43588                                  chk_drive_letter:
 43589                                  
 43590                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 43591                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 43592                                  ;carry set if not.
 43593                                  
 43594                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 43595                                  
 43596                                  	push	ax
 43597                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 43598                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 43599                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 43600                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 43601                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 43602                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 43603                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 43604                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 43605                                  	; 04/01/2023
 43606                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 43607                                  
 43608                                  cdletter_no:
 43609                                  	stc
 43610                                  cdletter_exit:
 43611                                  	pop	ax
 43612                                  	retn
 43613                                  
 43614                                  %endif
 43615                                  
 43616                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43617                                  
 43618                                  move_asciiz:
 43619                                  
 43620                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 43621                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 43622                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 43623                                  
 43624                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43625                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 43626                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 43627                                  
 43628                                  masciiz_loop:
 43629                                  	; 10/09/2023
 43630 00004380 F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 43631 00004383 A4                      	movsb
 43632                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 43633                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 43634 00004384 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 43635 00004386 C3                      	retn

 43647 00004389 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 43648                                  badload:

 43650 0000438E BB[B649]                	mov	bx,crlfm

 43654 00004393 E81D00                  	call	print
 43655                                  prn1:
